[02] ``pañcime, āvuso, āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo. katame pañca? idhāvuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro hoti parisuddhavacīsamācāro; evarūpepi, āvuso, puggale āghāto paṭivinetabbo''ti (a0 ni0 5.162) --
[25] evamādināpi ^a^V0.0041^ea^ nayena pañca āghātapaṭivinayā vuttā, tesu yena kenaci āghātapaṭivinayavidhinā paccavekkhitvā. apica yo --
[02] ``ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ, tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro''ti (ma0 ni0 1.232) satthu ovādo.
[21] ``tasseva ^a^P1.0047^ea^ tena pāpiyo, yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhati.
[22] kuddhaṃ appaṭikujjhanto, saṅgāmaṃ jeti dujjayaṃ..
[21] ``ubhinnamatthaṃ carati, attano ca parassa ca.
[22] paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.188).

[02] ``sattime ^a^M0.0044^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṃ āgacchanti itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. katame satta? idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati, `aho vatāyaṃ dubbaṇṇo assā'ti. taṃ kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vaṇṇavatāya nandati. kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kiñcāpi so hoti sunhāto suvilitto kappitakesamassu odātavatthavasano, atha kho so dubbaṇṇova hoti kodhābhibhūto. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā.

[02] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati `aho vatāyaṃ dukkhaṃ sayeyyā'ti...pe0... na pacurattho assāti...pe0... na bhogavā assāti...pe0... na yasavā assāti...pe0... na mittavā assāti...pe0... kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyāti. taṃ kissa hetu? na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamane nandati. kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kāyena duccaritaṃ carati, vācāya duccaritaṃ carati, manasā duccaritaṃ carati. so kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā...pe0... nirayaṃ upapajjati kodhābhibhūto''ti (a0 ni0 7.64).
[22] ``kuddho ^a^V0.0042^ea^ atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati...pe0..... (a0 ni0 7.64).
[22] ``kodhaṃ jahe vippajaheyya mānaṃ, saṃyojanaṃ sabbamatikkameyya.. (dha0 pa0 221).
[22] ``anatthajanano kodho, kodho cittappakopano...pe0..... (a0 ni0 7.64).
[21] ``kodhaṃ ^a^P1.0048^ea^ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati.
[22] kodhassa visamūlassa, madhuraggassa brāhmaṇā''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.187).
[21] ``ekāparādhaṃ ^a^M0.0045^ea^ khama bhūripañña,
[22] na paṇḍitā kodhabalā bhavantī''ti.. --

[25] evamādinā nayena dose ādīnave vuttappaṭipakkhato dosappahāne ānisaṃse ca paccavekkhitvā pubbabhāge dosaṃ tadaṅgappahānādivasena pajahitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tatiyamaggena sabbaso dosaṃ samucchindatha, pajahathāti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tattha niyojanaṃ. tena vuttaṃ ``dosaṃ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṃ pajahathā''ti. ^b^duṭṭhāse^eb^ti āghātena dūsitacittatāya paduṭṭhā. sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^moha^eb^nti aññāṇaṃ. tañhi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇantiādinā nayena vibhāgena anekappabhedampi muyhanti. tena sayaṃ vā muyhati muyhanamattameva vā tanti mohoti vuccati. so cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo, aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso, ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso ^a^V0.0043^ea^ vā, asammāppaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno, andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāno, sabbākusalānaṃ mūlanti daṭṭhabbo. idhāpi ^b^pajahathā^eb^ti padassa --
[21] ``mūḷho atthaṃ na jānāti, mūḷho dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ moho sahate naraṃ''.. (itivu0 88).
[22] ``anatthajanano moho...pe0..... (itivu0 88).
[22] ``avijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā'' (itivu0 40).
[22] ``mohasambandhano ^a^P1.0049^ea^ loko, bhabbarūpova dissati''. (udā0 70).
[22] ``moho ^a^M0.0046^ea^ nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya'' (a0 ni0 3.34).
[02] ``mūḷho kho, brāhmaṇa, mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavatī''ti ca --

[25] ādinā nayena ``yo koci dhammo kāmacchandādisaṃkilesadhammehi nibbattetabbo, atthato sabbo so mohahetuko''ti ca mohe ādīnavaṃ tappaṭipakkhato mohappahāne ānisaṃsañca paccavekkhitvā kāmacchandādippahānakkameneva pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena mohaṃ pajahantā tatiyamaggena yathāvuttalobhadosekaṭṭhaṃ mohaṃ samucchedavasena pajahathāti attho daṭṭhabbo. anāgāmimaggavajjho eva hi moho idhādhippetoti. ^b^mūḷhāse^eb^ti kusalākusalasāvajjānavajjādibhede attano hitāhite sammūḷhā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^kodha^eb^nti dosaṃ. doso eva hi kodhapariyāyena bujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena ^a^V0.0044^ea^ evaṃ vutto. tasmā dutiyasutte vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo. apica kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho, āghātakaraṇaraso, cittassa byāpattibhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, cetaso pūtibhāvoti daṭṭhabboti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^makkha^eb^nti paraguṇamakkhanaṃ. yadipi hi so gūthaṃ gahetvā paraṃ paharanto viya attano karaṃ paṭhamataraṃ makkhatiyeva, tathāpi paresaṃ guṇamakkhanādhippāyena pavattetabbattā ``paraguṇamakkhano''ti vuccati. tathā hi ^a^M0.0047^ea^ so udakapuñchanamiva nhātassa sarīragataṃ udakaṃ paresaṃ guṇe makkheti puñchati vināseti ^a^P1.0050^ea^, parehi vā katānaṃ mahantānampi kārānaṃ khepanato dhaṃsanato makkhoti vuccati. so paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo, tesaṃ vināsanaraso, tadavacchādanapaccupaṭṭhāno. atthato pana paresaṃ guṇamakkhanākārena pavatto domanassasahagatacittuppādoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^pajahathā^eb^ti tattha vuttappabhedaṃ dosaṃ, dose ca vuttanayaṃ ādīnavaṃ, pahāne cassa ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena pajahantā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tatiyamaggena anavasesaṃ samucchindathāti attho. ^b^makkhāse^eb^ti makkhitā makkhitaparaguṇā, paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhitāro, tato eva attanopi dhaṃsitaguṇāti attho. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^māna^eb^nti jātiādivatthukaṃ cetaso unnamanaṃ. so hi ``seyyohamasmī''tiādinā nayena maññanti tena, sayaṃ vā maññati, mānanaṃ sampaggahoti vā mānoti vuccati. svāyaṃ seyyohamasmīti māno, sadisohamasmīti māno, hīnohamasmīti mānoti evaṃ tividho. puna seyyassa seyyohamasmīti māno, seyyassa sadiso, seyyassa hīno; sadisassa seyyo, sadisassa sadiso, sadisassa hīno; hīnassa seyyo, hīnassa sadiso, hīnassa hīnohamasmīti mānoti evaṃ navavidhopi unnatilakkhaṇo, ahaṃkāraraso, sampaggaharaso ^a^V0.0045^ea^ vā, uddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vā, diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno ummādo viyāti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^pajahathā^eb^ti tassa sabbassapi attukkaṃsanaparavambhananimittatā, garuṭṭhāniyesu abhivādanapaccupaṭṭhānāñjalikammasāmīcikammādīnaṃ akaraṇe kāraṇatā, jātimadapurisamadādibhāvena pamādāpattihetubhāvoti evamādibhedaṃ ādīnavaṃ tappaṭipakkhato niratimānatāya ānisaṃsañca paccavekkhitvā rājasabhaṃ anuppatto caṇḍālo viya sabrahmacārīsu nīcacittataṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena taṃ ^a^P1.0051^ea^ pajahantā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmimaggena samucchindathāti ^a^M0.0048^ea^ attho. anāgāmimaggavajjho eva hi māno idhādhippeto. ^b^mattāse^eb^ti jātimadapurisamadādivasena mānena pamādāpattihetubhūtena mattā attānaṃ paggahetvā carantā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] imesu pana paṭipāṭiyā chasu suttesu gāthāsu vā anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitā. tattha ye ime avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhāti upapattibhavavasena pañca anāgāmino, tesu avihesu upapannā avihā nāma. te antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañcavidhā, tathā atappā, sudassā, sudassino. akaniṭṭhesu pana uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī parihāyati. tattha yo avihādīsu uppajjitvā āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā arahattappattiyā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati, ayaṃ ^b^antarāparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. yo pana avihādīsu ādito pañcakappasatādibhedaṃ āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ ^b^upahaccaparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. yo asaṅkhārena adhimattappayogaṃ akatvā appadukkhena akasirena parinibbāyati, ayaṃ ^b^asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. yo pana sasaṅkhārena adhimattappayogaṃ katvā dukkhena kicchena kasirena parinibbāyati, ayaṃ ^b^sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. itaro pana avihādīsu uddhaṃvāhitabhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ, vaṭṭasotaṃ, maggasotameva vāti uddhaṃsoto. avihādīsu uppajjitvā arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkonto tattha tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī.

[03] ettha ca uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī, na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. kathaṃ? yo avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo ito akaniṭṭhameva gantvā parinibbāyati ^a^V0.0046^ea^ ^a^P1.0052^ea^, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāyati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto, na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāmāti.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0049^ea^ avihesu uppajjitvā kappasatato uddhaṃ parinibbāyiko, dvinnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake parinibbāyiko, pañcakappasate asampatte parinibbāyikoti tayo antarāparinibbāyino. vuttañhetaṃ ``upapannaṃ vā samanantarā appattaṃ vā vemajjha''nti (pu0 pa0 36). vā-saddena hi pattamattopi saṅgahitoti. evaṃ tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī eko uddhaṃsoto. tesu asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañca, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañcāti dasa honti. tathā atappāsudassāsudassīsūti cattāro dasakā cattārīsaṃ akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsotassa abhāvato tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyīti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino cattāro, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino cattāroti aṭṭha, evamete aṭṭhacattārīsaṃ anāgāmino. te sabbepi imesu suttesu avisesavacanena gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sabba^eb^nti anavasesaṃ. anavasesavācako hi ayaṃ sabba-saddo. so yena yena sambandhaṃ gacchati, tassa tassa anavasesataṃ dīpeti; yathā ``sabbaṃ rūpaṃ, sabbā vedanā, sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu dhammesū''ti. so panāyaṃ sabba-saddo sappadesanippadesavisayatāya duvidho. tathā hesa sabbasabbaṃ, padesasabbaṃ, āyatanasabbaṃ, sakkāyasabbanti catūsu visayesu diṭṭhappayogo. tattha ``sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī''tiādīsu (cūḷani0 mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85) sabbasabbasmiṃ āgato. ``sabbesaṃ vo, sāriputtā, subhāsitaṃ pariyāyenā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.345) padesasabbasmiṃ. ``sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, cakkhuñceva rūpañca...pe0.... manañceva dhamme cā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.23-25) ettha ^a^P1.0053^ea^ āyatanasabbasmiṃ. ``sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.1) sakkāyasabbasmiṃ. tattha sabbasabbasmiṃ āgato nippadesavisayo, itaresu tīsupi āgato sappadesavisayo ^a^M0.0050^ea^. idha pana sakkāyasabbasmiṃ veditabbo. vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā tebhūmakadhammā hi idha ``sabba''nti anavasesato gahitā.

[03] ^b^anabhijāna^eb^nti ^a^V0.0047^ea^ ``ime dhammā kusalā, ime akusalā, ime sāvajjā, ime anavajjā''tiādinā ``ime pañcakkhandhā, imāni dvādasāyatanāni, imā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca''nti ca ādinā sabbe abhiññeyye dhamme aviparītasabhāvato anabhijānanto abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena na jānanto. ^b^aparijāna^eb^nti na parijānanto. yo hi sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ parijānāti, so tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti -- ñātapariññāya, tīraṇapariññāya, pahānapariññāya. tattha katamā ñātapariññā? sabbaṃ tebhūmakaṃ nāmarūpaṃ -- ``idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo. idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo''ti bhūtappasādādippabhedaṃ rūpaṃ, phassādippabhedaṃ nāmañca, lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānato vavatthapeti. tassa avijjādikañca paccayaṃ pariggaṇhāti. ayaṃ ñātapariññā. katamā tīraṇapariññā? evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi. ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā. katamā pahānapariññā? evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena sabbasmiṃ chandarāgaṃ pajahati. ayaṃ pahānapariññā.

[03] diṭṭhivisuddhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyopi ñātapariññā. maggāmaggapaṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiyo kalāpasammasanādianulomapariyosānā vā paññā tīraṇapariññā. ariyamaggena pajahanaṃ pahānapariññā. yo sabbaṃ parijānāti, so imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti. idha pana virāgappahānānaṃ paṭikkhepavasena visuṃ gahitattā ñātapariññāya tīraṇapariññāya ca vasena parijānanā veditabbā. yo panevaṃ na parijānāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``aparijāna''nti.

[03] ^b^tattha cittaṃ avirājaya^eb^nti tasmiṃ abhiññeyyavisese pariññeyye ^a^P1.0054^ea^ attano cittasantānaṃ na virājayaṃ, na virajjanto; yathā tattha rāgo na hoti, evaṃ virāgānupassanaṃ na uppādentoti attho. ^b^appajaha^eb^nti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya tattha pahātabbayuttakaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ anavasesato ^a^M0.0051^ea^ na pajahanto. yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ abhijānanādayopi missakamaggavasena veditabbā. pubbabhāge hi nānācittavasena ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi kamena abhijānanādīni sampādetvā maggakāle ekakkhaṇeneva kiccavasena taṃ sabbaṃ nipphādentaṃ ekameva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti. ^b^abhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā^eb^ti nibbānāya sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa khepanāya na bhabbo, nālaṃ na samatthoti attho.

[03] ^b^sabbañca kho^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireke, ^b^kho^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇe. tadubhayena abhijānanādito ^a^V0.0048^ea^ laddhabbaṃ visesaṃ dukkhakkhayassa ca ekantakāraṇaṃ dīpeti. abhijānanādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttameva. tattha pana paṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ, idha vidhānavasena veditabbaṃ. ayameva viseso. apica ^b^abhijāna^eb^nti upādānakkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ sarūpato paccayato ca ñāṇassa abhimukhīkaraṇavasena abhijānanto hutvā abhāvākārādipariggahena taṃ aniccādilakkhaṇehi paricchijjamānavasena parijānanto. ^b^virājaya^eb^nti sammadevassa aniccatādiavabodhena uppannabhayādīnavanibbidādiñāṇānubhāvena attano cittaṃ virattaṃ karonto tattha aṇumattampi rāgaṃ anuppādento. ^b^pajaha^eb^nti vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya samudayapakkhiyaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ pajahanto samucchindanto. ^b^bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā^eb^ti evaṃ kilesamalappahāneneva sabbassa kammavaṭṭassa parikkhīṇattā anavasesavipākavaṭṭakhepanāya sakalasaṃsāravaṭṭadukkhaparikkhayabhūtāya vā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā bhabbo ekantenetaṃ pāpuṇitunti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^yo sabbaṃ sabbato ñatvā^eb^ti yo yuttayogo āraddhavipassako sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ sabbato sabbabhāgena kusalādikkhandhādivibhāgato dukkhādipīḷanādivibhāgato ca. atha vā ^b^sabbato^eb^ti sabbasmā kakkhaḷaphusanādilakkhaṇādito aniccādito cāti sabbākārato jānitvā vipassanāpubbaṅgamena ^a^P1.0055^ea^ maggañāṇena paṭivijjhitvā, vipassanāñāṇeneva vā jānanahetu. ^b^sabbatthesu na rajjatī^eb^ti sabbesu atītādivasena anekabhedabhinnesu sakkāyadhammesu na rajjati, ariyamaggādhigamena rāgaṃ na janeti. imināssa taṇhāgāhassa abhāvaṃ dassento taṃ nimittattā diṭṭhamānaggāhānaṃ ``etaṃ mama esohamasmi, eso me attā''ti imassa micchāgāhattayassapi ^a^M0.0052^ea^ abhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^sa ve^eb^ti ettha ^b^sa^eb^-iti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^ve^eb^-ti byattaṃ, ekaṃsenāti vā etasmiṃ atthe nipāto. ^b^sabbapariññā^eb^ti sabbaparijānanato, yathāvuttassa sabbassa abhisamayavasena parijānanato. ^b^so^eb^ti yathāvutto yogāvacaro, ariyo eva vā. ^b^sabbadukkhamupaccagā^eb^ti sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ accagā atikkami, samatikkamīti attho.
[06] sattamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame apubbaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ mānavasena desanā pavattā. gāthāsu pana ^b^mānupetā ayaṃ pajā^eb^ti kammakilesehi pajāyatīti ^b^pajā^eb^ti laddhanāmā ime sattā maññanalakkhaṇena mānena ^a^V0.0049^ea^ upetā upagatā. ^b^mānaganthā bhave ratā^eb^ti kimikīṭapaṭaṅgādiattabhāvepi mānena ganthitā mānasaṃyojanena saṃyuttā. tato eva dīgharattaṃ paribhāvitāhaṃkāravasena ``etaṃ mamā''ti saṅkhāresu ajjhosānabahulattā tattha niccasukhāttādivipallāsavasena ca kāmādibhave ratā. ^b^mānaṃ aparijānantā^eb^ti mānaṃ tīhi pariññāhi na parijānantā. arahattamaggañāṇena vā anatikkamantā, ``mānaṃ apariññāyā''ti keci paṭhanti. ^b^āgantāro punabbhava^eb^nti puna āyātiṃ upapattibhavaṃ. punappunaṃ bhavanato vā punabbhavasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ aparāparaṃ parivattanavasena gantāro upagantāro honti, bhavato na parimuccantīti attho. ^b^ye ca mānaṃ pahantvāna, vimuttā mānasaṅkhaye^eb^ti ye pana arahattamaggena sabbaso mānaṃ pajahitvā mānassa accantasaṅkhayabhūte arahattaphale nibbāne vā tadekaṭṭhasabbakilesavimuttiyā vimuttā suṭṭhu muttā. ^b^te mānaganthābhibhuno, sabbadukkhamupaccagu^eb^nti ^a^P1.0056^ea^ te parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā arahanto sabbaso mānaganthaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ samucchedappahānena abhibhavitvā ṭhitā, anavasesaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkamiṃsūti attho. evametasmiṃ sattamasutte ca arahattaṃ kathitanti.
[06] aṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 9-10^b^.^eb^ navamadasamesu ^a^M0.0053^ea^ apubbaṃ natthi. desanāvilāsavasena tathā bujjhanakānaṃ veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vā tathā desitānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06] navamadasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 11-13^b^.^eb^ dutiyavaggepi ^a^V0.0050^ea^ paṭhamādīni tīṇi suttāni vuttanayāneva, tathā desanākāraṇampi vuttameva.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthe -- ^b^``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave''^eb^tiādīsu ^b^na^eb^-kāro paṭisedhattho. ^b^aha^eb^nti bhagavā attānaṃ niddisati. ^b^añña^eb^nti idāni vattabbāvijjānīvaraṇato aññaṃ. ^b^ekanīvaraṇampī^eb^ti ekanīvaraṇadhammampi. ^b^samanupassāmī^eb^ti dve samanupassanā -- diṭṭhisamanupassanā ca ñāṇasamanupassanā ca. tattha ``rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī''tiādinā (a0 ni0 4.200; paṭi0 ma0 1.130) āgatā ayaṃ diṭṭhisamanupassanā nāma. ``aniccato samanupassati, no niccato''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 3.35) pana āgatā ayaṃ ñāṇasamanupassanā nāma. idhāpi ñāṇasamanupassanāva adhippetā. ``samanupassāmī''ti ca padassa na-kārena sambandho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``ahaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātena samantacakkhunā sabbadhamme hatthāmalakaṃ viya olokentopi aññaṃ ekanīvaraṇampi na samanupassāmī''ti.

[01] ^b^yena nīvaraṇena nivutā pajā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsarantī^eb^ti yena nīvaraṇakasabhāvattā nīvaraṇena dhammasabhāvaṃ jānituṃ passituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ adatvā ^a^M0.0054^ea^ chādetvā pariyonandhitvā ^a^P1.0057^ea^ ṭhānena andhakārena nivutā sattā anādimatasaṃsāre aparimāṇe kappe mahantesu ceva khuddakesu ca bhavādīsu aparāparuppattivasena sabbato dhāvanti ceva saṃsaranti, ca. ārammaṇantarasaṅkamanavasena vā sandhāvanaṃ, bhavantarasaṅkamanavasena saṃsaraṇaṃ. kilesānaṃ balavabhāvena vā sandhāvanaṃ, dubbalabhāvena saṃsaraṇaṃ. khaṇikamaraṇavasena vā ekajātiyaṃ sandhāvanaṃ, vohāramaraṇavasena anekāsu jātīsu saṃsaraṇaṃ. cittavasena vā sandhāvanaṃ, ``cittamassa vidhāvatī''ti hi vuttaṃ, kammavasena saṃsaraṇaṃ. evaṃ sandhāvanasaṃsaraṇānaṃ viseso veditabbo.

[01] ^b^yathayida^eb^nti ^a^V0.0051^ea^ yathā idaṃ. ya-kāro padasandhikaro, sandhivasena rassattaṃ. ^b^avijjānīvaraṇa^eb^nti ettha pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma, aladdhabbanti attho. taṃ avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā. viparītato kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā. khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, indriyānaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. antavirahite saṃsāre satte javāpetīti vā avijjā, paramatthato vā avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati pavattati, vijjamānesu khandhādīsu na javati, na pavattatīti avijjā. apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannānañca dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā. avijjāva nīvaraṇanti avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^avijjānīvaraṇena hi, bhikkhave, nivutā pajā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsarantī^eb^ti idaṃ purimasseva daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. purimaṃ vā -- ``yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇa''nti evaṃ opammadassanavasena vuttaṃ, idaṃ nīvaraṇānubhāvadassanavasena. kasmā panettha avijjāva evaṃ vuttā, na aññe dhammāti? ādīnavapaṭicchādanena kāmacchandādīnaṃ visesappaccayabhāvato. tathā hi tāya paṭicchāditādīnave visaye kāmacchandādayo pavattanti.

[03] ^b^natthañño^eb^ti ^a^P1.0058^ea^ ādikā gāthā vuttassa avuttassa ca atthassa saṅgaṇhanavasena bhāsitā. tattha ^b^nivutā^eb^ti nivāritā paliguṇṭhitā, paṭicchāditāti attho. ^b^ahoratta^eb^nti divā ceva rattiñca, sabbakālanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^M0.0055^ea^ ^b^mohena āvutā^eb^ti yena pakārena avijjānīvaraṇasaṅkhātena mohena āvutā paṭicchāditā suviññeyyampi ajānantiyo pajā saṃsāre saṃsaranti, tathārūpo añño ekadhammopi ekanīvaraṇampi natthīti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^ye ca mohaṃ pahantvāna, tamokhandhaṃ padālayu^eb^nti ye pana ariyasāvakā pubbabhāge tadaṅgādippahānavasena, heṭṭhimamaggehi vā taṃtaṃmaggavajjhaṃ mohaṃ pajahitvā aggamaggena vajirūpamañāṇena mohasaṅkhātameva tamorāsiṃ padālayiṃsu, anavasesato samucchindiṃsu. ^b^na te puna saṃsarantī^eb^ti te arahanto --
[21] ``khandhānañca paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca.
[22] abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, saṃsāroti pavuccatī''ti.. --

[25] evaṃ vutte imasmiṃ saṃsāre na saṃsaranti na paribbhamanti. kiṃ kāraṇā? ^b^hetu tesaṃ na vijjati^eb^ ^a^V0.0052^ea^, yasmā saṃsārassa hetu mūlakāraṇaṃ avijjā, sā tesaṃ na vijjati, sabbaso natthi samucchinnattāti.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ pañcame yassa vijjati, taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhehi, kammaṃ vā vipākehi, bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāse vā bhavantarādīhi saṃyojetīti ^b^saṃyojanaṃ^eb^. taṇhāyanaṭṭhena ^b^taṇhā,^eb^ tasati sayaṃ paritasati, tasanti vā etāyāti taṇhā. ^b^saññuttā^eb^ti cakkhādīsu abhinivesavatthūsu baddhā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. kāmañcettha avijjāyapi saṃyojanabhāvo taṇhāya ca nīvaraṇabhāvo atthiyeva, tathāpi avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnavehi bhavehi taṇhā satte saṃyojetīti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ purimasutte avijjā nīvaraṇabhāvena, idha ca taṇhā saṃyojanabhāveneva vuttā. kiñca nīvaraṇasaṃyojanappadhānassa ^a^P1.0059^ea^ dassanatthaṃ. yathā hi nīvaraṇabhāvena avijjā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ padhānabhūtā pubbaṅgamā ca, evaṃ saṃyojanabhāvena nesaṃ taṇhāti tadadhīnappadhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ suttadvaye evamete dhammā vuttā. apica visesena avijjā nibbānasukhaṃ nivāretīti ^a^M0.0056^ea^ ``nīvaraṇa''nti vuttā, taṇhā saṃsāradukkhena satte saṃyojetīti ``saṃyojana''nti.

[03] dassanagamanantarāyakaraṇato vā vijjācaraṇavipakkhato dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ. vijjāya hi ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā avijjā nibbānadassanassa aviparītadassanassa ca visesato antarāyakarā, caraṇadhammānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā taṇhā gamanassa sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarāti; evamayaṃ avijjāya nivuto andhīkato taṇhāya saṃvuto baddho assutavā puthujjano andho viya baddho mahākantāraṃ, saṃsārakantāraṃ nātivattati. anatthuppattihetudvayadassanatthampi dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ. avijjāgato hi puggalo bālabhāvena atthaṃ parihāpeti, anatthañca attano karoti, akusalo viya āturo asappāyakiriyāya. jānantopi bālo bālabhāvena atthaṃ parihāpeti, anatthañca karoti jānanto viya rogī asappāyasevī. makkaṭālepopamasuttaṃ cetassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.

[03] paṭiccasamuppādassa mūlakāraṇadassanatthampettha dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ. visesena hi sammohassa balavabhāvato ^a^V0.0053^ea^ avijjākhettaṃ atīto addhā, patthanāya balavabhāvato taṇhākhettaṃ anāgato addhā. tathā hi bālajano sammohabahulo atītamanusocati, tassa avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti sabbaṃ netabbaṃ. patthanābahulo anāgataṃ pajappati, tassa taṇhāpaccayā upādānantiādi sabbaṃ netabbaṃ. teneva tāsaṃ pubbantāharaṇena aparantapaṭisandhānena cassa yathākkamaṃ mūlakāraṇatā dassitāti veditabbanti.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^taṇhādutiyo^eb^ti taṇhāsahāyo. taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṃ appaṭikāradukkhābhibhūtampi sattaṃ assādasandassanavasena sahāyakiccaṃ karontī bhavādīsu anibbindaṃ katvā paribbhamāpeti, tasmā taṇhā purisassa ^a^P1.0060^ea^ ``dutiyā''ti vuttā. nanu ca aññepi kilesādayo bhavābhinibbattiyā paccayāva? saccametaṃ, na pana tathā visesappaccayo yathā taṇhā. tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā ^a^M0.0057^ea^ akusalehi, kāmāvacarādikusalehi ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesappaccayo, yato samudayasaccanti vuccatīti. ^b^itthabhāvaññathābhāva^eb^nti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo. so etassa atthīti itthabhāvaññathābhāvo saṃsāro, taṃ tattha itthabhāvo manussattaṃ, aññathābhāvo tato avasiṭṭhasattāvāsā. itthabhāvo vā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppanno attabhāvo, aññathābhāvo anāgatattabhāvo. evarūpo vā aññopi attabhāvo itthabhāvo, na evarūpo aññathābhāvo. taṃ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ saṃsāraṃ khandhadhātuāyatanapaṭipāṭiṃ nātivattati, na atikkamati.

[03] ^b^etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā, taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhava^eb^nti etaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavaṃ samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ ādīnavaṃ ādīnavato ñatvāti attho. atha vā ^b^etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṃsāranātivattanaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā. ^b^taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhava^eb^nti taṇhañca vuttanayena vaṭṭadukkhassa padhānakāraṇanti ñatvā. ^b^vītataṇho anādāno, sato bhikkhu, paribbaje^eb^ti evaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā taṇhaṃ vigamento aggamaggena sabbaso vītataṇho vigatataṇho, tato eva catūsu upādānesu kassacipi abhāvena āyatiṃ paṭisandhisaṅkhātassa vā ādānassa abhāvena anādāno, sativepullappattiyā sabbattha satokāritāya sato bhinnakileso bhikkhu paribbaje careyya, khandhaparinibbānena vā saṅkhārappavattito apagaccheyyāti attho.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V0.0054^ea^ ^b^sekhassā^eb^ti ettha kenaṭṭhena sekho? sekkhadhammapaṭilābhato sekho. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``kittāvatā ^a^P1.0061^ea^ nu kho, bhante, sekho hotīti? idha, bhikkhu, sekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti...pe0... sekhena sammāsamādhinā ^a^M0.0058^ea^ samannāgato hoti. ettāvatā kho, bhikkhu, sekho hotī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.13).
[03] apica sikkhatīti sekho. vuttampi cetaṃ --

[02] ``sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccati. kiñca sikkhati? adhisīlampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipaññampi sikkhati. sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccatī''ti (a0 ni0 3.86).

[03] yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomappaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati -- ``ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī''ti, sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekhoti. imasmiṃ atthe na paṭivijjhantova sekho adhippeto, atha kho kalyāṇaputhujjanopi. appattaṃ mānasaṃ etenāti ^b^appattamānaso^eb^. ^b^mānasa^eb^nti ``antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.151; mahāva0 33) ettha rāgo mānasanti vutto. ``cittaṃ mano mānasa''nti (dha0 sa0 63, 65) ettha cittaṃ. ``appattamānaso sekho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.159) ettha arahattaṃ. idhāpi arahattameva adhippetaṃ. tena appattārahattassāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^anuttara^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ, asadisanti attho. catūhi yogehi khemaṃ anupaddutanti ^b^yogakkhemaṃ,^eb^ arahattameva adhippetaṃ. ^b^patthayamānassā^eb^ti dve patthanā taṇhāpatthanā, kusalacchandapatthanā ca. ``patthayamānassa hi jappitāni, pavedhitaṃ vāpi pakappitesū''ti (su0 ni0 908; mahāni0 137) ettha taṇhāpatthanā.
[21] ``chinnaṃ ^a^V0.0055^ea^ ^a^P1.0062^ea^ pāpimato sotaṃ, viddhastaṃ vinaḷīkataṃ.
[22] pāmojjabahulā hotha, khemaṃ patthetha bhikkhavo''ti.. (ma0 ni0 1.352).

[03] ettha kattukamyatākusalacchandapatthanā, ayameva idhādhippetā. tena patthayamānassāti taṃ yogakkhemaṃ gantukāmassa tanninnassa tappoṇassa tappabbhārassāti attho. ^b^viharato^eb^ti ekaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harato. atha vā ``sabbe ^a^M0.0059^ea^ saṅkhārā aniccāti adhimuccanto saddhāya viharatī''tiādinā niddesanayena cettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^ajjhattika^eb^nti niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte ajjhatte bhavaṃ ajjhattikaṃ. ^b^aṅga^eb^nti kāraṇaṃ. ^b^iti karitvā^eb^ti evaṃ katvā. ^b^na aññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmī^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ attano santāne samuṭṭhitaṃ kāraṇanti katvā aññaṃ ekakāraṇampi na samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bahūpakāraṃ, ^b^yathayidaṃ yoniso manasikāro^eb^ti upāyamanasikāro, pathamanasikāro, aniccādīsu aniccādinayeneva manasikāro, aniccānulomikena vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro. ayaṃ yoniso manasikāro.

[03] idāni yoniso manasikārassa ānubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi karonto akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yoniso manasi karonto^eb^ti ``idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca''nti catūsu ariyasaccesu yoniso manasikāraṃ pavattento.

[03] tatrāyaṃ atthavibhāvanā -- yadipi idaṃ suttaṃ avisesena sekkhapuggalavasena āgataṃ, catumaggasādhāraṇavasena pana saṅkhepeneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathayissāma. yo catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko yogāvacaro ``taṇhāvajjā ^a^P1.0063^ea^ tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṃ, taṇhā samudayo, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodho, nirodhasampāpako maggo''ti evaṃ pubbe eva ācariyasantike uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno. so aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷho samāno tebhūmake khandhe ``idaṃ dukkha''nti yoniso manasi karoti, upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca. vipassanā hi idha manasikārasīsena vuttā. yā panāyaṃ tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavikā taṇhā, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti yoniso manasi karoti. yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayañca samudayo idaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti na pavattanti, tasmā yadidaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma ^a^V0.0056^ea^, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti yoniso manasi karoti. nirodhasampāpakaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā''ti yoniso manasi karoti, upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.

[03] tatrāyaṃ ^a^M0.0060^ea^ upāyo -- abhiniveso nāma khandhe hoti, na vivaṭṭe, tasmā ayamattho -- ``imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu, āpodhātū''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 2.378) nayena cattāri mahābhūtāni tadanusārena upādārūpāni ca pariggahetvā ``ayaṃ rūpakkhandho''ti vavatthapeti. taṃ vavatthāpayato uppanne tadārammaṇe cittacetasikadhamme ``ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā''ti vavatthapeti. tato ``ime pañcakkhandhā dukkha''nti vavatthapeti. te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti dve bhāgā honti. idañca nāmarūpaṃ sahetu sappaccayaṃ uppajjati, tassa ayaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādiko hetu, ayaṃ āhārādiko paccayoti hetuppaccaye vavatthapeti. so tesaṃ paccayānañca paccayuppannānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā ``ime dhammā ahutvā bhavanti, hutvā nirujjhanti, tasmā aniccā''ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti, ``udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhā''ti dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti, ``avasavattanato anattā''ti anattalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti.

[03] evaṃ tilakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanto udayabbayañāṇuppattiyā uppanne obhāsādike vipassanupakkilese `amaggo'ti udayabbayañāṇameva ``ariyamaggassa upāyabhūto pubbabhāgamaggo''ti maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā ^a^P1.0064^ea^ puna udayabbayañāṇaṃ paṭipāṭiyā bhaṅgañāṇādīni ca uppādento sotāpattimaggādayo pāpuṇāti. tasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati, ekābhisamayena abhisameti. tattha dukkhaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto, samudayaṃ pahānappaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ akusalaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ kusalaṃ bhāveti. ariyamaggo hi nippariyāyato kucchitasalanādiatthena kusalo, tasmiñca bhāvite sabbepi kusalā anavajjabodhipakkhiyadhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti. evaṃ yoniso manasi karonto akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti. tathā hi vuttaṃ -- ``idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karoti, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti yoniso manasi karotī''tiādi (ma0 ni0 1.21). aparampi vuttaṃ ``yoniso manasikārasampannassetaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ -- ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkarissatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.55).

[03] ^b^yoniso^eb^ ^a^V0.0057^ea^ ^a^M0.0061^ea^ ^b^manasikāro^eb^ti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- sikkhati, sikkhāpadāni tassa atthi, sikkhanasīloti vā ^b^sekho^eb^. saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhatīti ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. tassa sekhassa bhikkhuno ^b^uttamatthassa^eb^ arahattassa ^b^pattiyā^eb^ adhigamāya yathā yoniso manasikāro, evaṃ ^b^bahukāro^eb^ bahūpakāro añño koci dhammo natthi. kasmā? yasmā yoniso upāyena manasikāraṃ purakkhatvā ^b^padahaṃ^eb^ catubbidhasammappadhānavasena padahanto, ^b^khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇe^eb^ saṃkilesavaṭṭadukkhassa parikkhayaṃ pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇe adhigaccheyya, tasmā yoniso manasikāro bahukāroti.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^bāhira^eb^nti ajjhattasantānato bahi bhavaṃ. ^b^kalyāṇamittatā^eb^ti yassa sīlādiguṇasampanno aghassa ghātā ^a^P1.0065^ea^, hitassa vidhātā sabbākārena upakārako mitto hoti, so puggalo kalyāṇamitto, tassa bhāvo kalyāṇamittatā. tatrāyaṃ kalyāṇamitto pakatiyā saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno. tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ, tena sammāsambodhihetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitasukhesitaṃ na pariccajati, sīlasampattiyā sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti garu ca bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo, sutasampattiyā khandhāyatanasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādikānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti, cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā attano paresañca hitappaṭipattiyaṃ āraddhavīriyo hoti, satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitassati hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā, samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto hoti samāhito ekaggacitto, paññāsampattiyā aviparītaṃ pajānāti. so ^a^M0.0062^ea^ satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanto paññāya sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā samādhinā tattha abyaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahitato nisedhetvā ekantahite niyojeti. tenevāha --
[21] ``piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo.
[22] gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no cāṭṭhāne niyojako''ti.. (netti0 113).

[03] ^b^kalyāṇamitto^eb^ ^a^V0.0058^ea^, ^b^bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī^eb^ti kalyāṇamitto puggalo kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya kammassakatāñāṇaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ saddhaṃ phātiṃ karoti, saddhājāto upasaṅkamati upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti. taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhati, tena saddhāpaṭilābhena gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajjaṃ anutiṭṭhati, catupārisuddhisīlaṃ sampādeti, yathābalaṃ dhutadhamme samādāya vattati, dasakathāvatthulābhī hoti, āraddhavīriyo viharati upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto, nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggādhigamena ^a^P1.0066^ea^ sabbaṃ akusalaṃ samucchindati, sabbañca kusalaṃ bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gamento vaḍḍheti. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa `yaṃ sīlavā bhavissati, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharissati ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu, bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhissati, sikkhāpadesu'.

[02] ``kalyāṇamittassetaṃ...pe0... kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa `yaṃ yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya...pe0... nibbānāya saṃvattati. seyyathidaṃ -- appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṃsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā...pe0... vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā. evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī'.

[02] ``kalyāṇamittassetaṃ ^a^M0.0063^ea^ ...pe0... kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa `yaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharissati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu'.
[02] ``kalyāṇamittassetaṃ...pe0... kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa `yaṃ paññavā bhavissati, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā'''ti (udā0 31).
[03] evaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhaparimuccananimittaṃ kalyāṇamittatāti veditabbaṃ. tenevāha --
[02] ``mamañhi ^a^V0.0059^ea^, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti, jarādhammā sattā jarāya parimuccantī''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 1.129).
[03] tena vuttaṃ -- ``kalyāṇamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī''ti.

[03] gāthāya ^b^sappatisso^eb^ti patissavasaṅkhātena saha patissenāti sappatisso, kalyāṇamittassa ovādaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchako subbacoti attho. atha vā hitasukhe patiṭṭhāpanena pati isetīti patisso, ovādadāyako. garuādarayogena tena patissena saha vattatīti sappatisso, garūsu garucittīkārabahulo. ^b^sagāravo^eb^ti chabbidhenapi gāravena yutto. ^b^karaṃ mittānaṃ vacana^eb^nti kalyāṇamittānaṃ ovādaṃ karonto yathovādaṃ paṭipajjanto. ^b^sampajāno^eb^ti sattaṭṭhāniyena sampajaññena samannāgato. ^b^patissato^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ ^a^P1.0067^ea^, gametuṃ samatthāya satiyā patissato satokārī. ^b^anupubbenā^eb^ti sīlādivisuddhipaṭipāṭiyā, tattha ca vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā ceva maggapaṭipāṭiyā ca. ^b^sabbasaṃyojanakkhaya^eb^nti kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khepanato sabbasaṃyojanakkhayasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ arahattaṃ, tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānameva vā. ^b^pāpuṇe^eb^ adhigaccheyyāti attho. iti imesu dvīsu suttesu ariyamaggādhigamassa satthārā padhānaṅgaṃ nāma gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
[06] sattamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M0.0064^ea^ ^b^ekadhammo^eb^ti kataroyaṃ suttanikkhepo? aṭṭhuppattiko. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepakathā -- devadatto hi ajātasattuṃ duggahaṇaṃ gāhāpetvā tassa pitaraṃ rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ tena mārāpetvāpi abhimāre payojetvāpi silāpavijjhanena lohituppādakammaṃ katvāpi na tāvatā pākaṭo jāto, nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjetvā pana pākaṭo jāto. atha mahājano ``evarūpampi nāma pāpaṃ gahetvā rājā vicaratī''ti kolāhalaṃ akāsi, mahāghoso ahosi. taṃ sutvā rājā attanā dīyamānāni pañca thālipākasatāni pacchindāpesi, upaṭṭhānampissa nāgamāsi. nāgarāpi kulaṃ upagatassa kaṭacchubhattampissa nādaṃsu. so parihīnalābhasakkāro kohaññena jīvitukāmo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācitvā ``alaṃ, devadatta, yo icchati, so ^a^V0.0060^ea^ āraññiko hotū''tiādinā (pārā0 409; cūḷava0 343) bhagavatā paṭikkhitto tehi pañcahi vatthūhi bālaṃ lūkhappasannaṃ janaṃ saññāpento pañcasate vajjiputtake salākaṃ gāhāpetvā saṅghaṃ bhinditvāva te ādāya gayāsīsaṃ agamāsi. atha dve aggasāvakā satthu āṇāya tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā te ariyaphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ānayiṃsu. ye panassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa laddhiṃ rocetvā tatheva paggayha ṭhitā saṅghe bhijjante bhinne ca samanuññā ahesuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya ahosi ^a^P1.0068^ea^.

[03] devadattopi na cirasseva rogābhibhūto bāḷhagilāno maraṇakāle ``satthāraṃ vandissāmī''ti mañcakasivikāya nīyamāno jetavanapokkharaṇitīre ṭhapito pathaviyā vivare dinne patitvā avīcimhi nibbatti, yojanasatiko cassa attabhāvo ahosi kappaṭṭhiyo tālakkhandhaparimāṇehi ayasūlehi vinividdho. devadattapakkhikāni ca pañcamattāni kulasatāni tassa laddhiyaṃ ṭhitāni saha bandhavehi niraye nibbattāni. ekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ ``āvuso, devadattena saṅghaṃ bhindantena bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata''nti. atha satthā dhammasabhaṃ upagantvā ``kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā''ti pucchitvā ``imāya nāmā''ti vutte saṅghabhede ādīnavaṃ dassento ^a^M0.0065^ea^ imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi. keci pana bhaṇanti ``devadattassa tappakkhikānañca tathā niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā saṅghabhede ādīnavaṃ dassento bhagavā attano ajjhāsayeneva imaṃ suttaṃ desesī''ti.

[03] tattha ^b^ekadhammo^eb^ti eko akusalo mahāsāvajjadhammo. ^b^loke^eb^ti sattaloke. ^b^uppajjamāno uppajjatī^eb^ti ettha bhedasaṃvattanikesu bhaṇḍanādīsu saṅghe uppannesupi ``dhammo adhammo''tiādīsu aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūsu yassa kassaci dīpanavasena voharantesupi tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāventesupi anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi saṅghabhedo uppajjamāno nāma hoti, salākāya pana gāhitāya cattāro vā atirekā vā yadā āveṇikaṃ uddesaṃ vā saṅghakammaṃ vā karonti, tadā saṅghabhedo uppajjati nāma. kate pana tasmiṃ saṅghabhedo uppanno nāma? kammaṃ, uddeso, vohāro, anussāvanā, salākaggāhoti imesu hi pañcasu saṅghassa bhedakāraṇesu kammaṃ vā uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgāti.

[03] ^b^bahujanāhitāyā^eb^tiādīsu 0ṃahājanassa jhānamaggādisampattinivāraṇena ahitāya, saggasampattinivāraṇena asukhāya, apāyūpapattihetubhāvena anatthāya. akusaladhammavasena vā ahitāya, hitamattassapi abhāvā sugatiyampi nibbattanakakāyikacetasikadukkhāya uppajjatīti ^a^V0.0061^ea^ sambandho ^a^P1.0069^ea^. ^b^devamanussāna^eb^nti idaṃ ``bahuno janassā''ti vuttesu ukkaṭṭhapuggalaniddeso. aparo nayo -- ^b^bahujanāhitāyā^eb^ti bahujanassa mahato sattakāyassa ahitatthāya, diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānatthāyāti attho. ^b^asukhāyā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikāsukhatthāya, duvidhadukkhatthāyāti attho. ^b^anatthāyā^eb^ti paramatthapaṭikkhepāya. nibbānañhi paramattho, tato uttariṃ attho natthi. ^b^ahitāyā^eb^ti maggapaṭikkhepāya. nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttariṃ hitaṃ nāma natthi. ^b^dukkhāyā^eb^ti ariyasukhavirādhanena vaṭṭadukkhatāya. ye hi ariyasukhato viraddhā taṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā, te vaṭṭadukkhe paribbhamanti, ariyasukhato ca uttariṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthi. vuttañhetaṃ ``ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko''ti (dī0 ni0 3.355; a0 ni0 5.27).

[03] idāni ^a^M0.0066^ea^ ``saṅghabhedo''ti sarūpato dassetvā tassa ahitādīnaṃ ekantahetubhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^``saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^bhinne^eb^ti nimittatthe bhummaṃ yathā ``adhanānaṃ dhane ananuppadīyamāne''ti (dī0 ni0 3.91), bhedahetūti attho. ^b^aññamaññaṃ bhaṇḍanānī^eb^ti catunnaṃ parisānaṃ tappakkhikānañca ``eso dhammo, neso dhammo''ti aññamaññaṃ vivadanāni. bhaṇḍanañhi kalahassa pubbabhāgo. ^b^paribhāsā^eb^ti ``idañcidañca vo anatthaṃ karissāmā''ti bhayuppādanavasena tajjanā. ^b^parikkhepā^eb^ti jātiādivasena parito khepā, dasahi akkosavatthūhi khuṃsanavambhanā. ^b^pariccajanā^eb^ti ukkhepaniyakammakaraṇādivasena nissāraṇā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ saṅghabhede, tannimitte vā bhaṇḍanādike. ^b^appasannā^eb^ti ratanattayaguṇānaṃ anabhiññā. ^b^na pasīdantī^eb^ti ``dhammacārino samacārino''tiādinā yvāyaṃ bhikkhūsu pasādanākāro, tathā na pasīdanti, tesaṃ vā sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ na maññanti. tathā ca dhamme satthari ca appasannāva honti. ^b^ekaccānaṃ aññathatta^eb^nti puthujjanānaṃ aviruḷhasaddhānaṃ pasādaññathattaṃ.

[03] gāthāyaṃ ^a^P1.0070^ea^ ^b^āpāyiko^eb^tiādīsu apāye nibbattanārahatāya āpāyiko. tatthapi avīcisaṅkhāte mahāniraye uppajjatīti ^b^nerayiko^eb^. ekaṃ antarakappaṃ paripuṇṇameva katvā tattha tiṭṭhatīti ^b^kappaṭṭho^eb^. saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte vagge ratoti ^b^vaggarato^eb^. adhammiyatāya ^b^adhammo^eb^. bhedakaravatthūhi saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte eva ca adhamme ṭhitoti ^b^adhammaṭṭho. yogakkhemā padhaṃsatī^eb^ti yogakkhemato hitato padhaṃsati parihāyati, catūhi vā yogehi anupaddutattā yogakkhemaṃ nāma arahattaṃ nibbānañca, tato panassa dhaṃsane vattabbameva natthi. diṭṭhisīlasāmaññato saṃhataṭṭhena ^b^saṅghaṃ,^eb^ tato eva ekakammādividhānayogena ^b^samaggaṃ^eb^ sahitaṃ. ^b^bhetvānā^eb^ti pubbe vuttalakkhaṇena saṅghabhedena ^a^V0.0062^ea^ bhinditvā. ^b^kappa^eb^nti āyukappaṃ. so panettha antarakappova. ^b^nirayamhī^eb^ti avīcimahānirayamhi.
[06] aṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M0.0067^ea^ ^b^ekadhammo^eb^ti eko kusaladhammo anavajjadhammo. ``ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo''tiādinā sace saṅghe vivādo uppajjeyya, tattha dhammakāmena viññunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ ``ṭhānaṃ kho, panetaṃ vijjati, yadidaṃ vivādo vaḍḍhamāno saṅgharājiyā vā saṅghabhedāya vā saṃvatteyyā''ti. sace taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attanā paggahetvā ṭhito, aggiṃ akkantena viya sahasā tato oramitabbaṃ. atha parehi taṃ paggahitaṃ sayañcetaṃ sakkoti vūpasametuṃ, ussāhajāto hutvā dūrampi gantvā tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ, yathā taṃ vūpasammati. sace pana sayaṃ na sakkoti, so ca vivādo uparūpari vaḍḍhateva, na vūpasammati. ye tattha patirūpā sikkhākāmā sabrahmacārino, te ussāhetvā yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yathā vūpasammati, tathā vūpasametabbaṃ. evaṃ vūpasamentassa yo saṅghasāmaggikaro kusalo dhammo, ayamettha ekadhammoti adhippeto. so hi ubhatopakkhiyānaṃ dveḷhakajātānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, tesaṃ anuvattanavasena ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ ^a^P1.0071^ea^ tesaṃ ārakkhadevatānaṃ yāvadeva brahmānampi uppajjanārahaṃ ahitaṃ dukkhāvahaṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃ apanetvā mahato puññarāsissa kusalābhisandassa hetubhāvato sadevakassa lokassa hitasukhāvaho hoti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāyā''^eb^tiādi. tassattho anantarasutte vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. ^b^saṅghasāmaggī^eb^ti saṅghassa samaggabhāvo bhedābhāvo ekakammatā ekuddesatā ca.

[03] gāthāyaṃ ^b^sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggī^eb^ti sukhassa paccayabhāvato sāmaggī sukhāti vuttā. yathā ``sukho buddhānamuppādo''ti (dha0 pa0 194). ^b^samaggānañcanuggaho^eb^ti samaggānaṃ sāmaggianumodanena anuggaṇhanaṃ sāmaggianurūpaṃ, yathā te sāmaggiṃ na vijahanti, tathā gahaṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ anubalappadānanti attho. ^b^saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvānā^eb^ti bhinnaṃ saṅghaṃ rājipattaṃ vā samaggaṃ sahitaṃ katvā. ^b^kappa^eb^nti āyukappameva. ^b^saggamhi modatī^eb^ti kāmāvacaradevaloke aññe ^a^M0.0068^ea^ deve ^a^V0.0063^ea^ dasahi ṭhānehi abhibhavitvā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanto icchitanipphattiyāva modati pamodati lalati kīḷatīti.
[06] navamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ dasamassa kā uppatti? aṭṭhuppattiyeva. ekadivasaṃ kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ -- ``āvuso, idhekacco bahuṃ puññakammaṃ karoti, ekacco bahuṃ pāpakammaṃ, ekacco ubhayavomissakaṃ karoti. tattha vomissakārino kīdiso abhisamparāyo''ti? atha satthā dhammasabhaṃ upaganvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno taṃ kathaṃ sutvā ``bhikkhave, maraṇāsannakāle saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa duggati pāṭikaṅkhā''ti dassento imāya aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ desesi.

[03] tattha ^b^idhā^eb^ti desāpadese nipāto. svāyaṃ katthaci padesaṃ upādāya vuccati ``idheva tiṭṭhamānassa, devabhūtassa me sato''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.369). katthaci sāsanaṃ upādāya ``idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo idha ^a^P1.0072^ea^ dutiyo samaṇo''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.139; a0 ni0 4.241). katthaci padapūraṇamatte ``idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.30). katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati ``idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 3.61). idhāpi loke eva daṭṭhabbo. ^b^ekacca^eb^nti ekaṃ, aññataranti attho. ^b^puggala^eb^nti sattaṃ. so hi yathāpaccayaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ tabbipākānañca pūraṇato maraṇavasena galanato ca puggaloti vuccati. ^b^paduṭṭhacitta^eb^nti padosena āghātena duṭṭhacittaṃ. atha vā ^b^paduṭṭhacitta^eb^nti dosena rāgādinā padūsitacittaṃ. ettha ca ^b^ekacca^eb^nti idaṃ paduṭṭhacittassa puggalassa visesanaṃ. yassa hi paṭisandhidāyakakammaṃ okāsamakāsi, so tathā vutto. yassa ca akusalappavattito cittaṃ nivattetvā kusalavasena otāretuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ āsannamaraṇo. ^b^eva^eb^nti idāni vattabbākāraṃ dasseti. ^b^cetasā^eb^ti attano cittena cetopariyañāṇena. ^b^ceto^eb^ti tassa puggalassa cittaṃ. ^b^pariccā^eb^ti paricchinditvā ^b^pajānāmi^eb^ ^a^M0.0069^ea^. nanu ca yathākammupagañāṇassāyaṃ visayoti? saccametaṃ, tadā pavattamānākusalacittavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^imamhi^eb^ ^a^V0.0064^ea^ ^b^cāyaṃ samaye^eb^ti imasmiṃ kāle, imāyaṃ vā paccayasāmaggiyaṃ, ayaṃ puggalo javanavīthiyā aparabhāge kālaṃ kareyya ceti attho. na hi javanakkhaṇe kālaṃkiriyā atthi. ^b^yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye^eb^ti yathā ābhataṃ kiñci āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ, evaṃ attano kammunā nikkhitto niraye ṭhapito evāti attho. ^b^kāyassa bhedā^eb^ti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. ^b^paraṃ maraṇā^eb^ti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe. atha vā ^b^kāyassa bhedā^eb^ti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. ^b^paraṃ maraṇā^eb^ti cutito uddhaṃ.

[03] ^b^apāya^eb^ntiādi sabbaṃ nirayasseva vevacanaṃ. nirayo hi ayasaṅkhātā sukhā apetoti ^b^apāyo;^eb^ saggamokkhahetubhūtā vā puññasammatā ayā apetotipi apāyo. dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti ^b^duggati;^eb^ dosabahulattā vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatītipi duggati. vivasā nipatanti ettha dukkaṭakammakārino, vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti ^b^vinipāto^eb^. natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirassādaṭṭhena ^b^nirayo^eb^. atha vā apāyaggahaṇena ^a^P1.0073^ea^ tiracchānayoni vuccati. tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā, na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayo. so hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā, na vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipātattā. vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyo. so hi yathāvuttena atthena apāyo ceva duggati ca, sabbasampattisamussayehi vinipatitattā vinipātoti ca vuccati. nirayaggahaṇena avīciādianekappakāro nirayova vuccati. idha pana sabbapadehipi nirayova vutto. ^b^upapajjantī^eb^ti paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.

[03] gāthāsu paṭhamagāthā saṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitā. ^b^ñatvānā^eb^ti pubbakālakiriyā. ñāṇapubbakañhi byākaraṇaṃ. hetuattho vā tvā-saddo yathā ``sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī''ti, jānanahetūti attho ^a^M0.0070^ea^. ^b^buddho, bhikkhūnaṃ santike^eb^ti buddho bhagavā attano santike bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ parato dvīhi gāthāhi vuccamānaṃ atthaṃ byākāsi. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] dasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa ^a^V0.0065^ea^ paṭhame ^b^pasannacitta^eb^nti ratanattayasaddhāya kammaphalasaddhāya ca pasannamānasaṃ. ^b^sugati^eb^nti sundaraṃ gatiṃ, sukhassa vā gatinti sugatiṃ. ^b^sagga^eb^nti rūpādisampattīhi suṭṭhu agganti ^b^saggaṃ. loka^eb^nti lokiyanti ettha puññapāpaphalāni, lujjanaṭṭheneva vā lokaṃ. ettha ca sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati, saggaggahaṇena devagati eva. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^mā, bhikkhave, puññāna^eb^nti ettha ^b^mā^eb^ti paṭisedhe nipāto. ^b^puñña^eb^saddo ``kusalānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ samādānahetu evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī''tiādīsu ^a^P1.0074^ea^ (dī0 ni0 3.380) puññaphale āgato. ``avijjāgatoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo puññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotī''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 2.51) kāmarūpāvacarasucarite. ``puññūpagaṃ bhavati viññāṇa''ntiādīsu sugativisesabhūte upapattibhave. ``tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, puññakiriyavatthūni -- dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu, sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu, bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthū''tiādīsu (itivu0 60; a0 ni0 8.36) kusalacetanāyaṃ. idha pana tebhūmakakusaladhamme veditabbo. ^b^bhāyitthā^eb^ti ettha duvidhaṃ bhayaṃ ñāṇabhayaṃ, sārajjabhayanti. tattha ``yepi te, bhikkhave, devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā ^a^M0.0071^ea^, tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjantī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.33) āgataṃ ñāṇabhayaṃ. ``ahudeva bhayaṃ, ahu chambhitattaṃ, ahu lomahaṃso''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.318) āgataṃ sārajjabhayaṃ. idhāpi sārajjabhayameva. ayañhettha ^a^V0.0066^ea^ attho -- bhikkhave, dīgharattaṃ kāyavacīsaṃyamo vattapaṭivattapūraṇaṃ ekāsanaṃ, ekaseyyaṃ, indriyadamo, dhutadhammehi cittassa niggaho, satisampajaññaṃ, kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena vīriyārambhoti evamādīni yāni bhikkhunā, nirantaraṃ pavattetabbāni puññāni, tehi mā bhāyittha, mā bhayaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjittha, ekaccassa diṭṭhadhammasukhassa uparodhabhayena samparāyikanibbānasukhadāyakehi puññehi mā bhāyitthāti. nissakke hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.

[03] idāni tato abhāyitabbabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^``sukhasseta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^sukha^eb^saddo ``sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo, sukhā virāgatā loke''tiādīsu (dha0 pa0 194) sukhamūle āgato. ``yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkanta''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 3.60) sukhārammaṇe. ``yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, na sukaraṃ akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ yāva sukhā saggā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.255) sukhapaccayaṭṭhāne. ``sukho puññassa uccayo''tiādīsu (dha0 pa0 118) sukhahetumhi. ``diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārā ete dhammā''tiādīsu ^a^P1.0075^ea^ (ma0 ni0 1.82) abyāpajje. ``nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha''ntiādīsu (dha0 pa0 204; ma0 ni0 2.215) nibbāne. ``sukhassa ca pahānā''tiādīsu (cūḷani0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 125) sukhavedanāyaṃ. ``adukkhamasukhaṃ santaṃ, sukhamicceva bhāsita''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 4.253; itivu0 53) upekkhāvedanāyaṃ. ``dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā pariyāyena sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.89) iṭṭhasukhe. ``sukho vipāko puññāna''ntiādīsu (peṭako0 23) sukhavipāke. idhāpi iṭṭhavipāke eva daṭṭhabbo. ^b^iṭṭhassā^eb^tiādīsu esitabbato aniṭṭhapaṭikkhepato ca iṭṭhassa, kamanīyato manasmiñca kamanato pavisanato ^b^kantassa,^eb^ piyāyitabbato santappanato ca ^b^piyassa,^eb^ mānanīyato manassa pavaḍḍhanato ca ^b^manāpassā^eb^ti attho veditabbo. ^b^yadidaṃ puññānī^eb^ti ``puññānī''ti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ, etaṃ sukhassa iṭṭhassa vipākassa adhivacanaṃ nāmaṃ, sukhameva taṃ ^a^M0.0072^ea^ yadidaṃ puññanti phalena kāraṇassa abhedūpacāraṃ vadati. tena katūpacitānaṃ puññānaṃ avassaṃbhāviphalaṃ sutvā appamattena sakkaccaṃ puññāni kātabbānīti puññakiriyāyaṃ niyojeti, ādarañca nesaṃ tattha uppādeti.

[03] idāni attanā sunettakāle katena puññakammena dīgharattaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ bhavantarapaṭicchannaṃ uḷāratamaṃ puññavipākaṃ udāharitvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto ^b^``abhijānāmi kho panāha''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^abhijānāmī^eb^ti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānāmi, paccakkhato bujjhāmi. ^b^dīgharatta^eb^nti cirakālaṃ. ^b^puññāna^eb^nti dānādikusaladhammānaṃ. ^b^satta vassānī^eb^ti satta saṃvaccharāni ^a^V0.0067^ea^. ^b^mettacitta^eb^nti mijjatīti mettā, siniyhatīti attho. mitte bhavā, mittassa vā esā pavattītipi mettā. lakkhaṇādito pana hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā, sattānaṃ manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. byāpādūpasamo etissā sampatti, sinehāsambhavo vipatti. sā etassa atthīti mettacittaṃ. ^b^bhāvetvā^eb^ti mettāsahagataṃ cittaṃ, cittasīsena samādhi vuttoti mettāsamādhiṃ ^a^P1.0076^ea^ mettābrahmavihāraṃ uppādetvā ceva vaḍḍhetvā ca. ^b^satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe^eb^ti satta mahākappe. saṃvaṭṭa-vivaṭṭaggahaṇeneva hi saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyi-vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyinopi gahitā. ^b^imaṃ loka^eb^nti kāmalokaṃ. ^b^saṃvaṭṭamāne suda^eb^nti saṃvaṭṭamāne. ^b^suda^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ vinassamāneti attho. ``saṃvattamāne suda''nti ca paṭhanti. ^b^kappe^eb^ti kāle. kappasīsena hi kālo vutto. kāle khīyamāne kappopi khīyateva. yathāha --
[22] ``kālo ghasati bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā''ti.. (jā0 1.2.190).

[03] ``ābhassarūpago homī''ti vuttattā tejosaṃvaṭṭavasenettha kappavuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^ābhassarūpago^eb^ti tattha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ upagacchāmīti ābhassarūpago homi. ^b^vivaṭṭamāne^eb^ti saṇṭhahamāne, jāyamāneti attho. ^b^suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ upapajjāmī^eb^ti kassaci sattassa tattha nibbattassa abhāvato suññaṃ, yaṃ paṭhamajjhānabhūmisaṅkhātaṃ brahmavimānaṃ ādito nibbattaṃ, taṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upapajjāmi upemi. ^b^brahmā^eb^ti kāmāvacarasattehi seṭṭhaṭṭhena tathā tathā brūhitaguṇatāya brahmavihārato nibbattaṭṭhena ca brahmā. brahmapārisajjabrahmapurohitehi mahanto brahmāti ^b^mahābrahmā^eb^. tato eva te abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā ^a^M0.0073^ea^ ^b^abhibhū^eb^. tehi kenaci guṇena na abhibhūtoti ^b^anabhibhūto^eb^. ^b^aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsavacane nipāto. ^b^daso^eb^ti dassanasīlo, so atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dassanasamattho, abhiññāṇena passitabbaṃ passāmīti attho. sesabrahmānaṃ iddhipādabhāvanābalena attano cittañca mama vase vattemīti ^b^vasavattī^eb^ homīti yojetabbaṃ. tadā kira bodhisatto aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīpi samāno tathā sattahitaṃ attano pāramiparipūraṇañca olokento tāsu eva dvīsu jhānabhūmīsu nikantiṃ uppādetvā mettābrahmavihāravasena aparāparaṃ saṃsari. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``sattavassāni...pe0... vasavattī''^eb^ti.

[03] evaṃ bhagavā rūpāvacarapuññassa vipākamahantataṃ pakāsetvā idāni kāmāvacarapuññassāpi taṃ dassento ^b^``chattiṃsakkhattu''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^sakko ahosi^eb^nti chattiṃsa vāre aññattha anupapajjitvā ^a^P1.0077^ea^ nirantaraṃ sakko devānamindo tāvatiṃsadevarājā ahosi. ^b^rājā ahosi^eb^ntiādīsu ^a^V0.0068^ea^ catūhi acchariyadhammehi catūhi ca saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ rañjetīti ^b^rājā^eb^. cakkaratanaṃ vatteti, catūhi sampatticakkehi vattati, tehi ca paraṃ vatteti, parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti ^b^cakkavattī. rājā^eb^ti cettha sāmaññaṃ, ^b^cakkavattī^eb^ti visesaṃ. dhammena caratīti ^b^dhammiko^eb^. ñāyena samena vattatīti attho. dhammeneva rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti ^b^dhammarājā^eb^. parahitadhammacaraṇena vā ^b^dhammiko^eb^, attahitadhammacaraṇena ^b^dhammarājā^eb^, caturantāya issaroti ^b^cāturanto,^eb^ catusamuddantāya catubbidhadīpavibhūsitāya ca pathaviyā issaroti attho. ajjhattaṃ kopādipaccatthike, bahiddhā ca sabbarājāno adaṇḍena asatthena vijesīti ^b^vijitāvī^eb^. janapade thāvarabhāvaṃ dhuvabhāvaṃ patto, na sakkā kenaci tato cāletuṃ janapado vā tamhi thāvariyappatto anuyutto sakammanirato acalo asampavedhīti ^b^janapadatthāvariyappatto^eb^.

[03] cakkaratanaṃ, hatthiratanaṃ, assaratanaṃ, maṇiratanaṃ, itthiratanaṃ, gahapatiratanaṃ, pariṇāyakaratananti imehi sattahi ratanehi samupetoti ^b^sattaratanasamannāgato^eb^. tesu hi rājā cakkavatti cakkaratanena ajitaṃ jināti, hatthiassaratanehi vijite sukheneva anuvicarati, pariṇāyakaratanena vijitamanurakkhati, sesehi upabhogasukhamanubhavati. paṭhamena cassa ussāhasattiyogo ^a^M0.0074^ea^, pacchimena mantasattiyogo, hatthiassagahapatiratanehi pabhūsattiyogo suparipuṇṇo hoti, itthimaṇiratanehi tividhasattiyogaphalaṃ. so itthimaṇiratanehi paribhogasukhamanubhavati, sesehi upabhogasukhaṃ. visesato cassa purimāni tīṇi adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena sampajjanti, majjhimāni alobhakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena, pacchimamekaṃ amohakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvenāti veditabbaṃ ^b^padesarajjassā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0078^ea^ khuddakarajjassa.

[03] ^b^etadahosī^eb^ti attano sampattiyo paccavekkhantassa pacchime cakkavattikāle etaṃ ``kissa nu kho me idaṃ kammassa phala''ntiādikaṃ ahosi. sabbatthakameva tasmiṃ tasmimpi bhave etadahosiyeva. tatthāyaṃ cakkavattikālavasena yojanā. ^b^evaṃmahiddhiko^eb^ti maṇiratanahatthiratanādippamukhāya kosavāhanasampattiyā janapadatthāvariyappattiyā ca evaṃmahiddhiko. ^b^evaṃmahānubhāvo^eb^ti cakkaratanādisamannāgamena kassacipi pīḷaṃ akarontova sabbarājūhi sirasā sampaṭicchitasāsanavehāsagamanādīhi evaṃ mahānubhāvo. ^b^dānassā^eb^ti annādideyyadhammapariccāgassa. ^b^damassā^eb^ti cakkhādīndriyadamanassa ceva samādhānavasena rāgādikilesadamanassa ca. ^b^saṃyamassā^eb^ti kāyavacīsaṃyamassa. tattha yaṃ samādhānavasena kilesadamanaṃ, taṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññaṃ ^a^V0.0069^ea^, tañca kho mettābrahmavihārabhūtaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. tasmiñca upacārappanābhedena duvidhe yaṃ appanāppattaṃ, tenassa yathāvuttāsu dvīsu jhānabhūmīsu upapatti ahosi. itarena tividhenāpi yathārahaṃ pattacakkavattiādibhāvoti veditabbaṃ.

[03] iti bhagavā attānaṃ kāyasakkhi katvā puññānaṃ vipākamahantataṃ pakāsetvā idāni tamevatthaṃ gāthābandhena dassento ^b^``puññamevā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^puññameva so sikkheyyā^eb^ti yo atthakāmo kulaputto, so puññaphalanibbattanato, attano santānaṃ punanato ca ``puñña''nti laddhanāmaṃ tividhaṃ kusalameva sikkheyya niveseyya upacineyya pasaveyyāti attho. ^b^āyatagga^eb^nti vipulaphalatāya uḷāraphalatāya āyataggaṃ, piyamanāpaphalatāya vā āyatiṃ uttamanti āyataggaṃ, āyena vā yonisomanasikārādippaccayena uḷāratamena agganti āyataggaṃ ^a^M0.0075^ea^. takāro padasandhikaro. atha vā āyena puññaphalena aggaṃ padhānanti āyataggaṃ. tato eva ^b^sukhudrayaṃ^eb^ sukhavipākanti attho.

[03] katamaṃ pana taṃ puññaṃ, kathañca naṃ sikkheyyāti āha ^b^``dānañca samacariyañca, mettacittañca bhāvaye''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^samacariya^eb^nti kāyavisamādīni vajjetvā kāyasamādicaritaṃ ^a^P1.0079^ea^, suvisuddhaṃ sīlanti attho. ^b^bhāvaye^eb^ti attano santāne uppādeyya vaḍḍheyya. ^b^ete dhamme^eb^ti ete dānādike sucaritadhamme. ^b^sukhasamuddaye^eb^ti sukhānisaṃse, ānisaṃsaphalampi nesaṃ sukhamevāti dasseti. ^b^abyāpajjaṃ sukhaṃ loka^eb^nti kāmacchandādibyāpādavirahitattā abyāpajjaṃ niddukkhaṃ, parapīḷābhāve pana vattabbaṃ natthi. jhānasamāpattivasena sukhabahulattā sukhaṃ, ekantasukhañca brahmalokaṃ jhānapuññānaṃ, itarapuññānaṃ pana tadaññaṃ sampattibhavasaṅkhātaṃ sukhaṃ lokaṃ ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ sappañño ^b^upapajjati^eb^ upeti. iti imasmiṃ sutte gāthāsu ca vaṭṭasampatti eva kathitā.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^bhāvito^eb^ti uppādito ca vaḍḍhito ca. ^b^bahulīkato^eb^ti punappunaṃ kato. ^b^attho^eb^ti hitaṃ. tañhi araṇīyato upagantabbato atthoti vuccati. ^b^samadhigayha tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti sammā pariggahetvā avijahitvā vattati. ^b^diṭṭhadhammika^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvo, diṭṭhadhamme bhavaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, idhalokapariyāpannanti attho. ^b^samparāyika^eb^nti dhammavasena samparetabbato ^a^V0.0070^ea^ samparāyo, paraloko, samparāye bhavaṃ samparāyikaṃ, paralokapariyāpannanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ko panesa diṭṭhadhammiko nāma attho, ko vā samparāyikoti? saṅkhepena tāva yaṃ idhalokasukhaṃ, yañcetarahi idhalokasukhāvahaṃ, ayaṃ diṭṭhadhammiko attho. seyyathidaṃ -- gahaṭṭhānaṃ tāva idha yaṃ kiñci vittūpakaraṇaṃ, anākulakammantatā, ārogyasaṃvidhānaṃ, vatthuvisadakiriyāyogavihitāni sippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānāni saṅgahitaparijanatāti evamādi. pabbajitānaṃ pana ye ime jīvitaparikkhārā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā. tesaṃ akicchalābho, tattha ca saṅkhāya paṭisevanā ^a^M0.0076^ea^, saṅkhāya parivajjanā, vatthuvisadakiriyā, appicchatā, santuṭṭhi, paviveko, asaṃsaggoti evamādi. patirūpadesavāsasappurisūpanissayasaddhammassavanayonisomanasikārādayo ^a^P1.0080^ea^ pana ubhayesaṃ sādhāraṇā ubhayānurūpā cāti veditabbā.
[03] ^b^appamādo^eb^ti ettha appamādo pamādappaṭipakkhato veditabbo. ko panesa pamādo nāma? pamajjanākāro. vuttaṃ hetaṃ --

[02] ``tattha katamo pamādo? kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppādanaṃ kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asakkaccakiriyatā asātaccakiriyatā anaṭṭhitakiriyatā olīnavuttitā nikkhittachandatā nikkhittadhuratā anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkammaṃ anadhiṭṭhānaṃ ananuyogopamādo. yo evarūpo pamādo pamajjanā pamajjitattaṃ. ayaṃ vuccati pamādo''ti (vibha0 846).

[03] tasmā vuttappaṭipakkhato appamādo veditabbo. atthato hi so satiyā avippavāso, niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatiyā etaṃ nāmaṃ. apare pana ``satisampajaññayogena pavattā cattāro arūpino khandhā appamādo''ti vadanti.

[03] ``bhāvito bahūlīkato''ti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ panāyaṃ appamādo bhāvetabboti? na appamādabhāvanā nāma visuṃ ekabhāvanā atthi. yā hi kāci puññakiriyā kusalakiriyā, sabbā sā appamādabhāvanātveva veditabbā. visesato pana vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ kāyikavācasikasaṃvarañca ^a^V0.0071^ea^ upādāya sabbā sīlabhāvanā, sabbā samādhibhāvanā, sabbā paññābhāvanā, sabbā kusalabhāvanā, anavajjabhāvanā, appamādabhāvanāti veditabbā. ``appamādo''ti hi idaṃ mahantaṃ atthaṃ dīpeti, mahantaṃ atthaṃ pariggahetvā tiṭṭhati. sakalampi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āharitvā appamādapadassa atthaṃ katvā kathento dhammakathiko ``atitthena pakkhando''ti na vattabbo. kasmā? appamādapadassa mahantabhāvato. tathā hi sammāsambuddho kusinārāyaṃ yamakasālānamantare parinibbānasamaye nipanno abhisambodhito paṭṭhāya pañcacattālīsāya vassesu attanā bhāsitaṃ dhammaṃ ^a^M0.0077^ea^ ekena padena saṅgahetvā dassento -- ``appamādena sampādethā''ti bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi. tathā ca vuttaṃ --

[02] ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0081^ea^, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni, sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gacchanti, hatthipadaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati yadidaṃ mahantaṭṭhena; evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbete appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā, appamādo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.300).

[03] gāthāsu ^b^appamādaṃ pasaṃsantī^eb^ti dānādipuññakiriyāsu appamādaṃ appamajjanaṃ paṇḍitā sappaññā buddhādayo pasaṃsanti, vaṇṇenti thomenti. kasmā? yasmā ^b^appamatto ubho atthe adhigaṇhāti paṇḍito^eb^. ke pana te ubho atthāti āha -- ``diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko''ti, evamettha padayojanā veditabbā. idhāpi ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho^eb^ti gahaṭṭhassa tāva ``anavajjāni kammāni, anākulā ca kammantā''tiādinā nayena vutto kasigorakkhādividhinā laddhabbo attho, pabbajitassa pana avippaṭisārādiattho veditabbo. ^b^yo cattho samparāyiko^eb^ti pana ubhayesampi dhammacariyāva vuttāti veditabbā. ^b^atthābhisamayā^eb^ti duvidhassapi atthassa hitassa paṭilābhā, laddhabbena samiti saṅgati samodhānanti samayo, lābho. samayo eva ^b^abhisamayo,^eb^ abhimukhabhāvena vā samayo abhisamayoti evamettha abhisamayo veditabbo. dhitisampannattā ^b^dhīro^eb^. tatiyena cettha attha-saddena paramatthassa nibbānassāpi saṅgaho veditabbo. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. iti imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭasampatti eva kathitā. gāthāyaṃ pana vivaṭṭassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. tathā hi vuttaṃ --
[21] ``appamādo amatapadaṃ, pamādo maccuno padaṃ.
[22] appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā..
[21] ``evaṃ ^a^V0.0072^ea^ visesato ñatvā, appamādamhi paṇḍitā.
[22] appamāde pamodanti, ariyānaṃ gocare ratā..
[21] ``te ^a^M0.0078^ea^ jhāyino sātatikā, niccaṃ daḷhaparakkamā.
[22] phusanti dhīrā nibbānaṃ, yogakkhemaṃ anuttara''nti.. (dha0 pa0 21-23).
[03] tasmā ^a^P1.0082^ea^ ``atthābhisamayā''ti ettha lokuttaratthavasenapi attho veditabbo.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^ekapuggalassā^eb^ti ettha ^b^puggalo^eb^ti ayaṃ vohārakathā. buddhassa hi bhagavato duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā ca paramatthadesanā cāti. tattha ``puggalo, satto, itthī, puriso, khattiyo, brāhmaṇo, devo, māro''ti evarūpā ^b^sammutidesanā^eb^. ``aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattā, khandhā, dhātu, āyatanā, satipaṭṭhānā''ti evarūpā ^b^paramatthadesanā^eb^. tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā, nesaṃ sammutidesanaṃ deseti. ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā, tesaṃ paramatthadesanaṃ deseti.

[03] tatthāyaṃ upamā -- yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti, tesaṃ damiḷabhāsāya ācikkhati. ye andhakabhāsādīsu aññatarāya, tesaṃ tāya tāya bhāsāya. evaṃ te māṇavakā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti. tattha ācariyo viya buddho bhagavā, tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāve ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni, desabhāsākosallamiva sammutiparamatthakosallaṃ, nānādesabhāsā māṇavakā viya sammutiparamatthavasena paṭivijjhanasamatthā veneyyā, ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā veditabbā. āha cettha --
[21] ``duve saccāni akkhāsi, sambuddho vadataṃ varo.
[22] sammutiṃ paramatthañca, tatiyaṃ nūpalabbhati..
[21] ``saṅketavacanaṃ ^a^M0.0079^ea^ ^a^V0.0073^ea^ saccaṃ, lokasammutikāraṇā.
[22] paramatthavacanaṃ saccaṃ, dhammānaṃ bhūtakāraṇā..
[21] ``tasmā vohārakusalassa, lokanāthassa satthuno.
[22] sammutiṃ voharantassa, musāvādo na jāyatī''ti..

[03] apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti -- hirottappadīpanatthaṃ, kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ, paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ, ^a^P1.0083^ea^, ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ, brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ, pubbenivāsadīpanatthaṃ, dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ, lokasammutiyā appahānatthaṃ, cāti. ``khandhadhātuāyatanāni hiriyanti ottappantī''ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ āpajjati, paṭisattu vā hoti -- ``kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hiriyanti ottappanti nāmā''ti? ``itthī hiriyati ottappati, puriso, khattiyo, brāhmaṇo, devo, māro''ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati, na paṭisattu vā hoti. tasmā bhagavā ^b^hirottappadīpanatthaṃ^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
[03] ``khandhā kammassakā, dhātuyo āyatanānī''ti vuttepi eseva nayo. tasmā ^b^kammassakatādīpanatthampi^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti.

[03] ``veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā, dhātūhi āyatanehī''ti vuttepi eseva nayo. tathā ``khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti, pitaraṃ, arahantaṃ, ruhiruppādakammaṃ, saṅghabhedakammaṃ karonti, dhātuyo āyatanānī''ti vuttepi eseva nayo. ``khandhā mettāyanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī''ti vuttepi eseva nayo. ``khandhā pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti, dhātuyo āyatanānī''ti vuttepi eseva nayo. tasmā bhagavā ^b^paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ pubbenivāsadīpanatthañca^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti.

[03] ``khandhā dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī''ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ āpajjati, paṭisattu vā hoti ``kimidaṃ khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā''ti? ``puggalā paṭiggaṇhantī''ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati, na paṭisattu vā hoti. tasmā bhagavā ^b^dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti.

[03] lokasammutiñca ^a^M0.0080^ea^ ^a^V0.0074^ea^ buddhā bhagavanto na pajahanti, lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti. tasmā bhagavā ^b^lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi^eb^ puggalakathaṃ katheti. so idhāpi lokavohāravasena desetabbamatthaṃ dassento ``ekapuggalassā''tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^ekapuggalassā^eb^ti ekasattassa. ^b^kappa^eb^nti mahākappaṃ. yadipi accantasaṃyoge idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, yattha pana sattānaṃ sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ sambhavati, tassa vasena gahetabbaṃ. ^b^aṭṭhikaṅkalo^eb^ti aṭṭhibhāgo. ``aṭṭhikhalo''tipi ^a^P1.0084^ea^ paṭhanti, aṭṭhisañcayoti attho. ^b^aṭṭhipuñjo^eb^ti aṭṭhisamūho. ^b^aṭṭhirāsī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. keci pana ``kaṭippamāṇato heṭṭhā samūho kaṅkalo nāma, tato upari yāva tālappamāṇaṃ puñjo, tato upari rāsī''ti vadanti. taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. sabbametaṃ samūhasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ vepullasseva upamābhāvena āhaṭattā.

[03] ^b^sace saṃhārako assā^eb^ti avippakiraṇavasena saṃharitvā ṭhapetā koci yadi siyāti parikappanavasena vadati. ^b^sambhatañca na vinasseyyā^eb^ti tathā kenaci sambhatañca taṃ aṭṭhikaṅkalaṃ antaradhānābhāvena pūtibhūtaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇañca ahutvā sace na vinasseyyāti parikappanavaseneva vadati. ayañhettha attho -- bhikkhave, ekassa sattassa kammakilesehi aparāparuppattivasena ekaṃ mahākappaṃ sandhāvantassa saṃsarantassa evaṃ mahāaṭṭhisañcayo bhaveyya, ārohapariṇāhehi yattakoyaṃ vepullapabbato. sace panassa koci saṃharitvā ṭhapetā bhaveyya, sambhatañca taṃ sace avinassantaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti. ayañca nayo nibbutappadīpe viya bhijjanasabhāve kaḷevaranikkheparahite opapātikattabhāve sabbena sabbaṃ anaṭṭhike ca khuddakattabhāve vajjetvā vutto. keci pana ``parikappanavasena imassa nayassa āhaṭattā tesampi yadi siyā aṭṭhikaṅkalo, tenāpi saheva ayaṃ aṭṭhipuñjaparimāṇo vutto''ti vadanti. apare pana ``nayidamevaṃ labbhamānasseva aṭṭhipuñjassa vasena sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā imassa parimāṇassa vuttatā. tasmā vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo''ti.

[03] gāthāsu ^a^M0.0081^ea^ ^b^mahesinā^eb^ti mahante sīlakkhandhādayo esati gavesatīti mahesī, sammāsambuddho. ``iti vuttaṃ mahesinā''ti ca bhagavā ``dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato''tiādīsu viya attānaṃ aññaṃ viya katvā dasseti. ^b^vepullo^eb^ti rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu pañcasu pabbatesu vipulabhāvato vepulloti laddhanāmo. tato eva ^b^mahā,^eb^ ṭhitadisābhāgavasena ^b^uttaro gijjhakūṭassa. giribbaje^eb^ti giribbajapuranāmakassa rājagahassa samīpe.

[03] ettāvatā ^a^V0.0075^ea^ ^a^P1.0085^ea^ bhagavā ``ettakenāpi kālena anupacchinnabhavamūlassa apariññātavatthukassa puthujjanassa ayamīdisī kaṭasivaḍḍhanā''ti vaṭṭe ādīnavaṃ dassetvā idāni yesaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā andhaputhujjanassa evaṃ kaṭasivaḍḍhanā, tāni ariyasaccāni diṭṭhavato ariyapuggalassa ayaṃ natthīti dassento ^b^``yato ca ariyasaccānī''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^yato^eb^ti yadā. ^b^ariyasaccānī^eb^ti araṇīyato ariyāni, avitathabhāvena saccāni cāti ariyasaccāni, ariyabhāvakarāni vā saccāni ariyasaccāni, ariyehi vā buddhādīhi paṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariyasaccāni. atha vā ariyassa saccāni ariyasaccāni. sadevakena hi lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato ariyo bhagavā, tena sayambhuñāṇena diṭṭhattā tassa saccānīti ariyasaccāni. ^b^sammappaññāya passatī^eb^ti sammā hetunā ñāyena vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena passati. ^b^dukkha^eb^ntiādi ariyasaccānaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. tattha anekūpaddavādhiṭṭhānatāya kucchitabhāvato bālajanaparikappitadhuvasubhasukhattavirahena tucchabhāvato ca ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^. dukkhaṃ samuppajjati etenāti ^b^dukkhasamuppādo,^eb^ dukkhasamudayo. dukkhaṃ atikkamati etena ārammaṇappaccayabhūtena, ettha vāti ^b^dukkhassa atikkamo,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. ārakattā kilesehi araṇīyato ca ^b^ariyo^eb^. sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena ^b^aṭṭhaṅgiko^eb^. mārento kilese gacchati, nibbānatthikehi maggīyati, sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti ^b^maggo^eb^. tato eva dukkhassa upasamaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchatīti ^b^dukkhūpasamagāmī^eb^. yato sammappaññāya passatīti sambandho.

[03] ^b^sa^eb^ ^a^M0.0082^ea^ ^b^sattakkhattuṃ paramaṃ, sandhāvitvāna puggalo^eb^ti so evaṃ catusaccadassāvī ariyapuggalo sotāpanno sabbamudindriyo samāno sattavāraparamaṃyeva bhavādīsu aparāparuppattivasena sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā. ekabījī, kolaṃkolo, sattakkhattuparamoti indriyānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena tayo hi sotāpannā. tesu sabbamudindriyassa vasenidaṃ vuttaṃ ``sa sattakkhattuṃ paramaṃ, sandhāvitvānā''ti ^a^P1.0086^ea^. ^b^dukkhassantakaro hotī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro pariyosānakaro hoti. kathaṃ? ^b^sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā^eb^ anupubbena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā niravasesānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khepanāti arahattaphaleneva desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V0.0076^ea^ ^b^ekadhammaṃ atītassā^eb^ti kā uppatti? bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahālābhasakkāro uppajji, titthiyānaṃ parihāyi. te hatalābhasakkārā nippabhā nittejā issāpakatā ciñcamāṇavikaṃ nāma paribbājikaṃ uyyojesuṃ -- ``ehi, tvaṃ bhagini, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhassū''ti. sā bhagavantaṃ catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desentaṃ upagantvā abhūtena abbhācikkhitvā sakkenassā abhūtabhāve pakāsite mahājanena ``dhī kāḷakaṇṇī''ti vihārato nikkaḍḍhāpitā pathaviyā vivare dinne avīcijālānaṃ indhanaṃ hutvāva avīciniraye nibbatti, bhiyyosomattāya titthiyānaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyi. bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ ``āvuso, ciñcamāṇavikā evaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhūtena akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattā''ti. satthā āgantvā ``kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā''ti pucchitvā ``imāya nāmā''ti vutte ``na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi sā maṃ abhūtena akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattāyevā''ti mahāpadumajātakampi vitthāretvā upari dhammaṃ desento imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā ``ekadhammaṃ atītassā''ti idaṃ suttaṃ desesi.

[01] tattha ^b^ekadhamma^eb^nti ekaṃ vacīsaccasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^atītassā^eb^ti yā sā aṭṭha anariyavohāre vajjetvā aṭṭhasu ariyavohāresu patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ``saccaṃ ^a^M0.0083^ea^, bhaṇe, nālika''nti ariyehi ṭhapitā mariyādā, taṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitassa. puriso eva puggaloti ^b^purisapuggalo,^eb^ tassa. ^b^akaraṇīya^eb^nti kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. sampajānamusāvādī hi puggalo kiñci pāpakammaṃ katvā ``idaṃ nāma tayā kata''nti vutte ``na mayā kata''nti ^a^P1.0087^ea^ musāvādeneva pariharissati. evañca paṭipajjanto kiñci pāpakammaṃ karotiyeva, na tattha lajjati saccamariyādāya samatikkantattā. tena vuttaṃ ``katamaṃ ekadhammaṃ, yadidaṃ, bhikkhave, sampajānamusāvādo''ti.

[03] gāthāyaṃ ^b^musāvādissā^eb^ti musā abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ paresaṃ viññāpanavasena vadanasīlassa. yassa dasasu vacanesu ekampi saccaṃ natthi, evarūpe vattabbameva natthi. ^b^jantuno^eb^ti sattassa. satto hi jāyanaṭṭhena ``jantū''ti vuccati. ^b^vitiṇṇaparalokassā^eb^ti vissaṭṭhaparalokassa. īdiso hi manussasampatti devalokasampatti avasāne nibbānasampattīti imā tissopi sampattiyo na passati. ^b^natthi pāpa^eb^nti tassa tādisassa idaṃ nāma pāpaṃ na kattabbanti natthīti.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V0.0077^ea^ ^b^evañce^eb^ti ettha ^b^eva^eb^nti upamākāre nipāto, ^b^ce^eb^ti parikappane. ^b^sattā^eb^ti rūpādīsu sattā visattā. ^b^jāneyyu^eb^nti bujjheyyuṃ. ^b^dānasaṃvibhāgassā^eb^ti yāya hi cetanāya annādideyyadhammaṃ saṃharitvā anukampāpūjāsu aññataravasena paresaṃ dīyati, taṃ dānaṃ. yāya pana attanā paribhuñjitabbabhāvena gahitavatthussa ekadeso saṃvibhajitvā dīyati, ayaṃ saṃvibhāgo. ^b^vipāka^eb^nti phalaṃ. ^b^yathāhaṃ jānāmī^eb^ti yathā ahaṃ jānāmi. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- tiracchānagatassapi dānaṃ datvā attabhāvasate pavattasukhavipaccanavasena sataguṇā dakkhiṇā hotīti evamādinā, bhikkhave, yena pakārena ahaṃ dānassa saṃvibhāgassa ca vipākaṃ kammavipākaṃ ñāṇabalena paccakkhato jānāmi, evaṃ ime sattā yadi jāneyyunti. ^b^na adatvā bhuñjeyyu^eb^nti yaṃ bhuñjitabbayuttakaṃ attano atthi, ^a^M0.0084^ea^ tato paresaṃ na adatvā macchariyacittena ca taṇhālobhavasena ca bhuñjeyyuṃ, datvāva bhuñjeyyuṃ. ^b^na ca nesaṃ maccheramalaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti attano sampattīnaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanalakkhaṇaṃ cittassa pabhassarabhāvadūsakānaṃ upakkilesabhūtānaṃ kaṇhadhammānaṃ aññataraṃ maccheramalaṃ. atha vā yathāvuttamaccherañceva aññampi dānantarāyakaraṃ issālobhadosādimalañca nesaṃ sattānaṃ cittaṃ yathā dānacetanā ^a^P1.0088^ea^ na pavattati, na vā suparisuddhā hoti, evaṃ pariyādāya parito gahetvā abhibhavitvā na tiṭṭheyya. ko hi sammadeva dānaphalaṃ jānanto attano citte maccheramalassa okāsaṃ dadeyya.

[03] ^b^yopi nesaṃ assa carimo ālopo^eb^ti nesaṃ sattānaṃ yo sabbapacchimako ālopo siyā. ^b^carimaṃ kabaḷa^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ime sattā pakatiyā yattakehi ālopehi sayaṃ yāpeyyuṃ, tesu ekameva ālopaṃ attano atthāya ṭhapetvā tadaññe sabbe ālope āgatāgatānaṃ atthikānaṃ datvā yo ṭhapito ālopo assa, so idha carimo ālopo nāma. ^b^tatopi na asaṃvibhajitvā bhuñjeyyuṃ, sace nesaṃ paṭiggāhakā assū^eb^ti nesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭiggāhakā yadi siyuṃ, tatopi yathāvuttacarimālopatopi saṃvibhajitvāva ekadesaṃ datvāva bhuñjeyyuṃ, yathāhaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgassa vipākaṃ paccakkhato jānāmi, evaṃ yadi jāneyyunti. ^b^yasmā ca kho^eb^tiādinā kammaphalassa appaccakkhabhāvato evamete sattā dānasaṃvibhāgesu na pavattantīti yathādhippetamatthaṃ kāraṇena sampaṭipādeti. eteneva tesaṃ tadaññapuññesu ca appaṭipattiyā apuññesu ca paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^yathāvuttaṃ mahesinā^eb^ti mahesinā bhagavatā ``tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā ^a^V0.0078^ea^ pāṭikaṅkhitabbā' tiādinā, idheva vā ``evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyu''ntiādinā yathāvuttaṃ, ñāṇacārena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ cittaṃ ñātanti attho. ^b^vipākaṃ saṃvibhāgassā^eb^ti saṃvibhāgassapi vipākaṃ, ko pana vādo dānassa. ^b^yathā hoti mahapphala^eb^nti yathā so vipāko mahantaṃ phalaṃ hoti, evaṃ ime sattā yadi jāneyyunti sambandho. ^b^vineyya maccheramala^eb^nti macchariyamalaṃ apanetvā kammaphalasaddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya ^a^M0.0085^ea^ ca visesato pasannena cittena yesu kilesehi ārakattā ariyesu sīlādiguṇasampannesu dinnaṃ appakampi dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti, tesu yuttakālena ^b^dajjuṃ^eb^ dadeyyuṃ.

[03] mahapphalabhāvakaraṇato dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti dakkhiṇeyyā, sammāpaṭipannā, tesu ^b^dakkhiṇeyyesu. dakkhiṇaṃ^eb^ paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathā ^a^P1.0089^ea^ taṃ dānaṃ hoti mahādānaṃ, evaṃ datvā. atha vā bahuno annaṃ datvā, kathaṃ pana annaṃ dātabbanti āha ``dakkhiṇeyyesu dakkhiṇa''nti. ^b^ito manussattā^eb^ manussattabhāvato ^b^cutā^eb^ paṭisandhivasena ^b^saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā. kāmakāmino^eb^ti kāmetabbānaṃ uḷārānaṃ devabhogānaṃ paṭiladdharūpavibhavena kammunā upagamane sādhukāritāya kāmakāmino sabbakāmasamaṅgino. ^b^moda^eb^nti yathāruci paricārentīti attho.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^yāni kānicī^eb^ti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. ^b^opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūnī^eb^ti

[03] tesaṃ niyamanaṃ. tattha upadhi vuccanti khandhā, upadhissa karaṇaṃ sīlaṃ etesaṃ, upadhippayojanāni vā ^b^opadhikāni^eb^. sampattibhave attabhāvajanakāni paṭisandhipavattivipākadāyakāni. ^b^puññakiriyavatthūnī^eb^ti puññakiriyā ca tā tesaṃ tesaṃ phalānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni. tāni pana saṅkhepato dānamayaṃ, sīlamayaṃ, bhāvanāmayanti tividhāni honti. tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato tikanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. ^b^mettāya cetovimuttiyā^eb^ti mettābhāvanāvasena paṭiladdhatikacatukkajjhānasamāpattiyā. ``mettā''ti hi vutte upacāropi labbhati appanāpi, ``cetovimuttī''ti pana vutte appanājhānameva labbhati. tañhi nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammato cittassa suṭṭhu vimuttibhāvena cetovimuttīti vuccati. ^b^kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasi^eb^nti mettābrahmavihārassa soḷasabhāgaṃ opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni na agghanti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- mettāya cetovimuttiyā yo vipāko, taṃ soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā ^a^V0.0079^ea^ tato ^a^M0.0086^ea^ ekaṃ puna soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tattha yo ekakoṭṭhāso, na taṃ aññāni opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni agghantīti. ^b^adhiggahetvā^eb^ti abhibhavitvā. ^b^bhāsate^eb^ti upakkilesavisuddhiyā dippati. ^b^tapate^eb^ti tato eva anavasese paṭipakkhadhamme santapati. ^b^virocatī^eb^ti ubhayasampattiyā virocati. mettā hi cetovimutti candālokasaṅkhātā vigatūpakkilesā juṇhā viya dippati, ātapo viya andhakāraṃ paccanīkadhamme vidhamantī ^a^P1.0090^ea^ tapati, osadhitārakā viya vijjotamānā virocati ca.
