[03] keci pana ``sāliādīnaṃ sālibījādīni viya maṇippabhādīnaṃ maṇivaṇṇādayo viya ca akusalānaṃ akusalabhāvasādhako lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭho''ti vadanti. evaṃ sante akusalacittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu tesaṃ hetupaccayabhāvo na siyā. na hi tāni tesaṃ akusalabhāvaṃ sādhenti, na ca paccayā na honti. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo''ti (paṭṭhā0 1.paccayaniddesa.1).

[03] ahetukassa ^a^V0.0159^ea^ ca mohassa akusalabhāvo na siyā akusalabhāvasādhakassa mūlantarassa abhāvato. athāpi siyā lobhādīnaṃ sabhāvasiddho ^a^P2.0002^ea^ akusalādibhāvo, taṃsampayuttānaṃ pana lobhādipaṭibaddhoti. evampi yathā lobhādīnaṃ, evaṃ alobhādīnampi sabhāvasiddho kusalādibhāvoti alobhādayo kusalā eva siyuṃ, na abyākatā, na ca honti. tasmā yathā sampayuttesu, evaṃ mūlesupi kusalādibhāvo pariyesitabbo. yonisomanasikārādiko viya hi kusalabhāvassa, ayonisomanasikārādiko ^a^M0.0173^ea^ akusalabhāvassa kāraṇanti gahetabbaṃ. evaṃ akusalabhāvasādhanavasena lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhaṃ aggahetvā suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanavasena gayhamāne na koci doso. laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā virūḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā, heturahitā pana tilabījakādisevālā viya na suppatiṭṭhitāti hetuādiatthena akusalānaṃ upakārakattā mūlānīti akusalamūlāni. yasmā pana mūlena mutto akusalacittuppādo natthi, tasmā tīhi mūlehi sabbo akusalarāsi pariyādiyitvā dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] tāni akusalamūlāni sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``lobho akusalamūla''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha lobhādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. tattha pana tatiyamaggavajjhā lobhādayo āgatā, idha pana anavasesāti ayameva viseso.

[03] gāthāyaṃ ^b^pāpacetasa^eb^nti akusaladhammasamāyogato lāmakacittaṃ. ^b^hiṃsantī^eb^ti attano pavattikkhaṇe āyatiṃ vipākakkhaṇe ca vibādhenti. ^b^attasambhūtā^eb^ti attani jātā. ^b^tacasāra^eb^nti gaṇṭhitaṃ, veḷunti attho. ^b^samphala^eb^nti attano phalaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- khadirasīsapādayo viya antosāro ahutvā bahisāratāya tacasāranti laddhanāmaṃ veḷuādiṃ yathā attasambhūtameva phalaṃ hiṃsati vināseti, evameva anto sīlādisārarahitaṃ lāmakacittaṃ puggalaṃ attasambhūtāyeva lobhādayo vināsentīti.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P2.0003^ea^ ^b^dhātuyo^eb^ti attano phalassa sabhāvassa ca dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātuyo. yañcettha phalanibbattakaṃ, taṃ attano phalassa sabhāvassa ca, itaraṃ sabhāvasseva dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātu. ^b^rūpadhātū^eb^ti ^a^V0.0160^ea^ rūpabhavo. dhātuyā āgataṭṭhāne bhavena paricchinditabbaṃ, bhavassa āgataṭṭhāne dhātuyā paricchinditabbanti idha bhavena paricchedo kathito. tasmā --

[02] ``katame ^a^M0.0174^ea^ dhammā rūpāvacarā? heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve anto karitvā etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarā''ti (dha0 sa0 1289) --
[25] evaṃ vuttā rūpāvacaradhammā rūpadhātu. ^b^arūpadhātū^eb^ti arūpabhavo. idhāpi bhavena paricchedo kathitoti --

[02] ``katame dhammā arūpāvacarā? heṭṭhato ākāsānañcāyatanūpage deve anto karitvā, uparito nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpage deve anto karitvā, etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā, ime dhammā arūpāvacarā''ti (dha0 sa0 1291) --
[25] evaṃ vuttā arūpāvacaradhammā arūpadhātu. ^b^nirodhadhātū^eb^ti nibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] aparo nayo -- rūpasahitā, rūpapaṭibaddhā, dhammappavatti ^b^rūpadhātu,^eb^ pañcavokārabhavo, ekavokārabhavo ca, tena sakalo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo ca saṅgahito. rūparahitā dhammappavatti ^b^arūpadhātu,^eb^ catuvokārabhavo, tena arūpabhavo saṅgahito. iti dvīhi padehi tayo bhavā sabbā saṃsārappavatti dassitā. tatiyapadena pana asaṅkhatadhātuyeva saṅgahitāti maggaphalāni idha tikavinimuttadhammā nāma jātā. keci pana ``rūpadhātūti rūpasabhāvā dhammā, arūpadhātūti arūpasabhāvā dhammāti padadvayena anavasesato pañcakkhandhā gahitā''ti. ``rūpataṇhāya visayabhūtā dhammā rūpadhātu, arūpataṇhāya visayabhūtā arūpadhātū''ti ca vadanti, taṃ sabbaṃ idha nādhippetaṃ. tasmā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.

[03] gāthāsu ^a^P2.0004^ea^ ^b^rūpadhātuṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti rūpapaṭibaddhadhammapavattiṃ ñātapariññādīhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. ^b^āruppesu asaṇṭhitā^eb^ti arūpāvacaradhammesu bhavarāgavasena bhavadiṭṭhivasena ca na patiṭṭhitā anallīnā. ``arūpesu asaṇṭhitā''ti ca paṭhanti, so eva attho. ettāvatā tebhūmakadhammānaṃ pariññā vuttā. ^b^nirodhe ye vimuccantī^eb^ti ye nibbāne ārammaṇabhūte ^a^V0.0161^ea^ aggamaggaphalavasena ^a^M0.0175^ea^ samucchedapaṭippassaddhīhi anavasesakilesato vimuccanti. ^b^te janā maccuhāyino^eb^ti te khīṇāsavajanā maraṇaṃ samatītā.

[03] evaṃ dhātuttayasamatikkamena amatādhigamaṃ dassetvā ``ayañca paṭipadā mayā gatamaggo ca tumhākaṃ dassito''ti tattha nesaṃ ussāhaṃ janento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^kāyenā^eb^ti nāmakāyena maggaphalehi. ^b^phusayitvā^eb^ti patvā. ^b^nirūpadhi^eb^nti khandhādisabbūpadhirahitaṃ. ^b^upadhippaṭinissagga^eb^nti tesaṃyeva ca upadhīnaṃ paṭinissajjanakāraṇaṃ. nibbānassa hi maggañāṇena sacchikiriyāya sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā hontīti taṃ tesaṃ paṭinissajjanakāraṇaṃ. ^b^sacchikatvā^eb^ti kālena kālaṃ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena attapaccakkhaṃ katvā ^b^anāsavo sammāsambuddho^eb^ tameva ^b^asokaṃ virajaṃ^eb^ nibbānapadaṃ deseti. tasmā tadadhigamāya ussukkaṃ kātabbanti.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^vedanā^eb^ti ārammaṇarasaṃ vediyanti anubhavantīti vedanā. tā vibhāgato dassetuṃ ^b^``sukhā vedanā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sukha^eb^-saddo atthuddhāravasena heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. ^b^dukkha^eb^-saddo ^a^P2.0005^ea^ pana ``jātipi dukkhā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.387; vibha0 190) dukkhavatthusmiṃ āgato. ``yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkanta''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 3.60) dukkhārammaṇe. ``dukkho pāpassa uccayo''tiādīsu (dha0 pa0 117) dukkhapaccaye. ``yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ, yāva dukkhā nirayā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.250) dukkhapaccayaṭṭhāne. ``sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.232; dha0 sa0 165) dukkhavedanāyaṃ. idhāpi dukkhavedanāyameva.

[03] vacanatthato pana sukhayatīti ^b^sukhā^eb^. dukkhayatīti ^b^dukkhā^eb^. na dukkhā na sukhāti ^b^adukkhamasukhā,^eb^ makāro padasandhivasena vutto. tāsu iṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇā sukhā, aniṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇā dukkhā, ubhayaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā adukkhamasukhā. tasmā sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ uppatti pākaṭā, ^a^M0.0176^ea^ na adukkhamasukhāya. yadā hi sukhaṃ uppajjati, sakalasarīraṃ ^a^V0.0162^ea^ bhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ satadhotasappiṃ khādāpentaṃ viya, satapākatelaṃ makkhentaṃ viya, ghaṭasahassena pariḷāhaṃ nibbāpayamānaṃ viya ca ``aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha''nti vācaṃ nicchārayamānameva uppajjati. yadā dukkhaṃ uppajjati, sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ tattaphālaṃ pavesentaṃ viya vilīnatambalohaṃ āsiñcantaṃ viya ca ``aho dukkhaṃ, aho dukkha''nti vippalāpentameva uppajjati. iti sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ uppatti pākaṭā.

[03] adukkhamasukhā pana dubbijānā duddīpanā andhakārā avibhūtā. sā sukhadukkhānaṃ apagame sātāsātapaṭipakkhavasena majjhattākārabhūtā nayato gaṇhantasseva pākaṭā hoti. yathā kiṃ? yathā pubbāparaṃ sapaṃsuke padese upacaritamaggavasena piṭṭhipāsāṇe migena gatamaggo, evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu sukhadukkhānubhavanenapi majjhattārammaṇānubhavanabhāvena viññāyati. majjhattārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇagamanaṃ viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaggahaṇābhāvato ^a^P2.0006^ea^. yañca tatrānubhavanaṃ, sā adukkhamasukhāti.

[03] evamettha sukhadukkhādukkhamasukhabhāvena tidhā vuttāpi katthaci sukhadukkhabhāvena dvidhā vuttā. yathāha -- ``dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā, pariyāyena sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā''ti (ma0 ni0 2.89). katthaci tissopi visuṃ visuṃ sukhadukkhādukkhamasukhabhāvena ``sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā, dukkhā vedanā ṭhitidukkhā vipariṇāmasukhā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā ñāṇasukhā aññāṇadukkhā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.465). katthaci sabbāpi dukkhabhāvena. vuttañhetaṃ ``yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.259).

[03] tattha siyā -- yadi tisso vedanā yathā idha vuttā, aññesu ca edisesu suttesu abhidhamme ca evaṃ avatvā kasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ ``yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī''ti, ``dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā''ti ca? sandhāyabhāsitametaṃ, tasmā sā pariyāyadesanā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[02] ``saṅkhārāniccataṃ, ānanda, mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmataṃ, `yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmi'''nti (saṃ0 ni0 4.259).
[02] ``dvepi ^a^M0.0177^ea^ ^a^V0.0163^ea^ mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā pariyāyenā''ti ca (saṃ0 ni0 4.259).

[03] ettha hi sukhā adukkhamasukhāti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ nippariyāyena dukkhabhāvo natthi, veneyyajjhāsayena pana tattha nicchandadassanatthaṃ pariyāyena dukkhabhāvo vuttoti sā tādisī pariyāyadesanā. ayaṃ pana vedanattayadesanā sabhāvakathāti katvā nippariyāyadesanāti ayamettha ācariyānaṃ samānakathā.

[03] vitaṇḍavādī panāha ``dukkhatādvayavacanato pariyāyadesanāva vedanattayadesanā''ti. so ``mā heva''ntissa vacanīyo, yasmā bhagavatā sabbāsaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvo adhippāyavasena vutto ``saṅkhārāniccataṃ, ānanda, mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmataṃ `yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmi'''nti. yadi panettha vedanattayadesanā pariyāyadesanā siyā, ``idaṃ mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ ^a^P2.0007^ea^ tisso vedanā''ti vattabbaṃ siyā, na panetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] apicāyameva vattabbo ``ko, panāvuso, vedanattayadesanāya adhippāyo''ti? sace vadeyya ``mudukā dukkhā vedanā sukhā, adhimattā dukkhā, majjhimā adukkhamasukhāti veneyyajjhāsayena vuttā. tāsu hi na sattānaṃ sukhādivaḍḍhī''ti. so vattabbo -- ko panāvuso dukkhavedanāya sabhāvo, yena ``sabbā vedanā dukkhā''ti vucceyyuṃ? yadi yāya uppannāya sattā viyogameva icchanti, so dukkhavedanāya sabhāvo. yāya ca pana uppannāya sattā aviyogameva icchanti, yāya na ubhayaṃ icchanti, sā kathaṃ dukkhavedanā siyā? atha yā attano nissayassa upaghātakārī, sā dukkhā. yā anuggahakārī, sā kathaṃ dukkhā siyā. atha pana yadariyā dukkhato passanti, so dukkhavedanāya sabhāvo, saṅkhāradukkhatāya vedanaṃ ariyā dukkhato passanti, sā ca abhiṇhasabhāvāti kathaṃ tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ mudumajjhimādhimattadukkhabhāvo siyā? yadi ca saṅkhāradukkhatāya eva vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvo siyā, ``tisso imā, bhikkhave, dukkhatāyo dukkhadukkhatā, vipariṇāmadukkhatā, saṅkhāradukkhatā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.305) ayaṃ dukkhatānaṃ vibhāgadesanā nippayojanā siyā. tathā ca sati suttameva paṭibāhitaṃ siyā, purimesu ca tīsu rūpāvacarajjhānesu ^a^M0.0178^ea^ mudukā dukkhā vedanāti āpajjati sukhavedanāvacanato. catutthajjhāne arūpajjhānesu ca majjhimā, adukkhamasukhavedanāvacanato. evaṃ sante purimā tisso rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā arūpasamāpattīhi ca santatarāti ^a^V0.0164^ea^ āpajjati. kathaṃ vā santatarappaṇītatarāsu samāpattīsu dukkhavedanāya adhikabhāvo yujjati? tasmā vedanattayadesanāya pariyāyadesanābhāvo na yuttoti.

[03] yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ``dukkhe sukhanti saññāvipallāso''ti (a0 ni0 4.49; paṭi0 ma0 1.236), taṃ kathanti? vipariṇāmadukkhatāya saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca yathābhūtānavabodhena yā ekantato sukhasaññā, yā ca dukkhanimitte sukhanimittasaññā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. evampi ``sukhā, bhikkhave, vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā''ti (itivu0 53) idaṃ pana kathanti? idaṃ ^a^P2.0008^ea^ pana vipariṇāmadassane sanniyojanatthaṃ vuttaṃ tassa tattha virāguppattiyā upāyabhāvato sukhavedanāya bahudukkhānugatabhāvato ca. tathā hi dukkhassa hetubhāvato anekehi dukkhadhammehi anubaddhattā ca paṇḍitā sukhampi dukkhamicceva paṭipannā.

[03] evampi nattheva sukhā vedanā, sukhahetūnaṃ niyamābhāvato. ye hi sukhavedanāya hetusammatā ghāsacchādanādayo, te eva adhimattaṃ akāle ca paṭiseviyamānā dukkhavedanāya hetubhāvamāpajjanti. na ca yeneva hetunā sukhaṃ, teneva dukkhanti yuttaṃ vattuṃ. tasmā na te sukhahetū, dukkhantarāpagame pana aviññūnaṃ sukhasaññā yathā cirataraṃ ṭhānādīriyāpathasamaṅgī hutvā tadaññairiyāpathasamāyoge mahantañca bhāraṃ vahato bhāranikkhepe ceva vūpasame ca, tasmā nattheva sukhanti? tayidaṃ sammadeva sukhahetuṃ apariññāya tassa niyamābhāvaparikappanaṃ. ārammaṇamattameva hi kevalaṃ sukhahetuṃ manasikatvā evaṃ vuttaṃ, ajjhattikasarīrassa avatthāvisesaṃ samuditaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ tadubhayaṃ sukhādihetūti veditabbaṃ. yādisañca tadubhayaṃ sukhavedanāya hetu, tādisaṃ na kadācipi dukkhavedanāya hetu hotīti vavatthitā eva sukhādihetu. yathā nāma tejodhātu sāliyavaḍākasassādīnaṃ yādisamavatthantaraṃ patvā sātamadhurabhāvahetu hoti, na tādisameva patvā kadācipi asātāmadhurabhāvahetu hoti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] dukkhāpagameva ^a^M0.0179^ea^ kadāci sukhavedanantaraṃ upalabbhati. tattha sukheyeva sukhasaññā, na dukkhāpagamamatte yathā addhānagamanaparissamakilantassa sambāhane iriyāpathaparivattane ca, aññathā kālantarepi parissamāpagame tādisī sukhasaññā siyā. dukkhāpagamamatte pana sukhanti parikappanā vedanāvisesassa anupalabbhamānattā. ekanteneva cetaṃ evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, yato paṇītappaṇītāniyeva ārammaṇāni mahatā āyāsena sattā abhipatthayanti, na ca nesaṃ yena kenaci yathāladdhamattena paccayena patikāraṃ kātuṃ sakkā taṇhuppādenāti ^a^V0.0165^ea^. vedanāpaccayā hi ^a^P2.0009^ea^ taṇhāupādi, tathābhāve ca sugandhamadhurasukhasamphassādivatthūnaṃ itarītarabhāvena sukhavisesasaññā jāyamānā katamassa dukkhavisesassa apagamane ghānajivhākāyadvāresu, sotadvāre ca dibbasaṅgītasadisapañcaṅgikatūriyasaddāvadhāraṇe. tasmā na dukkhavedanāyameva dukkhantarāpagame sukhasaññā, nāpi kevale dukkhāpagamamatteti āgamato yuttitopi vavatthitā tisso vedanāti bhagavato vedanattayadesanā nītatthāyeva, na neyyatthāti saññāpetabbaṃ. evañcetaṃ upeti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce, kammaṃ katvā uyyojetabbo ``gaccha yathāsukha''nti.

[03] evametā aññamaññapaṭipakkhasabhāvavavatthitalakkhaṇā eva tisso vedanā bhagavatā desitā. tañca kho vipassanākammikānaṃ yogāvacarānaṃ vedanāmukhena arūpakammaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ. duvidhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ, arūpakammaṭṭhānanti. tattha bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento saṅkhepamanasikāravasena vā vitthāramanasikāravasena vā catudhātuvavatthānādivasena vā katheti. arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana kathento phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā cittavasena vā katheti. ekaccassa hi āpāthagate ārammaṇe āvajjato tattha cittacetasikānaṃ paṭhamābhinipāto phasso taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusanto uppajjamāno pākaṭo hoti, ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī uppajjamānā vedanā pākaṭā hoti, ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vijānantaṃ uppajjamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. iti tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena yathāpākaṭaṃ phassādimukhena tidhā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ katheti.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0180^ea^ yassa phasso pākaṭo hoti, sopi ``na kevalaṃ phassova uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ tadeva ārammaṇaṃ anubhavamānā vedanāpi uppajjati, sañjānamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā cetanāpi, vijānamānaṃ viññāṇampi uppajjatī''ti phassapañcamakeyeva pariggaṇhāti. yassa vedanā pākaṭā hoti, sopi ``na kevalaṃ vedanāva uppajjati, tāya saddhiṃ phusamāno phassopi uppajjati, sañjānamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā cetanāpi ^a^P2.0010^ea^, vijānamānaṃ viññāṇampi uppajjatī''ti phassapañcamakeyeva pariggaṇhāti. yassa viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, sopi ``na kevalaṃ viññāṇameva uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ phusamāno phassopi uppajjati, anubhavamānā vedanāpi, sañjānamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā cetanāpi uppajjatī''ti phassapañcamakeyeva pariggaṇhāti.

[03] so ``ime phassapañcamakā dhammā kiṃnissitā''ti upadhārento ``vatthunissitā''ti pajānāti. vatthu nāma karajakāyo. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``idañca pana me viññāṇaṃ etthasitaṃ etthapaṭibaddha''nti ^a^V0.0166^ea^ (dī0 ni0 1.235; ma0 ni0 2.252). so atthato bhūtā ceva upādārūpāni ca, evamettha vatthu rūpaṃ, phassapañcamakā nāmanti nāmarūpamattameva passati. rūpañcettha rūpakkhandho, nāmaṃ cattāro arūpino khandhāti pañcakkhandhamattaṃ hoti. nāmarūpavinimuttā hi pañcakkhandhā, pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ vā nāmarūpaṃ natthi. so ``ime pañcakkhandhā kiṃhetukā''ti upaparikkhanto ``avijjādihetukā''ti, tato ``paccayo ceva paccayuppannañca idaṃ, añño satto vā puggalo vā natthi, suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattamevā''ti sappaccayanāmarūpavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā ``aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā''ti sammasanto vicarati. so ``ajja ajjā''ti paṭivedhaṃ ākaṅkhamāno tathārūpe samaye utusappāyaṃ, puggalasappāyaṃ, bhojanasappāyaṃ, dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekapallaṅkena nisinnova vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāti. evaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. idha pana bhagavā vedanāvasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento vedanāvasena kathesi. tattha --
[21] ``lakkhaṇañca adhiṭṭhānaṃ, uppatti anusayo tathā.
[22] ṭhānaṃ pavattikālo ca, indriyañca dvidhāditā''ti.. --

[25] idaṃ ^a^M0.0181^ea^ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ -- tattha ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^adhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti phasso. ``phassapaccayā vedanā''ti hi vacanato phasso vedanāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ. tathā hi so vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato niccammagāvīupamāya ^a^P2.0011^ea^ upamito. tattha sukhavedanīyo phasso sukhāya vedanāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ, dukkhavedanīyo phasso dukkhāya vedanāya, adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya adhiṭṭhānaṃ, āsannakāraṇanti attho. vedanā kassa padaṭṭhānaṃ? ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā''ti vacanato taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ abhipatthanīyabhāvato. sukhā vedanā tāva taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ hotu, itarā pana kathanti? vuccate sukhasamaṅgīpi tāva taṃsadisaṃ tato vā uttaritaraṃ sukhaṃ abhipattheti, kimaṅga pana dukkhasamaṅgībhūto. adukkhamasukhā ca santabhāvena sukhamicceva vuccatīti tissopi vedanā taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03] ^b^uppattī^eb^ti uppattikāraṇaṃ. iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtā hi sattasaṅkhārā sukhavedanāya uppattikāraṇaṃ, te eva aniṭṭhārammaṇabhūtā dukkhavedanāya, majjhattārammaṇabhūtā adukkhamasukhāya. vipākato tadākāraggahaṇato cettha iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā veditabbā.
[03] ^b^anusayo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0167^ea^ imāsu tīsu vedanāsu sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayo anuseti. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``sukhāya kho, āvuso visākha, vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī''tiādi (ma0 ni0 1.465).

[03] diṭṭhimānānusayā cettha rāgapakkhiyā kātabbā. sukhābhinandanena hi diṭṭhigatikā ``sassata''ntiādinā sakkāye abhinivisanti, mānajātikā ca mānaṃ jappenti ``seyyohamasmī''tiādinā. vicikicchānusayo pana avijjāpakkhiko kātabbo. tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge (vibha0 288-289) ``vedanāpaccayā vicikicchā''ti. anusayānañca tattha tattha santāne appahīnabhāvena thāmagamanaṃ. tasmā ``sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī''ti maggena appahīnattā anurūpakāraṇalābhe uppajjanāraho rāgo, tattha sayito viya hotīti attho. esa nayo sesesupi.

[03] ^b^ṭhāna^eb^nti ^a^M0.0182^ea^ kāyo cittañca vedanāya ṭhānaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyasamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ (dha0 sa0 449). yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ ^a^P2.0012^ea^ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayita''nti (dha0 sa0 471) ca.
[03] ^b^pavattikālo^eb^ti pavattikkhaṇo, pavattanākalanañca. pavattikkhaṇena hi sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ sukhadukkhabhāvo vavatthito. yathāha --
[02] ``sukhā kho, āvuso visākha, vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā, dukkhā kho, āvuso visākha, vedanā ṭhitidukkhā vipariṇāmasukhā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.465).

[03] sukhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo sukhaṃ, natthibhāvo dukkhaṃ. dukkhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo dukkhaṃ, natthibhāvo sukhanti attho. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya pavattanākalanaṃ pavattiyā ākalanaṃ anākalanañca jānanaṃ ajānanañca sukhadukkhabhāvavavatthānaṃ. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[02] ``adukkhamasukhā ^a^V0.0168^ea^ kho, āvuso visākha, vedanā ñāṇasukhā aññāṇadukkhā''ti.

[03] ^b^indriya^eb^nti etā hi sukhādayo tisso vedanā sukhindriyaṃ, dukkhindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, domanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyanti adhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyato pañcadhā vibhattā. kāyikañhi sātaṃ sukhindriyanti vuttaṃ, asātaṃ dukkhindriyanti. mānasaṃ pana sātaṃ somanassindriyanti vuttaṃ, asātaṃ domanassindriyanti. duvidhampi neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ upekkhindriyanti. kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ -- yathā kāyikacetasikā sukhadukkhavedanā ``sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ, dukkhindriyaṃ domanassindriya''nti vibhajitvā vuttā, na evaṃ adukkhamasukhāti? bhedābhāvato. yatheva hi anuggahasabhāvā bādhakasabhāvā ca sukhadukkhavedanā aññathā kāyassa anuggahaṃ bādhakañca karonti, cittassa ca aññathā, na evaṃ adukkhamasukhā, tasmā bhedābhāvato vibhajitvā na vuttā.

[03] ^b^dvidhāditā^eb^ti sabbāpi hi vedanā vedayitaṭṭhena ekavidhāpi nissayabhedena duvidhā -- kāyikā cetasikāti, sukhā, dukkhā, adukkhamasukhāti tividhā, catuyonivasena ^a^M0.0183^ea^ catubbidhā, indriyavasena, gativasena ca pañcavidhā, dvāravasena ca ārammaṇavasena ca chabbidhā, sattaviññāṇadhātuyogena sattavidhā, aṭṭhalokadhammapaccayatāya aṭṭhavidhā, sukhādīnaṃ paccekaṃ atītādivibhāgena navavidhā, tā eva ajjhattabahiddhābhedena aṭṭhārasavidhā, tathā rūpādīsu ^a^P2.0013^ea^ chasu ārammaṇesu ekekasmiṃ sukhādivasena tisso tisso katvā. rūpārammaṇasmiñhi sukhāpi uppajjati, dukkhāpi, adukkhamasukhāpi, evaṃ itaresupi. atha vā aṭṭhārasamanopavicāravasena aṭṭhārasa. vuttañhi --

[02] ``cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā somanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ rūpaṃ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ, upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṃ rūpaṃ upavicarati, sotena saddaṃ...pe0... manasā dhammaṃ viññāya somanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ dhammaṃ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ, upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṃ dhammaṃ upavicaratī''ti (a0 ni0 3.62).

[03] evaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhā honti. tathā cha gehassitāni somanassāni, cha gehassitāni domanassāni, cha gehassitā upekkhā, tathā nekkhammassitā somanassādayoti evaṃ chattiṃsavidhā ^a^V0.0169^ea^. atīte chattiṃsa, anāgate chattiṃsa, paccuppanne chattiṃsāti aṭṭhuttarasatampi bhavanti. evamettha dvidhāditā veditabbāti.
[06] pakiṇṇakakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^samāhito^eb^ti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā samāhito. tena samathabhāvanānuyogaṃ dasseti. ^b^sampajāno^eb^ti sātthakasampajaññādinā catubbidhena sampajaññena sampajāno. tena vipassanānuyogaṃ dasseti. ^b^sato^eb^ti satokārī. tena samathavipassanānayena dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. tena samannāgatattaṃ dasseti. ^b^vedanā ca pajānātī^eb^ti ``imā vedanā, ettakā vedanā''ti sabhāvato vibhāgato ``aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā''ti aniccādilakkhaṇato ca pubbabhāge tīhi pariññāhi parijānanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggena pariññāpaṭivedhena pajānāti. ^b^vedanānañca sambhava^eb^nti samudayasaccaṃ. ^b^yattha cetā nirujjhantī^eb^ti ettāvatā vedanā yattha nirujjhanti, taṃ nirodhasaccaṃ. ^b^khayagāmina^eb^nti vedanānaṃ khayagāminaṃ ariyamaggañca pajānātīti sambandho. ^b^vedanānaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0014^ea^ ^b^khayā^eb^ti evaṃ cattāri saccāni ^a^M0.0184^ea^ paṭivijjhantena ariyamaggena vedanānaṃ anuppādanirodhā. ^b^nicchāto parinibbuto^eb^ti nittaṇho, pahīnataṇho, kilesaparinibbānena, khandhaparinibbānena ca parinibbuto hoti.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^dukkhato daṭṭhabbā^eb^ti sukhavedanā vipariṇāmadukkhavasena dukkhāti ñāṇacakkhunā passitabbā. ^b^sallato daṭṭhabbā^eb^ti dunnīharaṇaṭṭhena antotudanaṭṭhena pīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhadukkhabhāvena dukkhavedanā sallanti passitabbā. ^b^aniccato^eb^ti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikato niccapaṭipakkhato ca adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccāti passitabbā. kāmañcettha sabbāpi vedanā aniccato passitabbā, aniccadassanato pana sātisayaṃ virāganimittaṃ dukkhadassananti imamatthaṃ dassento satthā ``sukhā, bhikkhave, vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā, dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā''ti āha. atha vā yattha puthujjanā sukhābhinivesino, tattha nibbedajananatthaṃ tathā vuttaṃ. tenassā saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhabhāvo dassito. yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhanti vipariṇāmadukkhatāya ``sukhā, bhikkhave, vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā''ti ^a^V0.0170^ea^ vatvā ``sukhāpi tāva edisī, dukkhā nu kho kīdisī''ti cintentānaṃ dukkhadukkhatāya ``dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā''ti āha, itarā pana saṅkhāradukkhatāya eva dukkhāti dassento ``adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā''ti avoca.

[03] ettha ca ``sukhā vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā''ti etena rāgassa samugghātanūpāyo dassito. sukhavedanāya hi rāgānusayo anuseti. ``dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā''ti etena dosassa samugghātanūpāyo dassito. dukkhavedanāya hi paṭighānusayo anuseti. ``adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā''ti etena mohassa samugghātanūpāyo dassito. adukkhamasukhavedanāya hi avijjānusayo anuseti.

[03] tathā ^a^M0.0185^ea^ paṭhamena taṇhāsaṃkilesassa ^a^P2.0015^ea^ pahānaṃ dassitaṃ tassa sukhassādahetukattā, dutiyena duccaritasaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ. yathābhūtañhi dukkhaṃ aparijānantā tassa pariharaṇatthaṃ duccaritaṃ caranti. tatiyena diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ aniccato passantassa diṭṭhisaṃkilesābhāvato avijjānimittattā diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa, avijjānimittañca adukkhamasukhā vedanā. paṭhamena vā vipariṇāmadukkhapariññā, dutiyena dukkhadukkhapariññā, tatiyena saṅkhāradukkhapariññā. paṭhamena vā iṭṭhārammaṇapariññā, dutiyena aniṭṭhārammaṇapariññā, tatiyena majjhattārammaṇapariññā. virattesu hi tadārammaṇadhammesu ārammaṇānipi virattāneva hontīti. paṭhamena vā rāgappahānaparikittanena dukkhānupassanāya appaṇihitavimokkho dīpito hoti, dutiyena dosappahānaparikittanena aniccānupassanāya animittavimokkho, tatiyena mohappahānaparikittanena anattānupassanāya suññatavimokkho dīpito hotīti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ti yadā, yasmā vā. ^b^ariyo^eb^ti kilesehi ārakā ṭhito parisuddho. ^b^sammaddaso^eb^ti sabbāsaṃ vedanānaṃ catunnampi vā saccānaṃ aviparītadassāvī. ^b^acchecchi taṇha^eb^nti vedanāmūlakaṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggena chindi, anavasesato samucchindi. ^b^vivattayi saṃyojana^eb^nti dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ parivattayi, nimmūlamakāsi. ^b^sammā^eb^ti hetunā kāraṇena. ^b^mānābhisamayā^eb^ti mānassa dassanābhisamayā, pahānābhisamayā vā. arahattamaggo hi kiccavasena mānaṃ passati, ayamassa dassanābhisamayo. tena diṭṭho pana so tāvadeva pahīyati diṭṭhavisena diṭṭhasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ viya, ayamassa pahānābhisamayo. ^b^antamakāsi dukkhassā^eb^ti evaṃ arahattamaggena mānassa diṭṭhattā pahīnattā ca sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa koṭisaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi, antimasamussayamattāvasesaṃ dukkhamakāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] gāthāsu ^a^V0.0171^ea^ ^b^yo^eb^ti yo ariyasāvako. ^b^addā^eb^ti addasa, sukhavedanaṃ dukkhato passīti attho. sukhavedanā ^a^P2.0016^ea^ hi visamissaṃ viya bhojanaṃ paribhogakāle assādaṃ dadamānā vipariṇāmakāle dukkhāyevāti. ^b^dukkhamaddakkhi sallato^eb^ti yathā sallaṃ sarīraṃ anupavisantampi paviṭṭhampi uddhariyamānampi pīḷameva janeti, evaṃ dukkhavedanā uppajjamānāpi ṭhitippattāpi bhijjamānāpi vibādhatiyevāti taṃ sallato vipassīti vuttaṃ. ^b^addakkhi^eb^ ^a^M0.0186^ea^ ^b^naṃ aniccato^eb^ti sukhadukkhato santasabhāvatāya santatarajātikampi naṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ aniccantikatāya aniccato passi.

[03] ^b^sa ve sammaddaso^eb^ti so evaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ sammadeva dukkhādito dassāvī. ^b^yato^eb^ti yasmā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti vedanāyaṃ. ^b^vimuccatī^eb^ti samucchedavimuttivasena vimuccati. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yasmā sukhādīni dukkhādito addasa, tasmā tattha vedanāya tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena samucchedavasena vimuccati. yaṃsadde hi vutte taṃsaddo āharitvā vattabbo. atha vā ^b^yato^eb^ti kāyavācācittehi saṃyato yatatto, yatati padahatīti vā yato, āyatatīti attho. ^b^abhiññāvosito^eb^ti vedanāmukhena catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā chaṭṭhābhiññāya pariyosito katakicco. ^b^santo^eb^ti rāgādikilesavūpasamena santo. ^b^yogātigo^eb^ti kāmayogādiṃ catubbidhampi yogaṃ atikkanto. ubhayahitamunanato ^b^munī^eb^ti.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^esanā^eb^ti gavesanā pariyesanā magganā. tā vibhāgato dassetuṃ ^b^``kāmesanā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kāmesanā^eb^ti kāmānaṃ esanā, kāmasaṅkhātā vā esanā kāmesanā. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``tattha katamā kāmesanā? yo kāmesu kāmacchando, kāmarāgo, kāmanandī, kāmasneho ^a^P2.0017^ea^, kāmapipāsā, kāmamucchā, kāmajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati kāmesanā''ti (vibha0 919).
[03] tasmā kāmarāgo kāmesanāti veditabbo. ^b^bhavesanāyapi^eb^ eseva nayo. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[02] ``tattha ^a^V0.0172^ea^ katamā bhavesanā? yo bhavesu bhavacchando...pe0... bhavajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā''ti (vibha0 919).
[03] tasmā bhavesanarāgo rūpārūpabhavapatthanā bhavesanāti veditabbā. brahmacariyassa esanā ^b^brahmacariyesanā^eb^. yathāha --

[02] ``tattha ^a^M0.0187^ea^ katamā brahmacariyesanā? sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā''ti (vibha0 919).

[03] tasmā diṭṭhigatasammatassa brahmacariyassa esanā diṭṭhibrahmacariyesanāti veditabbāti. ettāvatā rāgadiṭṭhiyo esanāti dassitā honti. na kevalañca rāgadiṭṭhiyova esanā, tadekaṭṭhaṃ kammampi. vuttampi cetaṃ --

[02] ``tattha katamā kāmesanā? kāmarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati kāmesanā. tattha katamā bhavesanā? bhavarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā. tattha katamā brahmacariyesanā? antaggāhikā diṭṭhi tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā''ti (vibha0 919) --
[25] evametā tisso esanā veditabbā.

[03] gāthāsu sambhavanti ettha esanānaṃ uppattihetubhūtā avijjādayo taṇhā cāti ^b^sambhavo,^eb^ samudayoti attho. ^b^yattha^eb^ ^a^P2.0018^ea^ ^b^cetā nirujjhantī^eb^ti brahmacariyesanā paṭhamamaggena nirujjhati, kāmesanā ^a^V0.0173^ea^ anāgāmimaggena, bhavesanā arahattamaggena nirujjhatīti veditabbaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M0.0188^ea^ ^b^brahmacariyesanā sahā^eb^ti brahmacariyesanāya saddhiṃ. vibhattilopena hi ayaṃ niddeso, karaṇatthe vā etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ``brahmacariyesanāya saddhiṃ kāmesanā, bhavesanāti tisso esanā''ti. tāsu brahmacariyesanaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``itisaccaparāmāso, diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samussayā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tassattho -- iti evaṃ saccanti parāmāso ^b^itisaccaparāmāso^eb^. idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti diṭṭhiyā pavattiākāraṃ dasseti. diṭṭhiyo eva sabbānatthahetubhāvato ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānā^eb^. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī''ti (a0 ni0 1.310). tā eva ca uparūpari vaḍḍhamānā lobhādikilesasamussayena ca ^b^samussayā,^eb^ ``idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña''nti micchābhinivisamānā sabbānatthahetubhūtā kilesadukkhūpacayahetubhūtā ca diṭṭhiyo brahmacariyesanāti vuttaṃ hoti. etena pavattiākārato nibbattito ca brahmacariyesanā dassitāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^sabbarāgavirattassā^eb^ti sabbehi kāmarāgabhavarāgehi virattassa. tato eva taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimuttattā ^b^taṇhakkhayavimuttino^eb^ arahato. ^b^esanā paṭinissaṭṭhā^eb^ti kāmesanā, bhavesanā ca sabbaso nissaṭṭhā pahīnā. ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatā^eb^ti brahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca paṭhamamaggeneva samugghātitā. ^b^esanānaṃ khayā^eb^ti evametāsaṃ tissannaṃ esanānaṃ khayā anuppādanirodhā bhinnakilesattā. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti ca sabbaso āsābhā vā. ^b^nirāso^eb^ti ca diṭṭhekaṭṭhassa vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallassa pahīnattā ^b^akathaṃkathī^eb^ti ca vuccatīti.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 56-57^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P2.0019^ea^ ^b^kāmāsavo^eb^ti kāmesu āsavo, kāmasaṅkhāto vā āsavo kāmāsavo ^a^V0.0174^ea^, atthato pana kāmarāgo rūpādiabhirati ca kāmāsavo. rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato ^a^M0.0189^ea^ rāgo bhavapatthanā ca ^b^bhavāsavo^eb^. avijjāva ^b^avijjāsavo^eb^.
[03] ^b^āsavānañca sambhava^eb^nti ettha ayonisomanasikāro avijjādayo ca kilesā āsavānaṃ sambhavo. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannā ceva āsavā uppajjanti, uppannā ca āsavā pavaḍḍhantī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.15).
[02] ``avijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anvadeva ahirikaṃ anottappa''nti (itivu0 40) ca.

[03] ^b^maggañca khayagāmina^eb^nti āsavānaṃ khayagāminaṃ ariyamaggañca. tattha kāmāsavo anāgāmimaggena pahīyati, bhavāsavo avijjāsavo ca arahattamaggena. kāmupādānaṃ viya kāmāsavopi aggamaggavajjhoti ca vadanti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. aṭṭhame apubbaṃ natthi.
[06] sattamāṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ navame taṇhāyanaṭṭhena ^b^taṇhā,^eb^ rūpādivisayaṃ tasatīti vā ^b^taṇhā^eb^. idāni taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``kāmataṇhā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo ^b^kāmataṇhā^eb^. rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhavavasena patthanā ca ^b^bhavataṇhā^eb^. ucchedadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo ^b^vibhavataṇhā^eb^. apica pacchimataṇhādvayaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā sabbāpi taṇhā kāmataṇhā eva. yathāha --

[02] ``tattha katamā bhavataṇhā? sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo sārāgo cittassa sārāgo -- ayaṃ vuccati bhavataṇhā. tattha katamā vibhavataṇhā? ucchedadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo sārāgo cittassa sārāgo, ayaṃ vuccati vibhavataṇhā ^a^P2.0020^ea^. avasesā taṇhā kāmataṇhā''ti (vibha0 916).

[03] imā ^a^M0.0190^ea^ ^a^V0.0175^ea^ ca tisso taṇhā rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhāti visayabhedato paccekaṃ chabbidhāti katvā aṭṭhārasa honti. tā ajjhattarūpādīsu aṭṭhārasa, bahiddhārūpādīsu aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa, iti atītā chattiṃsa, anāgatā chattiṃsa, paccuppannā chattiṃsāti vibhāgato aṭṭhasataṃ honti. puna saṅgahe kariyamāne kālabhedaṃ anāmasitvā gayhamānā chattiṃseva honti, rūpādīnaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravibhāge akariyamāne aṭṭhāraseva, rūpādiārammaṇavibhāgamatte gayhamāne chaḷeva, ārammaṇavibhāgampi akatvā gayhamānā tissoyeva hontīti.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^taṇhāyogenā^eb^ti taṇhāsaṅkhātena yogena, kāmayogena, bhavayogena ca. ^b^saṃyuttā^eb^ti sambandhā, bhavādīsu saṃyojitā vā. tenevāha ^b^``rattacittā bhavābhave''^eb^ti. khuddake ceva mahante ca bhave laggacittāti attho. atha vā ^b^bhavo^eb^ti sassatadiṭṭhi, ^b^abhavo^eb^ti ucchedadiṭṭhi. tasmā bhavābhave sassatucchedadiṭṭhīsu sattavisattacittāti. etena bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā ca dassitā. imasmiṃ pakkhe ``taṇhāyogenā''ti iminā kāmataṇhāva dassitāti veditabbā. ^b^te yogayuttā mārassā^eb^ti te evaṃbhūtā puggalā mārassa pāsasaṅkhātena yogena yuttā baddhā. rāgo hi mārayogo mārapāsoti vuccati. yathāha --
[21] ``antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso.
[22] tena taṃ bādhayissāmi, na me samaṇa mokkhasī''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.151; mahāva0 33).

[03] catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā yogakkhemaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahattañca, tassa anadhigamena ^b^ayogakkhemino^eb^. uparūpari kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ jananato ^b^janā,^eb^ pāṇino. rūpādīsu sattā visattāti ^b^sattā^eb^.
[21] ``khandhānañca paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca.
[22] abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, saṃsāroti pavuccatī''ti.. --

[25] evaṃ vuttaṃ khandhādīnaṃ aparāparuppattisaṅkhātaṃ ^b^saṃsāraṃ gacchanti,^eb^ tato na muccanti. kasmā? taṇhāyogayuttattā ^a^P2.0021^ea^. ^b^jātimaraṇagāmino^eb^ punappunaṃ jananamaraṇasseva upagamanasīlāti. ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ ^a^V0.0176^ea^ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ ^a^M0.0191^ea^ ^b^``ye ca taṇhaṃ pahantvānā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. sā heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyāva.
[06] navamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ dasamassa kā uppatti? ekadivasaṃ kira satthā sekkhabahulāya parisāya parivuto nisinno tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā upari visesādhigamāya ussāhaṃ janetuṃ asekkhabhūmiṃ thomento idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi. tattha ^b^atikkammā^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^atikkamma^eb^ atikkamitvā abhibhavitvā. ^b^māradheyyaṃ^eb^ mārassa visayaṃ issariyaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^ādiccova^eb^ yathā ādicco abbhādiupakkilesavimutto attano iddhiyā ānubhāvena tejasāti tīhi guṇehi samannāgato nabhaṃ abbhussakkamāno sabbaṃ ākāsagataṃ tamaṃ atikkamma atikkamitvā abhibhavitvā vidhamitvā ^b^virocati,^eb^ obhāsati, tapati; evameva khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tīhi dhammehi samannāgato sabbupakkilesavimutto māradheyyasaṅkhātaṃ tebhūmakadhammappavattaṃ abhibhavitvā virocatīti.

[03] ^b^asekkhenā^eb^ti ettha sikkhāsu jātāti sekkhā, sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ eteti vā sekkhā, apariyositasikkhattā sayameva sikkhantīti vā sekkhā maggadhammā heṭṭhimaphalattayadhammā ca. aggaphaladhammā pana upari sikkhitabbābhāvena na sekkhāti ^b^asekkhā^eb^. yattha hi sekkhabhāvāsaṅkā atthi, tatthāyaṃ paṭisedhoti lokiyadhammesu nibbāne ca asekkhabhāvānāpatti daṭṭhabbā. sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātā hi sikkhā attano paṭipakkhakilesehi vippayuttā parisuddhā upakkilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvampi anupagamanato sātisayaṃ sikkhāti vattuṃ yuttā, aṭṭhasupi maggaphalesu vijjanti; tasmā catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayadhammā viya arahattaphaladhammāpi ``tāsu sikkhāsu jātā''ti ca, taṃsikkhāsamaṅgino arahato itaresaṃ viya sekkhatte ^a^P2.0022^ea^ sati ``sekkhassa ete''ti ca ``sikkhā sīlaṃ etesa''nti ca sekkhāti āsaṅkā siyunti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ asekkhāti yathāvuttasekkhabhāvappaṭisedhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. arahattaphale pavattamānā hi sikkhā pariniṭṭhitakiccattā ^a^M0.0192^ea^ na sikkhākiccaṃ karonti, kevalaṃ sikkhāphalabhāvena pavattanti. tasmā tā na sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti, nāpi taṃsamaṅgino sekkhavacanaṃ, na ca taṃsampayuttadhammā sikkhanasīlā. ``sikkhāsu jātā''ti evamādiatthehi aggaphaladhammā ^a^V0.0177^ea^ sekkhā na honti. heṭṭhimaphalesu pana sikkhā sakadāgāmimaggavipassanādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvato sikkhākiccaṃ karontīti sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti, taṃsamaṅgino ca sekkhavacanaṃ, taṃsampayuttā dhammā ca sikkhanasīlā. sekkhadhammā yathāvuttehi atthehi sekkhā hontiyeva.

[03] atha vā sekkhāti apariyositasikkhānaṃ vacananti, asekkhāti padaṃ pariyositasikkhānaṃ dassananti na lokiyadhammanibbānānaṃ asekkhabhāvāpatti. vuḍḍhippattā sekkhā asekkhā ca sekkhadhammesu eva kesañci vuḍḍhippattānaṃ asekkhatā āpajjatīti arahattamaggadhammā vuḍḍhippattā. yathāvuttehi ca atthehi sekkhāti katvā asekkhā āpannāti ce? taṃ na, sadisesu tabbohārato. arahattamaggato hi ninnānākaraṇaṃ arahattaphalaṃ ṭhapetvā pariññādikiccakaraṇaṃ vipākabhāvañca, tasmā te eva sekkhā dhammā arahattaphalabhāvaṃ āpannāti sakkā vattuṃ. kusalasukhato ca vipākasukhaṃ santataratāya paṇītataranti vuḍḍhippattāva te dhammā hontīti ``asekkhā''ti vuccanti.

[03] te pana asekkhadhamme khandhavasena idha tidhā vibhajitvā tehi samannāgamena khīṇāsavassa ānubhāvaṃ vibhāvento bhagavā ^b^``asekkhena sīlakkhandhenā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sīla^eb^saddassa attho heṭṭhā vutto. ^b^khandha^eb^saddo pana rāsimhi paññattiyaṃ ruḷhiyaṃ guṇeti bahūsu atthesu diṭṭhappayogo. tathā hi ``asaṅkheyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.51; 6.37) rāsimhi āgato. ``addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 4.241) paññattiyaṃ. ``cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ ^a^P2.0023^ea^ mano manāyatanaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho''tiādīsu (dha0 sa0 63, 65) ruḷhiyaṃ. ``na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā, tīhi ca kho, āvuso ^a^M0.0193^ea^ visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.462) guṇe. idhāpi guṇeyeva daṭṭhabbo. tasmā asekkhena sīlasaṅkhātena guṇenāti attho. ^b^samannāgato^eb^ti sampayutto samaṅgībhūto. samādahati etena, sayaṃ vā samādahati, samādhānameva vāti ^b^samādhi^eb^. pakārehi jānāti yathāsabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhatīti ^b^paññā^eb^. sīlameva khandho ^b^sīlakkhandho^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03] tattha aggaphalabhūtā sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo ca sabhāveneva asekkho sīlakkhandho ^a^V0.0178^ea^ nāma, tathā sammāsamādhi asekkho samādhikkhandho. tadupakārakato pana sammāvāyāmasammāsatiyo samādhikkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. tathā sammādiṭṭhi asekkho paññākkhandho. tadupakārakato sammāsaṅkappo paññākkhandhe saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti evamettha aṭṭhapi arahattaphaladhammā tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassitāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^yassa ete subhāvitā^eb^ti yena arahatā ete sīlādayo asekkhadhammakkhandhā subhāvitā suṭṭhu vaḍḍhitā, so ādiccova virocatīti sambandho. ``yassa cete''tipi paṭhanti. tesañca saddo nipātamattaṃ. evametasmiṃ vagge paṭhamasutte vaṭṭaṃ, pariyosānasutte vivaṭṭaṃ, itaresu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
[06] dasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ dutiyavaggassa ^a^V0.0179^ea^ paṭhame ^b^puññakiriyavatthūnī^eb^ti pujjabhavaphalaṃ nibbattenti, attano santānaṃ punantīti vā puññāni, puññāni ca tāni hetupaccayehi kattabbato kiriyā cāti puññakiriyā. tā eva ca tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ ^a^M0.0194^ea^ vatthubhāvato puññakiriyavatthūni. ^b^dānamaya^eb^nti ^a^P2.0024^ea^ anupacchinnabhavamūlassa anuggahavasena pūjāvasena vā attano deyyadhammassa paresaṃ pariccāgacetanā dīyati etāyāti dānaṃ, dānameva dānamayaṃ. cīvarādīsu hi catūsu paccayesu annādīsu vā dasasu dānavatthūsu rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge pariccāgakāle pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇe cāti tīsu kālesu vuttanayena pavattacetanā dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma.

[03] ^b^sīlamaya^eb^nti niccasīlauposathaniyamādivasena pañca, aṭṭha, dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa sīlapūraṇatthaṃ pabbajissāmīti vihāraṃ gacchantassa pabbajantassa manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ``pabbajito vatamhi sādhu suṭṭhū''ti āvajjentassa saddhāya pātimokkhaṃ paripūrentassa paññāya cīvarādike paccavekkhantassa satiyā āpāthagatesu rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni saṃvarantassa vīriyena ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā sīlatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma.

[03] tathā paṭisambhidāyaṃ (paṭi0 ma0 1.48) vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa sotaṃ, ghānaṃ, jivhaṃ, kāyaṃ, manaṃ. rūpe...pe0... dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ...pe0... manoviññāṇaṃ. cakkhusamphassaṃ...pe0... manosamphassaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ...pe0... manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ. rūpasaññaṃ...pe0... dhammasaññaṃ. jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa yā cetanā, yā ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu pavattā jhānacetanā, yā ca anavajjesu kammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānesu paricayamanasikārādivasena ^a^V0.0180^ea^ pavattā cetanā, sabbā bhāveti etāyāti ^b^bhāvanāmayaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena puññakiriyavatthu cāti.

[03] ekamekañcettha yathārahaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya kāyena karontassa kāyakammaṃ hoti, tadatthaṃ vācaṃ nicchārentassa vacīkammaṃ, kāyaṅgaṃ vācaṅgañca acopetvā manasā cintentassa manokammaṃ. annādīni dentassa ^a^P2.0025^ea^ cāpi ``annadānādīni demī''ti vā dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vā dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti. vattasīse ṭhatvā dadato sīlamayaṃ, khayato ^a^M0.0195^ea^ vayato kammato sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dadato bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.

[03] aparānipi satta puññakiriyavatthūni -- apacitisahagataṃ puññakiriyavatthu veyyāvaccasahagataṃ pattianuppadānaṃ abbhanumodanaṃ desanāmayaṃ savanamayaṃ diṭṭhijugataṃ puññakiriyavatthūti. saraṇagamanampi hi diṭṭhijugateneva saṅgayhati. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.

[03] tattha vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā paccuggamanapattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇābhivādanamaggasampadānādivasena ^b^apacāyanasahagataṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. vuḍḍhatarānaṃ vattapaṭipattikaraṇavasena, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā gāme bhikkhaṃ sampādetvā upasaṃharaṇavasena ``gaccha bhikkhūnaṃ pattaṃ āharā''ti sutvā vegena gantvā pattāharaṇādivasena ca ^b^veyyāvaccasahagataṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. cattāro paccaye datvā pupphagandhādīhi ratanattayassa pūjaṃ katvā aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ puññaṃ katvā ``sabbasattānaṃ patti hotū''ti pariṇāmavasena ^b^pattianuppadānaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. tathā parehi dinnāya pattiyā kevalaṃ vā parehi kataṃ puññaṃ ``sādhu, suṭṭhū''ti anumodanavasena ^b^abbhanumodanaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. attano paguṇadhammaṃ apaccāsīsanto hitajjhāsayena paresaṃ deseti -- idaṃ ^b^desanāmayaṃ^eb^ puññakiriyavatthu nāma. yaṃ pana eko ``evaṃ maṃ dhammakathikoti jānissantī''ti icchāya ṭhatvā lābhasakkārasilokasannissito dhammaṃ deseti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti. ``addhā ayaṃ attahitaparahitānaṃ paṭipajjanūpāyo''ti yonisomanasikārapurecārikahitapharaṇena muducittena dhammaṃ suṇāti, idaṃ ^b^savanamayaṃ^eb^ puññakiriyavatthu hoti. yaṃ paneko ``iti maṃ saddhoti jānissantī''ti suṇāti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti. diṭṭhiyā ujugamanaṃ ^b^diṭṭhijugataṃ,^eb^ ``atthi dinna''ntiādinayappavattassa sammādassanassa etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. idañhi pubbabhāge ^a^P2.0026^ea^ vā pacchābhāge vā ñāṇavippayuttampi ujukaraṇakāle ñāṇasampayuttameva hoti. apare panāhu ``vijānanapajānanavasena dassanaṃ diṭṭhi kusalañca viññāṇaṃ kammassakatāñāṇādi ca sammādassana''nti ^a^V0.0181^ea^. tattha kusalena viññāṇena ñāṇassa anuppādepi attanā katapuññānussaraṇavaṇṇārahavaṇṇanādīnaṃ saṅgaho, kammassakatāñāṇena kammapathasammādiṭṭhiyā ^a^M0.0196^ea^. itaraṃ pana diṭṭhijugataṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇaṃ. yañhi kiñci puññaṃ karontassa diṭṭhiyā ujubhāveneva taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti.

[03] imesaṃ pana sattannaṃ puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ purimehi tīhi dānamayādīhi puññakiriyavatthūhi saṅgaho. tattha hi apacāyanaveyyāvaccāni sīlamaye, pattianuppadānābbhanumodanāni dānamaye, dhammadesanāsavanāni bhāvanāmaye, diṭṭhijugataṃ tīsupi. tenāha bhagavā --
[02] ``tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, puññakiriyavatthūni. katamāni tīṇi? dānamayaṃ...pe0... bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthū''ti (a0 ni0 8.36).

[03] ettha ca aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacetanānaṃ vasena tiṇṇampi puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ pavatti hoti. yathā hi paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ parivattentassa ekacce anusandhiṃ asallakkhentasseva gacchanti, evaṃ paguṇaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa antarantarā ñāṇavippayuttacittenāpi manasikāro pavattati. sabbaṃ taṃ pana mahaggatakusalacetanānaṃ vasena bhāvanāmayameva puññakiriyavatthu hoti, na itarāni. gāthāya attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^cakkhūnī^eb^ti cakkhantīti cakkhūni, samavisamaṃ ācikkhantāni viya pavattantīti attho. atha vā cakkhanaṭṭhena cakkhūni. kimidaṃ cakkhanaṃ nāma? assādanaṃ, tathā hi vadanti ``madhuṃ cakkhati byañjanaṃ cakkhatī''ti imāni ca ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavantāni assādentāni ^a^P2.0027^ea^ viya hontīti cakkhanaṭṭhena cakkhūni. tāni pana saṅkhepato dve cakkhūni -- ñāṇacakkhu, maṃsacakkhu cāti. tesu ^b^maṃsacakkhu^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^ñāṇacakkhu^eb^ dibbacakkhu, paññācakkhūti idha dvidhā katvā vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0197^ea^ ^b^dibbacakkhū^eb^ti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi ^a^V0.0182^ea^ apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti. idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ, dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attano ca dibbavihārasannissitattā ālokapariggahena mahājutikattā. tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanena mahāgatikattāpi dibbaṃ. taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. dassanaṭṭhena cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi cakkhu, dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu.
[03] pajānātīti ^b^paññā^eb^. kiṃ pajānāti? cattāri ariyasaccāni ``idaṃ dukkha''ntiādinā. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``pajānātīti kho, āvuso, tasmā paññāti vuccati. kiñca pajānāti? idaṃ dukkha''ntiādi (ma0 ni0 1.449).

[03] aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ``paññāpanavasena paññā. kinti paññāpeti? aniccanti paññāpeti, dukkhanti paññāpeti, anattāti paññāpetī''ti vuttaṃ. sā panāyaṃ lakkhaṇādito yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā, akkhalitapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā araññagatasudesako viya. visesato panettha āsavakkhayañāṇasaṅkhātā paññā catusaccadassanaṭṭhena ^b^paññācakkhū^eb^ti adhippetā. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.1081; mahāva0 15).

[03] etesu ca maṃsacakkhu parittaṃ, dibbacakkhu mahaggataṃ, itaraṃ appamāṇaṃ. maṃsacakkhu rūpaṃ, itarāni arūpāni. maṃsacakkhu dibbacakkhu ca lokiyāni sāsavāni rūpavisayāni, itaraṃ lokuttaraṃ anāsavaṃ catusaccavisayaṃ. maṃsacakkhu abyākataṃ, dibbacakkhu siyā kusalaṃ ^a^P2.0028^ea^ siyā abyākataṃ, tathā paññācakkhu. maṃsacakkhu kāmāvacaraṃ, dibbacakkhu rūpāvacaraṃ, itaraṃ lokuttaranti evamādi vibhāgā veditabbā.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^anuttara^eb^nti paññācakkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. tañhi āsavakkhayañāṇabhāvato anuttaraṃ. ^b^akkhāsi purisuttamo^eb^ti purisānaṃ uttamo aggo ^a^M0.0198^ea^ sammāsambuddho desesi. ^b^uppādo^eb^ti maṃsacakkhussa pavatti. ^b^maggo^eb^ti upāyo, dibbacakkhussa kāraṇaṃ. pakaticakkhumato eva hi dibbacakkhu ^a^V0.0183^ea^ uppajjati, yasmā kasiṇālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhuñāṇassa uppādanaṃ, so ca kasiṇamaṇḍale uggahanimittena vinā natthīti. ^b^yato^eb^ti yadā. ^b^ñāṇa^eb^nti āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``paññācakkhu anuttara''^eb^nti. ^b^yassa cakkhussa paṭilābhā^eb^ti yassa ariyassa paññācakkhussa uppattiyā bhāvanāya sabbasmā vaṭṭadukkhato pamuccati parimuccatīti.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti adhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyāni. yāni hi sahajātadhammesu issarā viya hutvā tehi anuvattitabbāni, tāni indriyāni nāma. apica indo bhagavā dhammissaro paramena cittissariyena samannāgato. tena indena sabbapaṭhamaṃ diṭṭhattā adhigatattā paresañca diṭṭhattā desitattā vihitattā gocarabhāvanāsevanāhi diṭṭhattā ca indriyāni. indaṃ vā maggādhigamassa upanissayabhūtaṃ puññakammaṃ, tassa liṅgānītipi indriyāni. ^b^anaññātaññassāmītindriya^eb^nti ``anamatagge saṃsāre anaññātaṃ anadhigataṃ amatapadaṃ catusaccadhammameva vā ^a^P2.0029^ea^ jānissāmī''ti paṭipannassa iminā pubbabhāgena uppannaṃ indriyaṃ, sotāpattimaggapaññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^aññindriya^eb^nti ājānanaindriyaṃ. tatrāyaṃ vacanattho -- ājānāti paṭhamamaggañāṇena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvāva jānātīti aññā. yatheva hi paṭhamamaggapaññā dukkhādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena pavattati, tatheva ayampi pavattatīti aññā ca sā yathāvuttenaṭṭhena indriyaṃ cāti aññindriyaṃ. ājānanaṭṭheneva aññassa vā ariyapuggalassa indriyanti aññindriyaṃ, sotāpattiphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^aññātāvindriya^eb^nti aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitañāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṃ. ettha ca paṭhamapacchimāni paṭhamamaggacatutthaphalavasena ekaṭṭhānikāni, itaraṃ itaramaggaphalavasena chaṭṭhānikanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] gāthāsu ^a^M0.0199^ea^ ^b^sikkhamānassā^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhādayo sikkhamānassa bhāventassa. ^b^ujumaggānusārino^eb^ti ujumaggo vuccati ariyamaggo, antadvayavivajjitattā tassa anussaraṇato ujumaggānusārino, paṭipāṭiyā magge uppādentassāti attho. ^b^khayasmi^eb^nti anavasesakilesānaṃ khepanato khayasaṅkhāte aggamagge ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pureyeva uppajjati. ^b^tato aññā anantarā^eb^ti tato maggañāṇato anantarā arahattaṃ uppajjati. atha vā ^b^ujumaggānusārino^eb^ti ^a^V0.0184^ea^ līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanādike vajjetvā samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā bhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ pubbabhāgamaggaṃ anussarantassa anugacchantassa paṭipajjantassa gotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ diṭṭhekaṭṭhānaṃ kilesānaṃ khepanato khayasmiṃ sotāpattimagge paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ uppajjati. ^b^tato aññā anantarā^eb^ti tato paṭhamañāṇato anantarā anantarato paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggā aññā aññindriyaṃ uppajjati.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ ^a^P2.0030^ea^ ^b^aññā vimuttassā^eb^ti tato aññā aññindriyato pacchā arahattamaggañāṇānantarā arahattaphalena paññāvimuttiyā aññātāvindriyena vimuttassa. ^b^ñāṇaṃ ve hoti tādino^eb^ti arahattaphaluppattito uttarakāle iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattassa khīṇāsavassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ uppajjati. kathaṃ uppajjatīti āha ^b^``akuppā me vimuttī''^eb^ti. tassa akuppabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti ^b^``bhavasaṃyojanakkhayā''^eb^ti.

[03] idāni tādisaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ thomento ^b^``sa ve indriyasampanno''^eb^ti tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^indriyasampanno^eb^ti yathāvuttehi tīhi lokuttarindriyehi samannāgato, suddhehipi vā paṭippassaddhiladdhehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgato paripuṇṇo, tato eva cakkhādīhi suṭṭhu vūpasantehi nibbisevanehi indriyehi samannāgato. tenāha ^b^``santo''^eb^ti, sabbakilesapariḷāhavūpasamena upasantoti attho. ^b^santipade rato^eb^ti nibbāne abhirato adhimutto. ettha ca ``indriyasampanno''ti etena bhāvitamaggatā, pariññātakkhandhatā cassa dassitā. ``santo''ti etena pahīnakilesatā, ``santipade rato''ti etena sacchikatanirodhatāti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M0.0200^ea^ ^b^addhā^eb^ti kālā. ^b^atīto addhā^eb^tiādīsu dve pariyāyā -- suttantapariyāyo, abhidhammapariyāyo ca. tattha suttantapariyāyena paṭisandhito pubbe atīto addhā nāma, cutito pacchā anāgato addhā nāma, saha cutipaṭisandhīhi tadanantaraṃ paccuppanno addhā nāma. abhidhammapariyāyena uppādo, ṭhiti, bhaṅgoti ime tayo khaṇe patvā niruddhadhammā atīto addhā nāma, tayopi khaṇe ^a^P2.0031^ea^ asampattā anāgato addhā nāma, khaṇattayasamaṅgino paccuppanno addhā nāma.

[03] aparo ^a^V0.0185^ea^ nayo -- ayañhi atītādivibhāgo addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasena catudhā veditabbo. tesu addhāvibhāgo vutto. santativasena sabhāgā ekautusamuṭṭhānā, ekāhārasamuṭṭhānā ca pubbāpariyavasena vattamānāpi paccuppannā. tato pubbe visabhāgautuāhārasamuṭṭhānā atītā pacchā anāgatā. cittajā ekavīthiekajavanaekasamāpattisamuṭṭhānā paccuppannā nāma, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ santativasena atītādibhedo natthi, tesaṃyeva pana utuāhāracittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ upatthambhakavasena tassa atītādibhāvo veditabbo. samayavasena ekamuhuttapubbaṇhasāyanharattidivādīsu samayesu santānavasena pavattamānā taṃtaṃsamaye paccuppannā nāma, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. ayaṃ tāva rūpadhammesu nayo. arūpadhammesu pana khaṇavasena uppādādikkhaṇattayapariyāpannā paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. apica atikkantahetupaccayakiccā atītā, niṭṭhitahetukiccā aniṭṭhitapaccayakiccā paccuppannā, ubhayakiccaṃ asampattā anāgatā. attano vā kiccakkhaṇe paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. ettha ca khaṇādikathāva nippariyāyā, sesā pariyāyā. ayañhi atītādibhedo nāma dhammānaṃ hoti, na kālassa. atītādibhede pana dhamme upādāya paramatthato avijjamānopi kālo idha teneva vohārena atītotiādinā vuttoti veditabbo.
[03] gāthāsu ^a^M0.0201^ea^ ^b^akkheyyasaññino^eb^ti ettha akkhāyati, kathīyati, paññāpīyatīti akkheyyaṃ, kathāvatthu, atthato rūpādayo pañcakkhandhā. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``atītaṃ vā addhānaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheyya, anāgataṃ vā...pe0... paccuppannaṃ vā addhānaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheyyā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.305).
[03] tathā --

[02] ``yaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0032^ea^, rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ, `ahosī'ti tassa saṅkhā, `ahosī'ti tassa samaññā, `ahosī'ti tassa paññatti; na tassa saṅkhā atthīti, na tassa saṅkhā bhavissatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.62) --

[25] evaṃ vuttena niruttipathasuttenapi ettha attho dīpetabbo. evaṃ kathāvatthubhāvena akkheyyasaṅkhāte khandhapañcake ahanti ca mamanti ca devoti ca manussoti ca itthīti ca purisoti ca ādinā ^a^V0.0186^ea^ pavattasaññāvasena akkheyyasaññino, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu sattapuggalādisaññinoti attho. ^b^akkheyyasmiṃ^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhavasena ^b^patiṭṭhitā,^eb^ rāgādivasena vā aṭṭhahākārehi patiṭṭhitā. ratto hi rāgavasena patiṭṭhito hoti, duṭṭho dosavasena, mūḷho mohavasena, parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhivasena, thāmagato anusayavasena, vinibaddho mānavasena, aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchāvasena, vikkhepagato uddhaccavasena patiṭṭhito hotīti.

[03] ^b^akkheyyaṃ apariññāyā^eb^ti taṃ akkheyyaṃ tebhūmakadhamme tīhi pariññāhi aparijānitvā tassa aparijānanahetu. ^b^yogamāyanti maccuno^eb^ti maraṇassa yogaṃ tena saṃyogaṃ upagacchanti, na visaṃyoganti attho.
[03] atha vā ^b^yoga^eb^nti upāyaṃ, tena yojitaṃ pasāritaṃ mārasenaṭṭhāniyaṃ anatthajālaṃ kilesajālañca upagacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti. tathā hi vuttaṃ --
[22] ``na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā''ti.. (ma0 ni0 3.272; jā0 2.22.121; netti0 103).

[03] ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``akkheyyañca pariññāyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireke, tena akkheyyaparijānanena laddhabbaṃ vakkhamānameva visesaṃ joteti. ^b^pariññāyā^eb^ti vipassanāsahitāya ^a^M0.0202^ea^ maggapaññāya dukkhanti paricchijja jānitvā, tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānena vā taṃ samatikkamitvā tissannampi pariññānaṃ kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā. ^b^akkhātāraṃ na maññatī^eb^ti sabbaso maññanānaṃ pahīnattā khīṇāsavo akkhātāraṃ na maññati, kārakādisabhāvaṃ kiñci attānaṃ na paccetīti attho. ^b^phuṭṭho^eb^ ^a^P2.0033^ea^ ^b^vimokkho manasā, santipadamanuttara^eb^nti yasmā sabbasaṅkhatavimuttattā ``vimokkho''ti sabbakilesasantāpavūpasamanaṭṭhānatāya ``santipada''nti laddhanāmo nibbānadhammo phuṭṭho phusito patto, tasmā akkhātāraṃ na maññatīti. atha vā ``pariññāyā''ti padena dukkhasaccassa pariññābhisamayaṃ samudayasaccassa pahānābhisamayañca vatvā idāni ``phuṭṭho vimokkho manasā, santipadamanuttara''nti iminā magganirodhānaṃ bhāvanāsacchikiriyābhisamayaṃ vadati. tassattho -- samucchedavasena sabbakilesehi vimuccatīti ^b^vimokkho,^eb^ ariyamaggo. so panassa maggacittena phuṭṭho phusito bhāvito, teneva anuttaraṃ santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ phuṭṭhaṃ phusitaṃ sacchikatanti.

[03] ^b^akkheyyasampanno^eb^ti ^a^V0.0187^ea^ akkheyyanimittaṃ vividhāhi vipattīhi upaddute loke pahīnavipallāsatāya tato suparimutto akkheyyapariññābhinibbattāhi sampattīhi sampanno samannāgato. ^b^saṅkhāya sevī^eb^ti paññāvepullappattiyā cīvarādipaccaye saṅkhāya parituletvāva sevanasīlo, saṅkhātadhammattā ca āpāthagataṃ sabbampi visayaṃ chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena saṅkhāya sevanasīlo. ^b^dhammaṭṭho^eb^ti asekkhadhammesu nibbānadhamme eva vā ṭhito. ^b^vedagū^eb^ti veditabbassa catusaccassa pāraṅgatattā vedagū. evaṃguṇo arahā bhavādīsu katthaci āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato manussadevāti saṅkhyaṃ na upeti, apaññattikabhāvameva gacchatīti anupādāparinibbānena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ pañcame duṭṭhu caritāni, duṭṭhāni vā caritāni ^b^duccaritāni^eb^. kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā pavattaṃ duccaritaṃ ^b^kāyaduccaritaṃ^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo ^a^M0.0203^ea^. imāni ^a^P2.0034^ea^ ca duccaritāni paññattiyā vā kathetabbāni kammapathehi vā. tattha paññattiyā tāva kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadassa vītikkamo kāyaduccaritaṃ, vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadassa vītikkamo vacīduccaritaṃ, ubhayattha paññattassa vītikkamo manoduccaritanti ayaṃ paññattikathā. pāṇātipātādayo pana tisso cetanā kāyadvārepi, vacīdvārepi, uppannā kāyaduccaritaṃ, tathā catasso musāvādādicetanā vacīduccaritaṃ, abhijjhā, byāpādo, micchādiṭṭhīti tayo cetanāsampayuttadhammā manoduccaritanti ayaṃ kammapathakathā.

[03] gāthāyaṃ kammapathappattoyeva pāpadhammo kāyaduccaritādibhāvena vuttoti tadaññaṃ pāpadhammaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ ^b^``yañcaññaṃ dosasañhita''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^dosasañhita^eb^nti rāgādikilesasaṃhitaṃ. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V0.0188^ea^ suṭṭhu caritāni, sundarāni vā caritāni ^b^sucaritāni^eb^. kāyena sucaritaṃ, kāyato vā pavattaṃ sucaritaṃ ^b^kāyasucaritaṃ^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo. idhāpi pana paññattivasena, kammapathavasena cāti duvidhā kathā. tattha kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadassa avītikkamo kāyasucaritaṃ, vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadassa avītikkamo vacīsucaritaṃ, ubhayattha paññattassa avītikkamo manosucaritanti ayaṃ paññattikathā. pāṇātipātādīhi pana viramantassa uppannā tisso cetanāpi viratiyopi kāyasucaritaṃ, musāvādādīhi viramantassa catasso cetanāpi viratiyopi vacīsucaritaṃ, anabhijjhā, abyāpādo, sammādiṭṭhīti tayo cetanāsampayuttadhammā manosucaritanti ayaṃ kammapathakathā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M0.0204^ea^ ^a^P2.0035^ea^ ^b^soceyyānī^eb^ti sucibhāvā. ^b^kāyasoceyya^eb^nti kāyasucaritaṃ, vacīmanosoceyyānipi vacīmanosucaritāneva. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``tattha katamaṃ kāyasoceyyaṃ? pāṇātipātā veramaṇī''tiādi (a0 ni0 3.121-122).
[01] gāthāyaṃ samucchedavasena pahīnasabbakāyaduccaritattā kāyena sucīti ^b^kāyasuci. soceyyasampanna^eb^nti paṭippassaddhakilesattā suparisuddhāya soceyyasampattiyā upetaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] sattamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^moneyyānī^eb^ti ettha idhalokaparalokaṃ attahitaparahitañca munātīti muni, kalyāṇaputhujjanena saddhiṃ satta sekkhā arahā ca. idha pana arahāva adhippeto. munino bhāvāti ^b^moneyyāni,^eb^ arahato kāyavacīmanosamācārā.
[03] atha ^a^V0.0189^ea^ vā munibhāvakarā moneyyapaṭipadādhammā moneyyāni. tesamayaṃ vitthāro --

[02] ``tattha katamaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ? tividhakāyaduccaritassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyapariññā kāyamoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasmiṃ chandarāgappahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāranirodhā catutthajjhānasamāpatti kāyamoneyyaṃ.

[02] ``tattha katamaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ? catubbidhavacīduccaritassa pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ, vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ, vācāpariññā, pariññāsahagato maggo, vācāya chandarāgappahānaṃ, vacīsaṅkhāranirodhā dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyaṃ.

[02] ``tattha ^a^M0.0205^ea^ katamaṃ manomoneyyaṃ? tividhamanoduccaritassa pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ, manārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ, manopariññā, pariññāsahagato maggo, manasmiṃ chandarāgappahānaṃ, cittasaṅkhāranirodhā ^a^P2.0036^ea^ saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyya''nti (mahāni0 14; cūḷani0 mettagūmāṇavapucchāniddesa 21).
[03] ^b^ninhātapāpaka^eb^nti aggamaggajalena suṭṭhu vikkhālitapāpamalaṃ.
[06] aṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^yassa kassacī^eb^ti aniyamitavacanaṃ, tasmā yassa kassaci puggalassa gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā. ^b^rāgo appahīno^eb^ti rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo samucchedavasena na pahīno, maggena anuppattidhammataṃ na āpādito. dosamohesupi eseva nayo. tattha apāyagamanīyā rāgadosamohā paṭhamamaggena, oḷārikā kāmarāgadosā dutiyamaggena, teyeva anavasesā tatiyamaggena, bhavarāgo avasiṭṭhamoho ca catutthamaggena pahīyanti. evametesu pahīyantesu tadekaṭṭhato sabbepi kilesā pahīyanteva. evamete rāgādayo yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā maggena appahīnā. ^b^baddho mārassā^eb^ti kilesamārena baddhoti vuccati. yadaggena ca kilesamārena baddho, tadaggena abhisaṅkhāramārādīhipi ^a^V0.0190^ea^ baddhoyeva hoti. ^b^paṭimukkassa mārapāso^eb^ti paṭimukko assa anena appahīnakilesena puggalena tāyeva appahīnakilesatāya mārapāsasaṅkhāto kileso attano cittasantāne paṭimukko pavesito, tena sayaṃ bandhāpitoti attho. atha vā paṭimukko assa bhaveyya mārapāso. sukkapakkhe ^b^omukkassā^eb^ti avamukko mocito apanīto assa. sesaṃ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.

[03] idha gāthā sukkapakkhavaseneva āgatā. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^yassa^eb^ ariyapuggalassa rāgadosāvijjā ^b^virājitā^eb^ aggamaggena nirodhitā, taṃ bhāvitakāyasīlacittapaññatāya ^a^M0.0206^ea^ bhāvitattesu arahantesu ^b^aññataraṃ^eb^ abbhantaraṃ ekaṃ ^b^brahmabhūtaṃ^eb^ brahmaṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ arahattaphalaṃ ^a^P2.0037^ea^ pattaṃ. yathā aññe khīṇāsavā pubbūpanissayasampattisamannāgatā hutvā āgatā, yathā ca te antadvayarahitāya sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhasahagatāya majjhimāya paṭipadāya nibbānaṃ gatā adhigatā. yathā vā te khandhādīnaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvato paṭivijjhiṃsu, yathā ca te tathadhamme dukkhādayo aviparītato abbhaññiṃsu, rūpādike ca visaye yathā te diṭṭhamattādivaseneva passiṃsu, yathā vā pana te aṭṭha anariyavohāre vajjetvā ariyavohāravaseneva pavattavācā, vācānurūpañca pavattakāyā, kāyānurūpañca pavattavācā, tathā ayampi ariyapuggaloti ^b^tathāgataṃ^eb^, catusaccabuddhatāya ^b^buddhaṃ^eb^, puggalaveraṃ kilesaveraṃ attānuvādādibhayañca atikkantanti ^b^verabhayātītaṃ^eb^. sabbesaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ pahīnattā ^b^sabbappahāyinaṃ^eb^ buddhādayo ariyā ^b^āhu^eb^ kathenti kittentīti.
[06] navamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ dasame atarīti tiṇṇo, na tiṇṇo ^b^atiṇṇo^eb^. ^b^samudda^eb^nti saṃsārasamuddaṃ, cakkhāyatanādisamuddaṃ vā. tadubhayampi duppūraṇaṭṭhena samuddo viyāti samuddaṃ. atha vā samuddanaṭṭhena samuddaṃ, kilesavassanena sattasantānassa kilesasadanatoti attho. ^b^savīci^eb^nti kodhūpāyāsavīcīhi savīciṃ. vuttañhetaṃ ``vīcibhayanti kho, bhikkhu, kodhūpāyāsassetaṃ adhivacana''nti (itivu0 109; ma0 ni0 2.162). ^b^sāvaṭṭa^eb^nti pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭehi saha āvaṭṭaṃ. vuttampi cetaṃ ``āvaṭṭabhayanti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacana''nti (itivu0 109; ma0 ni0 2.164; a0 ni0 4.122). ^b^sagahaṃ sarakkhasa^eb^nti attano gocaragatānaṃ ^a^V0.0191^ea^ anatthajananato caṇḍamakaramacchakacchaparakkhasasadisehi visabhāgapuggalehi sahitaṃ. tathā cāha ``sagahaṃ sarakkhasanti ^a^P2.0038^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, mātugāmassetaṃ adhivacana''nti (itivu0 109). ^b^atarī^eb^ti maggapaññānāvāya yathāvuttaṃ samuddaṃ uttari. ^b^tiṇṇo^eb^ti nittiṇṇo. ^b^pāraṅgato^eb^ti ^a^M0.0207^ea^ tassa samuddassa pāraṃ paratīraṃ nirodhaṃ upagato. ^b^thale tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti tato eva saṃsāramahoghaṃ kāmādimahoghañca atikkamitvā thale paratīre nibbāne bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇo tiṭṭhatīti vuccati.
[03] idhāpi gāthā sukkapakkhavaseneva āgatā. tattha ^b^ūmibhaya^eb^nti yathāvuttaūmibhayaṃ, bhāyitabbaṃ etasmāti taṃ ūmi bhayaṃ. ^b^duttara^eb^nti duratikkamaṃ. ^b^accatārī^eb^ti atikkami.

[03] ^b^saṅgātigo^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ saṅgānaṃ atikkantattā pahīnattā saṅgātigo. ^b^atthaṅgato so na pamāṇametī^eb^ti so evaṃbhūto arahā rāgādīnaṃ pamāṇakaradhammānaṃ accantameva atthaṃ gatattā atthaṅgato, tato eva sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā ca ``ediso sīlena samādhinā paññāyā''ti kenaci pamiṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyo pamāṇaṃ na eti, atha vā anupādisesanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gato so arahā ``imāya nāma gatiyā ṭhito, ediso ca nāmagottenā''ti pamiṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pamāṇaṃ na eti na upagacchati. tato eva ^b^amohayi maccurājaṃ,^eb^ tena anubandhituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti vadāmīti anupādisesanibbānadhātuyāva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. iti imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamapañcamachaṭṭhesu vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, dutiyasattamāṭṭhamesu vivaṭṭaṃ, sesesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
[06] dasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa ^a^V0.0192^ea^ ^a^P2.0039^ea^ paṭhame ^b^diṭṭhā mayā^eb^ti mayā diṭṭhā, mama samantacakkhunā dibbacakkhunā cāti dvīhipi cakkhūhi diṭṭhā paccakkhato viditā. tena anussavādiṃ paṭikkhipati, ayañca attho idāneva pāḷiyaṃ āgamissati. ^b^kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā^eb^ti kāyaduccaritena samaṅgībhūtā. ^b^ariyānaṃ upavādakā^eb^ti buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi guṇaparidhaṃsanena abhūtabbhakkhānena upavādakā akkosakā garahakā. ^b^micchādiṭṭhikā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0208^ea^ viparītadassanā. ^b^micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā^eb^ti micchādassanahetu samādinnanānāvidhakammā ye ca, micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti. ettha ca vacīmanoduccaritaggahaṇeneva ariyūpavādamicchādiṭṭhīsu gahitāsu punavacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ nesaṃ. mahāsāvajjo hi ariyūpavādo ānantariyasadiso. yathāha --

[02] ``seyyathāpi, sāriputta, bhikkhu sīlasampanno, samādhisampanno, paññāsampanno, diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya; evaṃsampadamidaṃ, sāriputta, vadāmi taṃ vācaṃ appahāya, taṃ cittaṃ appahāya, taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye''ti (ma0 ni0 1.149).
[03] micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. yathāha --
[02] ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahāsāvajjataraṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi. micchādiṭṭhiparamāni, bhikkhave, vajjānī''ti (a0 ni0 1.310).
[03] ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0193^ea^ ^b^kho panā^eb^tiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa attapaccakkhabhāvaṃ daḷhataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. tampi suviññeyyameva.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^micchā manaṃ paṇidhāyā^eb^ti abhijjhādīnaṃ vasena cittaṃ ayoniso ṭhapetvā. ^b^micchā^eb^ ^a^P2.0040^ea^ ^b^vācañca bhāsiyā^eb^ti micchā musāvādādivasena vācaṃ bhāsitvā. ^b^micchā kammāni katvānā^eb^ti pāṇātipātādivasena kāyakammāni katvā. atha vā ^b^micchā manaṃ paṇidhāyā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhivasena cittaṃ viparītaṃ ṭhapetvā. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. idānissa tathā duccaritacaraṇe kāraṇaṃ dasseti ^b^appassuto^eb^ti, attano paresañca hitāvahena sutena virahitoti attho. ^b^apuññakaro^eb^ti tato eva ariyadhammassa akovidatāya kibbisakārī pāpadhammo. ^b^appasmiṃ idha jīvite^eb^ti idha manussaloke jīvite atiparitte. tathā cāha ``yo ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo''ti (dī0 ni0 2.93; saṃ0 ni0 1.145), ``appamāyu manussāna''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.145; mahāni0 10) ca. tasmā bahussuto sappañño sīghaṃ puññāni katvā saggūpago nibbānapatiṭṭho ^a^M0.0209^ea^ vā hoti. yo pana appassuto apuññakaro, kāyassa bhedā duppañño nirayaṃ so upapajjatīti.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ dutiye paṭhamasutte vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^nissaraṇiyā^eb^ti nissaraṇapaṭisaṃyuttā. ^b^dhātuyo^eb^ti sattasuññasabhāvā. ^b^kāmāna^eb^nti kilesakāmānañceva vatthukāmānañca. atha vā ^b^kāmāna^eb^nti kilesakāmānaṃ. kilesakāmato hi nissaraṇā vatthukāmehipi nissaraṇaṃyeva hoti, na aññathā. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``na ^a^V0.0194^ea^ ^a^P2.0041^ea^ te kāmā yāni citrāni loke,
[27] saṅkapparāgo purisassa kāmo.
[26] tiṭṭhanti citrāni tatheva loke,
[22] athettha dhīrā vinayanti chanda''nti.. (a0 ni0 6.63).

[03] ^b^nissaraṇa^eb^nti apagamo. ^b^nekkhamma^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānaṃ, visesato taṃ asubhārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. yo pana taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā tatiyamaggaṃ patvā anāgāmimaggena nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti, tassa cittaṃ accantameva kāmehi nissaṭanti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhato kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^rūpāna^eb^nti rūpadhammānaṃ, visesena saddhiṃ ārammaṇehi kusalavipākakiriyābhedato sabbesaṃ rūpāvacaradhammānaṃ. ^b^āruppa^eb^nti arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ. keci pana ``kāmāna''nti padassa ``sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaradhammāna''nti atthaṃ vadanti. ``nekkhamma''nti ca ``pañca rūpāvacarajjhānānī''ti. taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ^a^M0.0210^ea^ natthi, na yujjati ca. ^b^bhūta^eb^nti jātaṃ. ^b^saṅkhata^eb^nti samecca sambhuyya paccayehi kataṃ. ^b^paṭiccasamuppanna^eb^nti kāraṇato nibbattaṃ. tīhipi padehi tebhūmake dhamme anavasesato pariyādiyati. ^b^nirodho^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. ettha ca paṭhamāya dhātuyā kāmapariññā vuttā, dutiyāya rūpapariññā, tatiyāya sabbasaṅkhatapariññā sabbabhavasamatikkamo vutto.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^kāmanissaraṇaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti ``idaṃ kāmanissaraṇaṃ -- evañca kāmato nissaraṇa''nti jānitvā. atikkamati etenāti atikkamo, atikkamanūpāyo, taṃ ^b^atikkamaṃ^eb^ āruppaṃ ñatvā. sabbe saṅkhārā samanti vūpasamanti etthāti ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamatho,^eb^ nibbānaṃ, taṃ ^b^phusaṃ^eb^ phusanto. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P2.0042^ea^ ^b^rūpehī^eb^ti rūpāvacaradhammehi. ^b^santatarā^eb^ti atisayena santā. rūpāvacaradhammā hi kilesavikkhambhanato vitakkādioḷārikaṅgappahānato samādhibhūmibhāvato ca santā nāma, āruppā pana tehipi aṅgasantatāya ceva ārammaṇasantatāya ca atisayena santavuttikā, tena santatarāti vuttā. ^b^nirodho^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattitopi hi ^a^V0.0195^ea^ catutthāruppato phalasamāpattiyova santatarā kilesadarathapaṭipassaddhito nibbānārammaṇato ca, kimaṅgaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhārasamatho nibbānaṃ. tena vuttaṃ ``āruppehi nirodho santataro''ti.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^rūpūpagā^eb^ti rūpabhavūpagā. rūpabhavo hi idha rūpanti vutto, ``rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī''tiādīsu viya. ^b^arūpaṭṭhāyino^eb^ti arūpāvacarā. ^b^nirodhaṃ appajānantā, āgantāro punabbhava^eb^nti etena rūpārūpāvacaradhammehi nirodhassa santabhāvameva dasseti. ^b^arūpesu asaṇṭhitā^eb^ti arūparāgena arūpabhavesu appatiṭṭhahantā, tepi parijānantāti attho. ^b^nirodhe ye vimuccantī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ye^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M0.0211^ea^ ^b^puttā^eb^ti atrajā orasaputtā, dinnakādayopi vā. ^b^santo^eb^ti bhavantā ^b^saṃvijjamānā lokasmi^eb^nti imasmiṃ loke upalabbhamānā. atthibhāvena santo, pākaṭabhāvena vijjamānā. ^b^atijāto^eb^ti attano guṇehi mātāpitaro atikkamitvā jāto, tehi adhikaguṇoti attho. ^b^anujāto^eb^ti ^a^P2.0043^ea^ guṇehi mātāpitūnaṃ anurūpo hutvā jāto, tehi samānaguṇoti attho. ^b^avajāto^eb^ti guṇehi mātāpitūnaṃ adhamo hutvā jāto, tehi hīnaguṇoti attho. yehi pana guṇehi yutto mātāpitūnaṃ adhiko samo hīnoti ca adhippeto, te vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``kathañca, bhikkhave, putto atijāto hotī''^eb^ti kathetukamyatāya pucchaṃ katvā ^b^``idha, bhikkhave, puttassā''^eb^tiādinā niddeso āraddho.

[03] tattha ^b^na buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^buddho^eb^ti sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇanimittānuttaravimokkhādhigamaparibhāvitaṃ khandhasantānaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā saccābhisambodhiṃ upādāya paññattiko sattātisayo buddho. yathāha --

[02] ``buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva''nti (cūḷani0 pārāyanatthutigāthāniddesa 97; paṭi0 ma0 1.161) --
[25] ayaṃ ^a^V0.0196^ea^ tāva atthato buddhavibhāvanā.

[03] byañjanato pana savāsanāya kilesaniddāya accantavigamena buddhavā paṭibuddhavāti buddho, buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvena buddhavā vibuddhavāti buddho, bujjhitāti buddho, bodhetāti buddhoti evamādinā nayena veditabbo. yathāha --

[02] ``bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho, sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, visavitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupakkilesasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti ^a^M0.0212^ea^ buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho, abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhāti buddho, buddhoti cetaṃ nāmaṃ na mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā kataṃ, na bhātarā kataṃ, na bhaginiyā kataṃ, na mittāmaccehi kataṃ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ, atha kho vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddho''ti (cūḷani0 pārāyanatthutigāthāniddesa 97; paṭi0 ma0 1.162).

[03] hiṃsatīti ^a^P2.0044^ea^ ^b^saraṇaṃ,^eb^ sabbaṃ anatthaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ sabbaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ hiṃsati vināseti viddhaṃsetīti attho. ^b^saraṇaṃ gatā^eb^ti ``buddho bhagavā amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ aghassa hantā hitassa vidhātā''ti iminā adhippāyena buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ gacchāma bhajāma sevāma payirupāsāma. evaṃ vā jānāma bujjhāmāti evaṃ gatā upagatā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā. tappaṭikkhepena na buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā.
[03] ^b^dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā^eb^ti adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo. so atthato ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī''ti vitthāro (a0 ni0 4.34).
[03] na ^a^V0.0197^ea^ kevalañca ariyamagganibbānāni eva, apica kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṃ pariyattidhammo ca. vuttañhetaṃ chattamāṇavakavimāne --
[21] ``rāgavirāgamanejamasokaṃ,
[27] dhammamasaṅkhatamappaṭikūlaṃ.
[26] madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattaṃ,
[22] dhammamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī''ti.. (vi0 va0 887).

[03] tattha hi ^b^rāgavirāgo^eb^ti maggo kathito, ^b^anejamasoka^eb^nti phalaṃ, ^b^dhammasaṅkhata^eb^nti nibbānaṃ, ^b^appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhatta^eb^nti piṭakattayena vibhattā ^a^M0.0213^ea^ sabbadhammakkhandhā kathitā. taṃ dhammaṃ vuttanayena saraṇanti gatā dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā. tappaṭikkhepena na dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā.
[03] diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṃhatoti saṅgho. so atthato aṭṭhāriyapuggalasamūho. vuttañhetaṃ tasmiṃ eva vimāne --
[21] ``yattha ca dinna mahapphalamāhu,
[27] catūsu sucīsu purisayugesu.
[26] aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te,
[22] saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī''ti.. (vi0 va0 888).
[03] taṃ ^a^P2.0045^ea^ saṅghaṃ vuttanayena saraṇanti gatā saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā. tappaṭikkhepena na saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāti.
[03] ettha ca saraṇagamanakosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati saraṇagamanappabhedo, phalaṃ, saṃkileso, bhedo, vodānanti ayaṃ vidhi veditabbo.

[03] tattha padatthato tāva hiṃsatīti ^b^saraṇaṃ,^eb^ saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiṃ parikilesaṃ hanati vināsetīti attho, ratanattayassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā nivattanena ca sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti buddho saraṇaṃ, bhavakantārato uttāraṇena assāsadānena ca dhammo, appakānampi kārānaṃ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena saṅgho. tasmā ^a^V0.0198^ea^ imināpi pariyāyena ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ. tappasādataggarutāhi vihatakileso tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo ^b^saraṇagamanaṃ^eb^. taṃsamaṅgisatto ^b^saraṇaṃ gacchati,^eb^ vuttappakārena cittuppādena ``etāni me tīṇi ratanāni saraṇaṃ, etāni parāyaṇa''nti evaṃ upetīti attho. evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchatīti idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] pabhedato pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ -- lokiyaṃ, lokuttarañca. tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati, lokiyaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati. taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu saddhāpaṭilābho ^a^M0.0214^ea^, saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhi dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati.

[03] tayidaṃ catudhā pavattati -- attasanniyyātanena, tapparāyaṇatāya, sissabhāvūpagamanena, paṇipātenāti. tattha ^b^attasanniyyātanaṃ^eb^ nāma ``ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi, dhammassa, saṅghassā''ti evaṃ buddhādīnaṃ attapariccajanaṃ. ^b^tapparāyaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma ``ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo, dhammaparāyaṇo, saṅghaparāyaṇo iti maṃ dhārehī''ti evaṃ tappaṭisaraṇabhāvo ^a^P2.0046^ea^ tapparāyaṇatā. ^b^sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ^eb^ nāma ``ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhassa antevāsiko, dhammassa, saṅghassa iti maṃ dhāretū''ti evaṃ sissabhāvassa upagamanaṃ. ^b^paṇipāto^eb^ nāma ``ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānāñjalikammasāmīcikammaṃ buddhādīnaṃ eva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomi iti maṃ dhāretū''ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro. imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññataraṃ karontena gahitaṃ eva hoti saraṇagamanaṃ.

[03] apica ``bhagavato attānaṃ pariccajāmi, dhammassa, saṅghassa attānaṃ pariccajāmi, jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, pariccatto eva me attā jīvitañca, jīvitapariyantikaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, buddho me saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇa''nti evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ``satthārañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ; sugatañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva passeyyaṃ; sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ; bhagavantameva passeyya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 2.154) evaṃ mahākassapattherassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[21] ``so ^a^V0.0199^ea^ ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ.
[22] namassamāno sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammata''nti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.246; su0 ni0 194) --

[25] evaṃ āḷavakādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā. ``atha kho, brahmāyu, brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti `brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo, brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo'''ti (ma0 ni0 2.394) evaṃ paṇipāto daṭṭhabbo.

[03] so ^a^M0.0215^ea^ panesa ñātibhayācariyadakkhiṇeyyavasena catubbidho hoti. tattha dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātena saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, na itarehi. seṭṭhavaseneva hi saraṇaṃ gayhati, seṭṭhavasena ^a^P2.0047^ea^ bhijjati. tasmā yo ``ayameva loke sabbasattuttamo aggadakkhiṇeyyo''ti vandati, teneva saraṇaṃ gahitaṃ hoti, na ñātibhayācariyasaññāya vandantena. evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ``ñātako me aya''nti vandato saraṇaṃ na bhijjati, pageva apabbajitaṃ. tathā rājānaṃ bhayena vandato. so hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti. tathā yaṃkiñci sippaṃ sikkhāpakaṃ titthiyampi ``ācariyo me aya''nti vandatopi na bhijjati. evaṃ saraṇagamanassa pabhedo veditabbo.
[03] ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ, sabbadukkhakkhayo ānisaṃsaphalaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato.
[22] cattāri ariyasaccāni, sammappaññāya passati..
[21] ``dukkhaṃ dukkhasamuppādaṃ, dukkhassa ca atikkamaṃ.
[22] ariyaṃ caṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ..
[21] ``etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ.
[22] etaṃ saraṇamāgamma, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 190-192).
[03] apica ^a^V0.0200^ea^ niccato anupagamanādīnipi etassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya, sukhato upagaccheyya, kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya, mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya, arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, duṭṭhacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādeyya, saṅghaṃ bhindeyya, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.127-128; a0 ni0 1.268-276; vibha0 809).
[03] lokiyassa ^a^M0.0216^ea^ pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse,
[27] na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ.
[26] pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ,
[22] devakāyaṃ paripūressantī''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[03] aparampi ^a^P2.0048^ea^ vuttaṃ --
