[02] ``atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami...pe0... ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca -- `sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti. buddhaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti. te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti -- dibbena āyunā, dibbena vaṇṇena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena ādhipateyyena, dibbehi rūpehi, dibbehi saddehi, dibbehi gandhehi, dibbehi rasehi, dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehi...pe0... dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ...pe0... phoṭṭhabbehī'''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.341).
[03] velāmasuttādivasenapi (a0 ni0 9.20) saraṇagamanassa phalaviseso veditabbo. evaṃ saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] lokiyasaraṇagamanañcettha ^a^V0.0201^ea^ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati, na mahājutikaṃ hoti na mahāvipphāraṃ. lokuttarassa pana saṃkileso natthi. lokiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo -- sāvajjo, anavajjo ca. tattha sāvajjo aññasatthārādīsu attasanniyyātanādīhi hoti, so aniṭṭhaphalo. anavajjo kālakiriyāya, so avipākattā aphalo. lokuttarassa pana nevatthi bhedo. bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisatīti evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabbo.
[03] vodānampi ^a^M0.0217^ea^ ca lokiyasseva yassa hi saṃkileso, tasseva tato vodānena bhavitabbaṃ. lokuttaraṃ pana niccavodānamevāti.

[03] ^b^pāṇātipātā^eb^ti ettha pāṇassa saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atipātanaṃ atipāto, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho. atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^pāṇo^eb^ti cettha khandhasantāno, yo sattoti voharīyati, paramatthato rūpārūpajīvitindriyaṃ. rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassatīti. tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā ^a^P2.0049^ea^ kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā ^b^pāṇātipāto^eb^. yāya hi cetanāya pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetukamahābhūtapaccayā uppajjanakamahābhūtā purimasadisā na uppajjanti, visadisā eva uppajjanti, sā tādisappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pāṇātipāto. laddhūpakkamāni hi bhūtāni purimabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātiyānaṃ kāraṇāni na hontīti. ``kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā''ti idaṃ manodvāre pavattāya vadhakacetanāya pāṇātipātatāsambhavadassanaṃ. kulumbasuttepi hi ``idhekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā ceto vasippatto aññissā kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ pāpakena manasā anupekkhitā hotī''ti vijjāmayiddhi adhippetā. sā ca vacīdvāraṃ muñcitvā na sakkā nibbattetunti vacīdvāravaseneva nippajjati. ye pana ``bhāvanāmayiddhi tattha adhippetā''ti vadanti, tesaṃ vādo kusalattikavedanattikavitakkattikabhūmantarehi virujjhati.

[03] svāyaṃ pāṇātipāto guṇarahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāsarīre mahāsāvajjo. kasmā? payogamahantatāya. payogasamattepi vatthumahantatādīhi mahāsāvajjo, guṇavantesu manussādīsu appaguṇe pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo ^a^V0.0202^ea^. sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjo.

[03] ettha ca payogavatthumahantatādīhi mahāsāvajjatā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato veditabbā. yathādhippetassa payogassa ^a^M0.0218^ea^ sahasā nipphādanavasena sakiccasādhikāya bahukkhattuṃ pavattajavanehi laddhāsevanāya ca sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya payogassa mahantabhāvo. satipi kadāci khuddake ceva mahante ca pāṇe payogassa samabhāve mahantaṃ hanantassa cetanā tibbatarā uppajjatīti vatthumahantatāpi cetanāya balavabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ. iti ubhayampetaṃ cetanābalavabhāveneva mahāsāvajjatāya hetu hoti. tathā hantabbassa mahāguṇabhāve tattha pavattaupakāracetanā viya khettavisesanipphattiyā apakāracetanāpi balavatī tibbatarā uppajjatīti tassa mahāsāvajjatā ^a^P2.0050^ea^ daṭṭhabbā. tasmā payogavatthuādipaccayānaṃ amahattepi guṇamahantatādipaccayehi cetanāya balavabhāvavaseneva mahāsāvajjatā veditabbā.

[03] tassa pāṇo, pāṇasaññitā, vadhakacittaṃ, upakkamo, tena maraṇanti pañca sambhārā. pañcasambhārayutto pāṇātipātoti pañcasambhārāvinimutto daṭṭhabbo. tesu pāṇasaññitāvadhakacittāni pubbabhāgiyānipi honti, upakkamo vadhakacetanāsamuṭṭhāpito. tassa cha payogā -- sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, thāvaro, vijjāmayo, iddhimayoti. tesu sahatthena nibbatto sāhatthiko. paresaṃ āṇāpanavasena pavatto āṇattiko. ususattiādīnaṃ nissajjanavasena pavatto nissaggiyo. opātakhaṇanādivasena pavatto thāvaro. āthabbaṇikādīnaṃ viya mantaparijappanapayogo vijjāmayo. dāṭhākoṭṭanādīnaṃ viya kammavipākajiddhimayo.

[03] etthāha -- khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu, ko hantā, ko vā haññati? yadi cittacetasikasantāno, so arūpitāya na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, nāpi vikopanīyo, atha rūpasantāno, so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipāto labbhati, yathā matasarīre. payogopi pāṇātipātassa yathāvutto paharaṇappahārādiko atītesu saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu paccuppannesu vā. tattha na tāva atītesu anāgatesu ca sambhavati tesaṃ avijjamānasabhāvattā, paccuppannesu ^a^M0.0219^ea^ ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā, vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, nirīhattā ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa ^a^V0.0203^ea^ so payogo, khaṇikabhāvena vadhādhippāyasamakālameva bhijjanakassa yāva kiriyāpariyosānakālamanavaṭṭhānato kassa vā pāṇātipāto kammabandhoti?

[03] vuccate -- yathāvuttavadhakacetanāsamaṅgī saṅkhārānaṃ puñjo sattasaṅkhāto hantā. tena pavattitavadhappayoganimittaṃ apagatusmāviññāṇajīvitindriyo matoti vohārassa vatthubhūto yathāvuttavadhappayogākaraṇe pubbe viya uddhaṃ pavattanāraho rūpārūpadhammapuñjo haññati, cittacetasikasantāno ^a^P2.0051^ea^ eva vā. vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya bhūtarūpesu katappayogavasena jīvitindriyavicchedena sopi vicchijjatīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo, nāpi ahetuko, na ca payogo nippayojano. paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katappayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito khaṇikānañca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjitvā atthibhāvamatteneva attano attano anurūpaphaluppādananiyatāni kāraṇāniyeva karontīti vuccati, yathā padīpo pakāsetīti, tatheva ghātakavohāro. na ca kevalassa vadhādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito, santānavasena vattamānasseva pana icchitoti attheva pāṇātipātena kammabandho. santānavasena vattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyāsiddhi dissatīti. ayañca vicāraṇā adinnādānādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ vibhāvetabbā. tasmā ^b^pāṇātipātā^eb^. na paṭiviratāti ^b^appaṭiviratā^eb^.

[03] adinnassa ādānaṃ ^b^adinnādānaṃ,^eb^ parassa haraṇaṃ theyyaṃ corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. tattha ^b^adinna^eb^nti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti. tasmiṃ parapariggahite ^a^M0.0220^ea^ parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. taṃ hīne parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ. kasmā? vatthupaṇītatāya. tathā khuddake parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, mahante mahāsāvajjaṃ. kasmā? vatthumahantatāya payogamahantatāya ca. vatthusamatte pana sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, taṃtaṃguṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ. vatthuguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ payogassa ca mudubhāve appasāvajjaṃ, tibbabhāve mahāsāvajjaṃ.

[03] tassa pañca sambhārā -- parapariggahitaṃ, parapariggahitasaññitā, theyyacittaṃ, upakkamo, tena ^a^V0.0204^ea^ haraṇanti. cha payogā ^a^P2.0052^ea^ sāhatthikādayova. te ca kho yathānurūpaṃ theyyāvahāro, pasayhāvahāro, parikappāvahāro, paṭicchannāvahāro, kusāvahāroti imesaṃ avahārānaṃ vasena pavattā. ettha ca mantaparijappanena parasantakaharaṇaṃ vijjāmayo payogo. vinā mantena tādisena iddhānubhāvasiddhena kāyavacīpayogena parasantakassa ākaḍḍhanaṃ iddhimayo payogoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti methunasamācāresu. ^b^micchācāro^eb^ti ekantanindito lāmakācāro. lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā ^b^kāmesu micchācāro^eb^. tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitādayo dasa, dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo, itthīsu pana dvinnaṃ sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ, dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññapurisā. svāyaṃ micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo, sīlādiguṇasampanne mahāsāvajjo. guṇarahitepi ca abhibhavitvā micchā carantassa mahāsāvajjo, ubhinnaṃ samānacchandatāya appasāvajjo. samānacchandabhāvepi kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjo. tassa cattāro sambhārā -- agamanīyavatthu, tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanapayogo, maggenamaggappaṭipattiadhivāsananti. tattha attano ruciyā pavattitassa tayo, balakkārena pavattitassa tayoti anavasesaggahaṇena cattāro daṭṭhabbā, atthasiddhi pana tīheva. eko payogo sāhatthikova.

[03] ^b^musā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0221^ea^ visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjako kāyavacīpayogo, visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā ^b^musāvādo^eb^. aparo nayo^b^ musā^eb^ti abhūtaṃ vatthu, ^b^vādo^eb^ti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ. tasmā atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññāpanapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā ^b^musāvādo^eb^.

[03] so yamatthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. apica gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthīti ādinayappavatto appasāvajjo, sakkhinā ^a^P2.0053^ea^ hutvā atthabhañjanavasena vutto mahāsāvajjo. pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena ``ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī''ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo, adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana ``diṭṭha''ntiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo. tathā yassa atthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjo, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjo. kilesānaṃ mudutibbatāvasena ca appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā labbhateva.

[03] tassa ^a^V0.0205^ea^ cattāro sambhārā -- atathaṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, parassa tadatthavijānananti. visaṃvādanādhippāyena hi payoge katepi parena tasmiṃ atthe aviññāte visaṃvādanassa asijjhanato parassa tadatthavijānanampi eko sambhāro veditabbo. keci pana ``abhūtavacanaṃ, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, parassa tadatthavijānananti tayo sambhārā''ti vadanti. sace pana paro dandhatāya vicāretvā tamatthaṃ jānāti, sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya pavattattā kiriyāsamuṭṭhāpakacetanākkhaṇeyeva musāvādakammunā bajjhati.

[03] ^b^surā^eb^ti piṭṭhasurā, pūvasurā, odanasurā, kiṇṇapakkhittā, sambhārasaṃyuttāti pañca surā. ^b^meraya^eb^nti pupphāsavo, phalāsavo, madhvāsavo, guḷāsavo sambhārasaṃyuttoti pañca āsavā. tadubhayampi madanīyaṭṭhena ^b^majjaṃ^eb^. yāya cetanāya taṃ pivati, sā pamādakāraṇattā ^b^pamādaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. lakkhaṇato pana yathāvuttassa surāmerayasaṅkhātassa majjassa bījato paṭṭhāya madavasena kāyadvārappavattā pamādacetanā ^b^surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. tassa majjabhāvo, pātukamyatācittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, ajjhoharaṇanti cattāro sambhārā. akusalacitteneva cassa pātabbato ekantena sāvajjabhāvo ^a^M0.0222^ea^. ariyasāvakānaṃ pana vatthuṃ ajānantānampi mukhaṃ na pavisati, pageva jānantānaṃ. aḍḍhapasatamattassa pānaṃ appasāvajjaṃ, addhāḷhakamattassa pānaṃ tato mahantaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, kāyasañcālanasamatthaṃ bahuṃ pivitvā gāmaghātakādikammaṃ karontassa mahāsāvajjameva. pāpakammañhi ^a^P2.0054^ea^ pāṇātipātaṃ patvā khīṇāsave mahāsāvajjaṃ, adinnādānaṃ patvā khīṇāsavassa santake mahāsāvajjaṃ, micchācāraṃ patvā khīṇāsavāya bhikkhuniyā vītikkame, musāvādaṃ patvā musāvādena saṅghabhede, surāpānaṃ patvā kāyasañcālanasamatthaṃ bahuṃ pivitvā gāmaghātakādikammaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ. sabbehipi cetehi musāvādena saṅghabhedova mahāsāvajjo. tañhi katvā kappaṃ niraye paccati.

[03] idāni etesu sabhāvato, ārammaṇato, vedanato, mūlato, kammato, phalatoti chahi ākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo. tattha ^b^sabhāvato^eb^ pāṇātipātādayo sabbepi cetanāsabhāvāva. ^b^ārammaṇato^eb^ pāṇātipāto jīvitindriyārammaṇato saṅkhārārammaṇo, adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇaṃ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā, micchācāro phoṭṭhabbavasena saṅkhārārammaṇo, sattārammaṇoti eke. musāvādo sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā, surāpānaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ. ^b^vedanato^eb^ pāṇātipāto dukkhavedano, adinnādānaṃ tivedanaṃ, micchācāro sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedano, tathā surāpānaṃ. sanniṭṭhāpakacittena pana ubhayampi majjhattavedanaṃ na hoti. musāvādo tivedano. ^b^mūlato^eb^ pāṇātipāto dosamohavasena dvimūlako, adinnādānaṃ musāvādo ca dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena ^a^V0.0206^ea^ vā, micchācāro surāpānañca lobhamohavasena dvimūlaṃ. ^b^kammato^eb^ musāvādoyevettha vacīkammaṃ, sesaṃ catubbidhampi kāyakammameva. ^b^phalato^eb^ sabbepi apāyūpapattiphalā ceva sugatiyampi appāyukatādinānāvidhāniṭṭhaphalā cāti evamettha sabhāvādito vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^appaṭiviratā^eb^ti samādānaviratiyā sampattaviratiyā ca abhāvena na paṭiviratā. ^b^dussīlā^eb^ti tato eva pañcasīlamattassāpi abhāvena nissīlā. ^b^pāpadhammā^eb^ti lāmakadhammā, hīnācārā. ^b^pāṇātipātā paṭivirato^eb^ti ^a^M0.0223^ea^ sikkhāpadasamādānena pāṇātipātato virato, ārakā ṭhito. esa nayo sesesupi.

[03] idhāpi pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīnaṃ sabhāvato ārammaṇato ^a^P2.0055^ea^, vedanato, mūlato, kammato, samādānato, bhedato, phalato ca viññātabbo vinicchayo. tattha ^b^sabhāvato^eb^ pañcapi cetanāyopi honti viratiyopi, virativasena pana desanā āgatā. yā pāṇātipātā viramantassa ``yā tasmiṃ samaye pāṇātipātā ārati viratī''ti evaṃ vuttā kusalacittasampayuttā virati. sā pabhedato tividhā -- sampattavirati, samādānavirati, samucchedaviratīti. tattha asamādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ attano jātivayabāhusaccādīni paccavekkhitvā ``ayuttametaṃ amhākaṃ kātu''nti sampattavatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati ^b^sampattavirati^eb^ nāma. samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ sikkhāpadasamādāne taduttari ca attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati ^b^samādānavirati^eb^ nāma. ariyamaggasampayuttā pana virati ^b^samucchedavirati^eb^ nāma, yassā uppattito paṭṭhāya ariyapuggalānaṃ ``pāṇaṃ ghātessāmā''ti cittampi na uppajjati. tāsu samādānavirati idhādhippetā.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇato^eb^ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ ārammaṇāneva etesaṃ ārammaṇāni. vītikkamitabbatoyeva hi virati nāma hoti. yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati, evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāyeva ete kusaladhammā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahanti. ^b^vedanato^eb^ sabbāpi sukhavedanāva.

[03] ^b^mūlato^eb^ ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhādosāmohavasena timūlā honti, ñāṇavippayuttacittena viramantassa alobhādosavasena dvimūlā. ^b^kammato^eb^ musāvādā veramaṇi vacīkammaṃ ^a^V0.0207^ea^, sesā kāyakammaṃ. ^b^samādānato^eb^ aññassa garuṭṭhāniyassa santike taṃ alabhantena sayameva vā pañca sīlāni ekajjhaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vā samādiyantena samādinnāni honti. ^b^bhedato^eb^ gahaṭṭhānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ vītikkantaṃ, taṃ tadeva bhijjati, itaraṃ na bhijjati. kasmā? gahaṭṭhā hi anibaddhasīlā honti, yaṃ yaṃ sakkonti, taṃ tadeva rakkhanti. pabbajitānaṃ pana ekasmiṃ vītikkante sabbāni bhijjantīti.

[03] ^b^phalato^eb^ti ^a^M0.0224^ea^ ^a^P2.0056^ea^ pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā cettha aṅgapaccaṅgasampannatā, ārohapariṇāhasampatti, javanasampatti, suppatiṭṭhitapādatā, cārutā, mudutā, sucitā, sūratā, mahabbalatā, vissaṭṭhavacanatā, sattānaṃ piyamanāpatā, abhijjaparisatā, acchambhitā, duppadhaṃsiyatā, parūpakkamena amaraṇatā, mahāparivāratā, suvaṇṇatā, susaṇṭhānatā, appābādhatā, asokatā, piyamanāpehi avippayogo, dīghāyukatāti evamādīni phalāni.

[03] adinnādānā veramaṇiyā mahādhanadhaññatā, anantabhogatā, thirabhogatā, icchitānaṃ bhogānaṃ khippaṃ paṭilābho, rājādīhi asādhāraṇabhogatā, uḷārabhogatā, tattha tattha jeṭṭhakabhāvo, natthibhāvassa ajānanatā, sukhavihāritāti evamādīni.

[03] abrahmacariyā veramaṇiyā vigatapaccatthikatā, sabbasattānaṃ piyamanāpatā, annapānavatthacchādanādīnaṃ lābhitā, sukhasupanatā, sukhapaṭibujjhanatā, apāyabhayavimokkho, itthibhāvanapuṃsakabhāvānaṃ abhabbatā, akkodhanatā, saccakāritā, amaṅkutā, ārādhanasukhatā, paripuṇṇindriyatā, paripuṇṇalakkhaṇatā, nirāsaṅkatā, appossukkatā, sukhavihāritā, akutobhayatā, piyavippayogābhāvoti evamādīni. yasmā pana micchācārāveramaṇiyā phalānipi ettheva antogadhāni, tasmā (abrahmacariyā veramaṇiyā).

[03] musāvādā veramaṇiyā vippasannindriyatā, vissaṭṭhamadhurabhāṇitā, samasitasuddhadantatā, nātithūlatā, nātikisatā, nātirassatā, nātidīghatā, sukhasamphassatā, uppalagandhamukhatā, sussūsakaparisatā, ādeyyavacanatā, kamaladalasadisamudulohitatanujivhatā, alīnatā, anuddhatatāti evamādīni.

[03] surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā atītānāgatapaccuppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu appamādatā, ñāṇavantatā, sadā upaṭṭhitassatitā, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavantatā ^a^V0.0208^ea^, analasatā, ajaḷatā, anummattatā, acchambhitā, asārambhitā, anissukitā, amaccharitā, saccavāditā, apisuṇāpharusāsamphappalāpavāditā, kataññutā ^a^P2.0057^ea^, kataveditā, cāgavantatā, sīlavantatā, ujukatā, akkodhanatā, hirottappasampannatā ^a^M0.0225^ea^, ujudiṭṭhitā, mahantatā, paṇḍitatā, atthānatthakusalatāti evamādīni phalāni. evamettha pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīnampi sabhāvādito vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti yathāvuttapañcasīlavasena sīlavā. ^b^kalyāṇadhammo^eb^ti sundaradhammo, saraṇagamanaparidīpitāya diṭṭhisampattiyā sampannapaññoti attho. yo pana putto mātāpitūsu assaddhesu dussīlesu ca sayampi tādiso, sopi avajātoyevāti veditabbo. assaddhiyādayo hi idha avajātabhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ vuttā, te ca tasmiṃ saṃvijjanti. mātāpitaro pana upādāya puttassa atijātādibhāvo vuccatīti.
[03] ^b^yo hoti kulagandhano^eb^ti kulacchedako kulavināsako. chedanattho hi idha gandhasaddo, ``uppalagandhapaccatthikā''tiādīsu (pārā0 65) viya. keci pana ``kuladhaṃsano''ti paṭhanti, so evattho.

[03] ^b^ete kho puttā lokasmi^eb^nti ete atijātādayo tayo puttā eva imasmiṃ sattaloke puttā nāma, na ito vinimuttā atthi. imesu pana ^b^ye bhavanti upāsakā^eb^ ye saraṇagamanasampattiyā upāsakā bhavanti kammassakatāñāṇena kammassa kovidā, te ca paṇḍitā paññavanto, pañcasīladasasīlena ^b^sampannā^eb^ paripuṇṇā. yācakānaṃ vacanaṃ jānanti, tesaṃ mukhākāradassaneneva adhippāyapūraṇatoti ^b^vadaññū,^eb^ tesaṃ vā ``dehī''ti vacanaṃ sutvā ``ime pubbe dānaṃ adatvā evaṃbhūtā, mayā pana evaṃ na bhavitabba''nti tesaṃ pariccāgena tadatthaṃ jānantīti vadaññū, paṇḍitānaṃ vā kammassakatādidīpakaṃ vacanaṃ jānantīti vadaññū. ``padaññū''ti ca paṭhanti, padāniyā pariccāgasīlāti attho. tato eva vigatamaccheramalattā ^b^vītamaccharā. abbhaghanā^eb^ti abbhasaṅkhātā ghanā, ghanameghapaṭalā vā ^b^mutto cando^eb^viya, upāsakādiparisāsu khattiyādiparisāsu ca virocare virocanti, sobhantīti attho.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M0.0226^ea^ ^a^V0.0209^ea^ ^a^P2.0058^ea^ ^b^avuṭṭhikasamo^eb^ti avuṭṭhikameghasamo. ekacco hi megho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo hutvā uṭṭhahitvā thananto gajjanto vijjotanto ekaṃ udakabindumpi apātetvā vigacchati, tathūpamo ekacco puggaloti dassento āha ``avuṭṭhikasamo''ti. ^b^padesavassī^eb^ti ekadesavassimeghasamo. padesavassī viyāti hi padesavassī. ekacco ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhitesu manussesu yathā ekacce tementi, ekacce na tementi, evaṃ mandaṃ vassati, tathūpamaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ dasseti ``padesavassī''ti. ^b^sabbatthābhivassī^eb^ti sabbasmiṃ pathavīpabbatasamuddādike jagatippadese abhivassimeghasamo. ekacco hi sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pattharitvā sabbatthakameva abhivassati, taṃ cātuddīpikamahāmeghaṃ ekaccassa puggalassa upamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ ``sabbatthābhivassī''ti.

[03] ^b^sabbesāna^eb^nti sabbesaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^na dātā hotī^eb^ti adānasīlo hoti, thaddhamaccharitāya na kassaci kiñci detīti attho. idāni dānassa khettaṃ deyyadhammañca vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^``samaṇabrāhmaṇā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha samitapāpasamaṇā ceva pabbajjamattasamaṇā ca bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇā ceva jātimattabrāhmaṇā ca idha ``samaṇabrāhmaṇā''ti adhippetā. ^b^kapaṇā^eb^ nāma duggatā daliddamanussā. ^b^addhikā^eb^ nāma pathāvino paribbayavihīnā. ^b^vanibbakā^eb^ nāma ye ``iṭṭhaṃ detha kantaṃ manāpaṃ kālena anavajjaṃ udaggacittā pasannacittā, evaṃ dentā gacchatha sugatiṃ, gacchatha brahmaloka''ntiādinā nayena dāne niyojentā dānassa vaṇṇaṃ thomentā vicaranti. ^b^yācakā^eb^ nāma ye kevalaṃ ``muṭṭhimattaṃ detha, pasatamattaṃ detha, sarāvamattaṃ dethā''ti appakampi yācamānā vicaranti. tattha samaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇena guṇakhettaṃ upakārikhettañca dasseti, kapaṇādiggahaṇena karuṇākhettaṃ. ^b^anna^eb^nti yaṃkiñci khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ. ^b^pāna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0059^ea^ ambapānādipānakaṃ. ^b^vattha^eb^nti nivāsanapārupanādiacchādanaṃ. ^b^yāna^eb^nti rathavayhādi antamaso upāhanaṃ upādāya gamanasādhanaṃ. ^b^mālā^eb^ti ganthitāganthitabhedaṃ sabbaṃ pupphaṃ. ^b^gandha^eb^nti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ pisitaṃ apisitaṃ gandhūpakaraṇañca. ^b^vilepana^eb^nti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. ^b^seyyā^eb^ti mañcapīṭhādi ceva pāvārakojavādi ca sayitabbavatthu. seyyaggahaṇena cettha āsanampi gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^āvasatha^eb^nti vātātapādiparissayavinodanaṃ patissayaṃ. ^b^padīpeyya^eb^nti dīpakapallikādipadīpūpakaraṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0227^ea^ ^b^kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti vijjamānepi deyyadhamme paṭiggāhakānaṃ evaṃ dātabbavatthuṃ sabbena sabbaṃ ^a^V0.0210^ea^ adento puggalo avassikameghasadiso hoti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- bhikkhave, yathā so megho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo hutvā uṭṭhahitvā na kiñci vassi vigacchati, evameva yo uḷāraṃ vipulañca bhogaṃ saṃharitvā gehaṃ āvasanto kassaci kaṭacchumattaṃ bhikkhaṃ vā uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāguṃ vā adatvā vigacchati, vivaso maccuvasaṃ gacchati, so avuṭṭhikasamo nāma hotīti. iminā nayena sesesupi nigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. imesu ca tīsu puggalesu paṭhamo ekaṃseneva garahitabbo, dutiyo pasaṃsanīyo, tatiyo, pasaṃsanīyataro. paṭhamo vā ekanteneva sabbanihīno, dutiyo majjhimo, tatiyo uttamoti veditabbo.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^samaṇe^eb^ti upayogavasena bahuvacanaṃ tathā sesesupi. ^b^laddhānā^eb^ti labhitvā, samaṇe dakkhiṇeyye pavāretvā puṭṭho na saṃvibhajati. ^b^annaṃ pānañca bhojana^eb^nti annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā bhuñjitabbayuttakaṃ bhojanaṃ, taṃ na saṃvibhajati. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- yo atthikabhāvena upagate sampaṭiggāhake labhitvā annādinā saṃvibhāgamattampi na karoti, kiṃ so aññaṃ dānaṃ dassati, ^b^taṃ^eb^ evarūpaṃ thaddhamacchariyaṃ ^b^purisādhamaṃ^eb^ nihīnapuggalaṃ paṇḍitā ^b^avuṭṭhikasamoti āhu^eb^ kathayantīti.

[03] ^b^ekaccānaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0060^ea^ ^b^na dadātī^eb^ti vijjamānepi mahati dātabbadhamme ekesaṃ sattānaṃ tesu kodhavasena vā, deyyadhamme lobhavasena vā na dadāti. ^b^ekaccānaṃ pavecchatī^eb^ti ekesaṃyeva pana dadāti. ^b^medhāvino^eb^ti paññavanto paṇḍitā janā.

[03] ^b^subhikkhavāco^eb^ti yo upagatānaṃ yācakānaṃ ``annaṃ detha, pānaṃ dethā''tiādinā taṃ taṃ dāpeti, so sulabhabhikkhatāya subhikkhā vācā etassāti subhikkhavāco. ``subhikkhavassī''tipi paṭhanti. yathā loko subhikkho hoti, evaṃ sabbatthābhivassitamahāmegho subhikkhavassī nāma hoti. evamayampi mahādānehi sabbatthābhivassī subhikkhavassīti. ^b^āmodamāno pakiretī^eb^ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭhamānaso sahatthena dānaṃ dento paṭiggāhakakhette deyyadhammaṃ pakirento viya hoti, vācāyapi ^b^``detha dethā''ti bhāsati^eb^.

[03] idāni ^a^M0.0228^ea^ naṃ subhikkhavassitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yathāpi megho''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- yathā mahāmegho paṭhamaṃ mandanigghosena thanayitvā puna sakalanadīkandarāni ekaninnādaṃ karonto gajjayitvā pavassati, sabbatthakameva vārinā udakena thalaṃ ninnañca abhisandanto pūreti ekoghaṃ karoti, ^b^evameva^eb^ idha imasmiṃ sattaloke ekacco uḷārapuggalo sabbasamatāya ^a^V0.0211^ea^ so mahāmegho viya vassitabbattā ^b^tādiso^eb^ yathā dhanaṃ ^b^uṭṭhānādhigataṃ^eb^ attano uṭṭhānavīriyābhinibbattaṃ hoti, evaṃ analaso hutvā tañca ^b^dhammena^eb^ ñāyena ^b^saṃharitvā^eb^ tannibbattena annena pānena aññena ca deyyadhammena ^b^patte^eb^ sampatte ^b^vanibbake sammā^eb^ sammadeva desakālānurūpañceva icchānurūpañca ^b^tappeti^eb^ sampavāretīti.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sukhānī^eb^ti sukhanimittāni. ^b^patthayamāno^eb^ti icchamāno ākaṅkhamāno. ^b^sīla^eb^nti gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ pabbajitasīlañca. gahaṭṭho ce gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ, pabbajito ce catupārisuddhisīlanti adhippāyo. ^b^rakkheyyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0061^ea^ samādiyitvā avītikkamanto sammadeva gopeyya. ^b^pasaṃsā me āgacchatū^eb^ti ``mama kalyāṇo kittisaddo āgacchatū''ti icchanto paṇḍito sappañño sīlaṃ rakkheyya. sīlavato hi gahaṭṭhassa tāva ``asuko asukakulassa putto sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo saddho pasanno dāyako kārako''tiādinā parisamajjhe kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, pabbajitassa ``asuko nāma bhikkhu sīlavā vattasampanno sorato sukhasaṃvāso sagāravo sappatisso''tiādinā...pe0... abbhuggacchatīti. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī''ti (a0 ni0 5.213; udā0 76; mahāva0 285).
[02] ``ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu -- `sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo, garu ca bhāvanīyo cā'ti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī''tiādi (ma0 ni0 1.65).

[03] ^b^bhogā me uppajjantū^eb^ti ettha gahaṭṭhassa tāva sīlavato kalyāṇadhammassa yena yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti -- yadi kasiyā, yadi vaṇijjāya, yadi rājaporisena, taṃ taṃ yathākālaṃ yathāvidhiñca ativiya appamattabhāvato athassa anuppannā ceva bhogā uppajjanti, uppannā ca bhogā phātiṃ gamissanti. pabbajitassa pana sīlācārasampannassa appamādavihārissa ^a^V0.0212^ea^ sato sīlasampannassa sīlasampadāya appicchatādiguṇesu ca pasannā manussā uḷāruḷāre paccaye abhiharanti, evamassa anuppannā ceva bhogā uppajjanti, uppannā ca thirā honti. tathā hi vuttaṃ --
[02] ``puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchatī''ti (a0 ni0 5.213; udā0 76; mahāva0 285).
[03] tathā --
[02] ``ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu -- `lābhī assa cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna'nti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.65) ca --
[25] sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^patthayāno^eb^ti patthayanto. ^b^tayo sukhe^eb^ti tīṇi sukhāni. ^b^vittalābha^eb^nti dhanalābhaṃ, bhoguppattinti attho. visesato ^a^P2.0062^ea^ cettha pasaṃsāya cetasikasukhaṃ, bhogehi kāyikasukhaṃ, itarena upapattisukhaṃ; tathā paṭhamena diṭṭhadhammasukhaṃ, tatiyena samparāyasukhaṃ, dutiyena ubhayasukhaṃ gahitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] idāni pasaṃsādikāraṇassa sīlassa viya pasaṃsādīnampi visesakāraṇaṃ pāpamittaparivajjanaṃ kalyāṇamittasevanañca ādīnavānisaṃsehi saddhiṃ dassento ^b^``akaronto''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^saṅkiyo^eb^ti pāpasmiṃ parisaṅkitabbo ``addhā iminā pāpaṃ kataṃ vā karissati vā, tathā hesa ^a^M0.0230^ea^ pāpapurisehi saddhiṃ sañcaratī''ti. ^b^assā^eb^ti imassa pāpajanasevino puggalassa upari, assa vā puggalassa ^b^avaṇṇo^eb^ abhūtopi pāpajanasevitāya ^b^ruhati^eb^ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati pattharati. ^b^assā^eb^ti vā bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ, tasmiṃ puggaleti attho. ^b^sa ve tādisako hotī^eb^ti yo yādisaṃ pāpamittaṃ vā kalyāṇamittaṃ vā bhajati upasevati ca, so puggalo bhūmibhāgavasena udakaṃ viya tādisova hoti, pāpadhammo kalyāṇadhammo vā hoti. kasmā? ^b^sahavāso hi tādiso;^eb^ yasmā sahavāso saṃsaggo uparāgo viya phalikamaṇīsu purisaupanissayabhūtaṃ ^a^V0.0213^ea^ puggalākāraṃ gāhāpeti, tasmā pāpapuggalena saha vāso na kātabboti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^sevamāno sevamāna^eb^nti paraṃ pakatisuddhaṃ puggalaṃ kālena kālaṃ attānaṃ sevamānaṃ sevamāno bhajamāno pāpapuggalo, tena vā seviyamāno. ^b^samphuṭṭho samphusa^eb^nti tena pakatisuddhena puggalena sahavāsena saṃsaggena samphuṭṭho pāpapuggalo sayampi, tathā taṃ phusanto. ^b^saro diddho kalāpaṃ vā^eb^ti yathā nāma saro visena diddho litto sarakalāpagato sarasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ sarakalāpaṃ attanā phuṭṭhaṃ alittampi upalimpati, evaṃ pāpena ^b^upalepabhayā dhīro^eb^ti dhitisampannattā dhīro paṇḍitapuriso pāpasahāyo na bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^pūtimacchaṃ kusaggenā^eb^ti yathā kucchitabhāvena pūtibhūtaṃ macchaṃ kusatiṇaggena yo puriso ^b^upanayhati^eb^ puṭabandhavasena ^a^P2.0063^ea^ bandhati, tassa te kusā apūtikāpi pūtimacchasambandhena pūti duggandhameva vāyanti. ^b^evaṃ bālūpasevanā^eb^ti evaṃsampadā bālajanūpasevanā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^evaṃ dhīrūpasevanā^eb^ti yathā asurabhinopi pattā tagarasambandhena surabhiṃ vāyanti, evaṃ paṇḍitūpasevanā pakatiyā asīlavato sīlasamādānādivasena sīlagandhavāyanassa kāraṇaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā akalyāṇamittasevanāya kalyāṇamittasevanāya ca ayaṃ ediso ādīnavo ānisaṃso ca, tasmā ^b^pattapuṭasseva^eb^ palāsapuṭassa viya duggandhasugandhavatthusaṃsaggena asādhusādhujanasannissayena ca. ^b^ñatvā sampākamattano^eb^ti attano dukkhudrayaṃ sukhudrayañca phalanipphattiṃ ^a^M0.0231^ea^ ñatvā jānitvā ^b^asante^eb^ pāpamitte na upaseveyya, ^b^sante^eb^ upasante vantadose pasatthe vā paṇḍite seveyya. tathā hi ^b^asanto nirayaṃ nenti, santo pāpenti suggati^eb^nti. iti bhagavā paṭhamagāthāya yathāvuttāni tīṇi sukhanimittāni dassetvā tato parāhi pañcahi gāthāhi paṭipakkhaparivajjanena saddhiṃ pasaṃsāsukhassa āgamanaṃ dassetvā osānagāthāya tiṇṇampi sukhānaṃ āgamanakāraṇena saddhiṃ osānasukhaṃ dasseti.
[06] sattamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^bhidurāya^eb^nti bhiduro ayaṃ. ^b^kāyo^eb^ti rūpakāyo. so hi aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca ^a^V0.0214^ea^ samūhaṭṭhena, evaṃ kucchitānaṃ jegucchānaṃ āyo uppattidesotipi kāyo. tatrāyaṃ vacanattho -- āyanti etthāti āyo. ke āyanti? kucchitā kesādayo. iti kucchitānaṃ āyotipi kāyo ^a^P2.0064^ea^. atthato pana catusantativasena pavattamānānaṃ bhūtupādāyadhammānaṃ puñjo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- bhikkhave, ayaṃ catumahābhūtamayo rūpakāyo bhiduro bhedanasīlo bhedanasabhāvo khaṇe khaṇe viddhaṃsanasabhāvoti. ``bhindarāya''ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^viññāṇa^eb^nti tebhūmakaṃ kusalādicittaṃ. vacanattho pana -- taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. yañhi sañjānanapajānanavidhuraṃ ārammaṇavijānanaṃ upaladdhi, taṃ viññāṇaṃ. ^b^virāgadhamma^eb^nti virajjanadhammaṃ, palujjanasabhāvanti attho. ^b^sabbe upadhī^eb^ti khandhūpadhi, kilesūpadhi, abhisaṅkhārūpadhi, pañcakāmaguṇūpadhīti ete ``upadhīyati ettha dukkha''nti upadhisaññitā sabbepi upādānakkhandhakilesābhisaṅkhārapañcakāmaguṇadhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena ^b^aniccā,^eb^ udayabbayappaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena ^b^dukkhā,^eb^ jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbasabhāvatāya pakativijahanaṭṭhena ^b^vipariṇāmadhammā^eb^. evamettha aniccadassanasukhatāya rūpadhamme viññāṇañca visuṃ gahetvā puna upadhivibhāgena sabbepi tebhūmakadhamme ekajjhaṃ gahetvā aniccadukkhānupassanāmukhena tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena sammasanacāro.kathito. kāmañcettha ^a^M0.0232^ea^ lakkhaṇadvayameva pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ, ``yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.15) pana vacanato dukkhalakkhaṇeneva anattalakkhaṇampi dassitamevāti veditabbaṃ.

[01] gāthāyaṃ ^b^upadhīsu bhayaṃ disvā^eb^ti upadhīsu bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇavasena bhayaṃ disvā, tesaṃ bhāyitabbataṃ passitvā. iminā balavavipassanaṃ dasseti. bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇameva hi vibhajitvā visesavasena ādīnavānupassanā nibbidānupassanāti ca vuccati. ^b^jātimaraṇamaccagā^eb^ti evaṃ sammasanto vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggena ghaṭetvā maggaparamparāya arahattaṃ patto jātimaraṇaṃ atīto nāma hoti. kathaṃ? ^b^sampatvā^eb^ ^a^P2.0065^ea^ ^b^paramaṃ santi^eb^nti paramaṃ uttamaṃ anuttaraṃ santiṃ sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantvā. evaṃbhūto ca ^b^kālaṃ kaṅkhati bhāvitatto^eb^ti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ vasena bhāvanābhisamayanipphattiyā bhāvitakāyasīlacittapaññattā bhāvitatto maraṇaṃ jīvitañca anabhinandanto kevalaṃ attano khandhaparinibbānakālaṃ kaṅkhati udikkhati, na tassa katthaci patthanā hotīti. tenāha --
[21] ``nābhinandāmi maraṇaṃ, nābhinandāmi jīvitaṃ.
[21] kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā''ti.. (theragā0 606).
[06] aṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V0.0215^ea^ ^b^dhātuso^eb^ti dhātuto. dhātūti ca ajjhāsayadhātu ajjhāsayasabhāvo adhippeto, yo adhimuttītipi vuccati. ^b^saṃsandantī^eb^ti tāya dhātusabhāgatāya yathādhātu yathāajjhāsayaṃ allīyanti ekato honti. ^b^samentī^eb^ti tāya eva samānajjhāsayatāya ekacittā hutvā samāgacchanti aññamaññaṃ bhajanti upasaṅkamanti, attano rucibhāvakhantidiṭṭhiyo vā tattha tattha same karontā pavattanti. ^b^hīnādhimuttikā^eb^ti hīne kāmaguṇādike adhimutti etesanti hīnādhimuttikā, hīnajjhāsayā. ^b^kalyāṇādhimuttikā^eb^ti kalyāṇe nekkhammādike adhimutti etesanti kalyāṇādhimuttikā, paṇītajjhāsayā. sace hi ācariyupajjhāyā na sīlavanto ^a^M0.0233^ea^, antevāsikasaddhivihārikā ca sīlavanto, te ācariyupajjhāyepi na upasaṅkamanti, attano sadise sāruppabhikkhūyeva upasaṅkamanti. sace pana ācariyupajjhāyā sīlavanto, itare na sīlavanto, tepi na ācariyupajjhāye upasaṅkamanti, attano sadise hīnādhimuttikeyeva upasaṅkamanti. evaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ pana na kevalaṃ etarahi eva, atha kho atītānāgatepīti dassento ^b^``atītampi, bhikkhave''^eb^tiādimāha. saṅkhepato saṃkilesadhammesu abhiniviṭṭhā hīnādhimuttikā ^a^P2.0066^ea^, vodānadhammesu abhiniviṭṭhā kalyāṇādhimuttikā.

[03] idaṃ pana dussīlānaṃ dussīlasevanameva, sīlavantānaṃ sīlavantasevanameva, duppaññānaṃ duppaññasevanameva, paññavantānaṃ paññavantasevanameva ko niyāmetīti? ajjhāsayadhātu niyāmeti. sambahulā kira bhikkhū ekasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāraṃ caranti. te manussā bahuṃ bhattaṃ āharitvā pattāni pūretvā ``yathāsabhāgaṃ paribhuñjathā''ti vatvā uyyojesuṃ. bhikkhū āhaṃsu ``āvuso, manussā dhātusaṃyuttakamme payojentī''ti. evaṃ ajjhāsayadhātu niyāmetīti. dhātusaṃyuttena ayamattho dīpetabbo -- gijjhakūṭapabbatasmiñhi gilānaseyyāya nipanno bhagavā ārakkhatthāya parivāretvā vasantesu sāriputtamoggallānādīsu ekamekaṃ attano parisāya saddhiṃ caṅkamantaṃ oloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, sāriputtaṃ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ caṅkamantanti. evaṃ, bhante. sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū mahāpaññā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.99) sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^saṃsaggā^eb^ti saṃkilesato sahavāsādivasena samāyogato, atha vā dassanasaṃsaggo, savanasaṃsaggo, samullāpasaṃsaggo, sambhogasaṃsaggo, kāyasaṃsaggoti evaṃ pañcavidhe saṃsagge yato kutoci ^a^V0.0216^ea^ saṃsaggato. ^b^vanatho jāto^eb^ti kileso uppanno maggena asamūhato. ^b^asaṃsaggena chijjatī^eb^ti saṃsaggapaṭikkhepena kāyavivekādinā pubbabhāge chijjitvā puna accantāsaṃsaggena samucchedavivekena chijjati pahīyati. ettāvatā saṅkhepato hīnādhimuttiyā samudayo atthaṅgamo ca dassito hoti.

[03] yasmā ^a^M0.0234^ea^ pana te saṃsaggā te ca kilesā kosajjavasena uppajjanti ceva vaḍḍhanti ca, na vīriyārambhavasena, tasmā hīnādhimuttike kusītapuggale vajjetvā kalyāṇādhimuttike āraddhavīriye sevantena asaṃsaggena saṃsaggajo vanatho chinditabboti yathāvuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento kusītasevanāya tāva ādīnavaṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^``parittaṃ dāru''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^parittaṃ dāru^eb^nti khuddakaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ kullaṃ. ^b^yathā sīde mahaṇṇave^eb^ti yathā khuddakaṃ kullaṃ āruhitvā mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo tīraṃ appatvā samuddamajjheyeva ^a^P2.0067^ea^ sīdeyya, patitvā macchakacchapabhakkho bhaveyya. ^b^evaṃ kusītaṃ āgamma, sādhujīvīpi sīdatī^eb^ti evameva kusītaṃ vīriyārambharahitaṃ kilesavasikaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya tena katasaṃsaggo sādhujīvīpi parisuddhājīvo parisuddhasīlopi samāno hīnasaṃsaggato uppannehi kāmavitakkādīhi khajjamāno pāraṃ gantuṃ asamattho saṃsāraṇṇaveyeva sīdati. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā evaṃ anatthāvaho kusītasaṃsaggo, tasmā taṃ āgamma ālasiyānuyogena kucchitaṃ sīdatīti ^b^kusītaṃ^eb^. tato eva ^b^hīnavīriyaṃ^eb^ nibbīriyaṃ akalyāṇamittaṃ ^b^parivajjeyya^eb^. ekanteneva pana kāyavivekādīnañceva tadaṅgavivekādīnañca vasena ^b^pavivittehi,^eb^ tato eva kilesehi ārakattā ^b^ariyehi^eb^ parisuddhehi nibbānaṃ paṭipesitattabhāvato ^b^pahitattehi^eb^ ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānānaṃ vasena jhāyanato ^b^jhāyīhi^eb^ sabbakālaṃ paggahitavīriyatāya ^b^āraddhavīriyehi paṇḍitehi^eb^ sappaññehiyeva saha āvaseyya saṃvaseyyāti.
[06] navamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^parihānāya saṃvattantī^eb^ti avuddhiyā bhavanti, maggādhigamassa paripanthāya honti. adhigatassa pana maggassa parihāni nāma natthi. ``tayo dhammā''ti dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena uddiṭṭhadhamme puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vibhajanto ^b^``idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhū''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^a^V0.0217^ea^ kammaṃ āramitabbato ārāmo etassāti ^b^kammārāmo^eb^. kamme ratoti ^b^kammarato^eb^. kammārāmataṃ kammābhiratiṃ anuyutto payuttoti ^a^M0.0235^ea^ ^b^kammārāmatamanuyutto^eb^. tattha kammaṃ nāma itikattabbaṃ kammaṃ, seyyathidaṃ -- cīvaravicāraṇaṃ, cīvarakaraṇaṃ, upatthambhanaṃ, pattatthavikaṃ, aṃsabandhanaṃ, kāyabandhanaṃ, dhamakaraṇaṃ, ādhārakaṃ, pādakathalikaṃ, sammajjanīti evamādīnaṃ upakaraṇānaṃ karaṇaṃ, yañca vihāre khaṇḍaphullādipaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ ^a^P2.0068^ea^. ekacco hi etāni karonto sakaladivasaṃ etāneva karoti. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. yo pana etesaṃ karaṇavelāyameva etāni karoti, uddesavelāyaṃ uddesaṃ gaṇhāti, sajjhāyavelāyaṃ sajjhāyati, cetiyaṅgaṇavattādikaraṇavelāyaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni karoti, manasikāravelāyaṃ manasikāraṃ karoti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhāne vā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhāne vā, na so kammārāmo nāma. tassa taṃ --
[02] ``yāni kho pana tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiṃkaraṇīyāni, tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupāyāya vīmaṃsāya samannāgato, alaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ saṃvidhātu''nti (dī0 ni0 3.345; a0 ni0 10.18) --
[25] ādinā satthārā anuññātakaraṇameva hoti.

[03] ^b^bhassārāmo^eb^ti yo bhagavatā paṭikkhittarājakathādivasena rattindivaṃ vītināmeti, ayaṃ bhasse pariyantakārī na hotīti bhassārāmo nāma. yo pana rattimpi divāpi dhammaṃ katheti, pañhaṃ vissajjeti, ayaṃ appabhasso bhasse pariyantakārīyeva. kasmā? ``sannipatitānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ -- dhammī vā kathā, ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.273) vuttavidhiṃyeva paṭipannoti.

[03] ^b^niddārāmo^eb^ti yo yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ, passasukhaṃ, middhasukhaṃ anuyuñjati, yo ca gacchantopi nisinnopi ṭhitopi thinamiddhābhibhūto niddāyati, ayaṃ niddārāmo nāma. yassa pana karajakāyagelaññena cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, nāyaṃ niddārāmo, tenevāha --

[02] ``abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, aggivessana, gimhānaṃ pacchime māse pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno niddaṃ okkamitā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.387).

[03] ettha ^a^M0.0236^ea^ ^a^V0.0218^ea^ ca puthujjanakalyāṇakopi sekhotveva veditabbo. tasmā tassa sabbassapi visesādhigamassa itaresaṃ upari visesādhigamassa ca parihānāya vattantīti veditabbaṃ. sukkapakkhassa vuttavipariyāyena atthavibhāvanā veditabbā.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^uddhato^eb^ti cittavikkhepakarena uddhaccena uddhato avūpasanto. ^b^appakiccassā^eb^ti anuññātassapi vuttappakārassa kiccassa yuttappayuttakāleyeva karaṇato appakicco assa bhaveyya. ^b^appamiddho^eb^ti ^a^P2.0069^ea^ ``divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā''tiādinā vuttajāgariyānuyogena niddārahito assa. ^b^anuddhato^eb^ti bhassārāmatāya uppajjanakacittavikkhepassa abhassārāmo hutvā parivajjanena na uddhato vūpasantacitto, samāhitoti attho. sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva. iti imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamadutiyapañcamachaṭṭhasattamāṭṭhamanavamesu suttesu vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, itaresu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ.
[06] dasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] tatiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ catutthavaggassa ^a^V0.0219^ea^ paṭhame ^b^akusalavitakkā^eb^ti akosallasambhūtā vitakkā, micchāvitakkāti attho. ^b^anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti ettha ^b^anavaññattī^eb^ti anavaññā parehi attano ahīḷitatā aparibhūtatā, ``aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyu''nti evaṃ pavatto icchācāro, tāya anavaññattiyā paṭisaṃyutto saṃsaṭṭho, taṃ vā ārabbha pavatto anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. tasmā ``kathaṃ nu kho maṃ pare gahaṭṭhā ceva pabbajitā ca na orakato daheyyu''nti sambhāvanakamyatāya icchācāre, ṭhatvā pavattitavitakkassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti cīvarādilābhena ceva sakkārena ca kittisaddena ^a^M0.0237^ea^ ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto. ^b^parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti paresu anuddayatāpatirūpakena gehasitapemena paṭisaṃyutto. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ --

[02] ``saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi brāhmaṇehi gahapatikehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi sahanandī sahasokī, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanāva yogaṃ āpajjatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.3; 4.241; vibha0 888).

[03] gāthāsu anavaññattiyā paṭisaṃyutto puggalo ^b^anavaññattisaṃyutto^eb^. lābhasakkāre ^a^P2.0070^ea^ gāravo etassa, na dhammeti ^b^lābhasakkāragāravo^eb^. sukhadukkhesu amā saha bhavāti amaccā, sahāyasadisā upaṭṭhākā. tehi gehasitapemavasena saha nandanasīlo ^b^sahanandī amaccehi,^eb^ iminā parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vitakkaṃ dasseti. ^b^ārā saṃyojanakkhayā^eb^ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi abhibhūto puggalo saṃyojanakkhayato arahattato dūre, tassa taṃ dullabhanti attho.

[03] ^b^puttapasu^eb^nti putte ca pasavo ca. puttasaddena cettha dārādayo; pasusaddena assamahiṃsakhettavatthādayo ^a^V0.0220^ea^ ca saṅgahitā. ^b^vivāhe^eb^ti vivāhakārāpane. iminā āvāhopi saṅgahito. ^b^saṃharānī^eb^ti pariggahāni, parikkhārasaṅgahānīti attho. ``santhavānī''ti ca paṭhanti, mittasanthavānīti attho. sabbattha hitvāti sambandho. ^b^bhabbo so tādiso bhikkhū^eb^ti so yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ papañcaṃ pariccajitvā yathā satthārā vuttāya sammāpaṭipattiyā, tathā passitabbato tādiso saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhatīti ^b^bhikkhu uttamaṃ sambodhiṃ^eb^ arahattaṃ pattuṃ arahati.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^sakkārenā^eb^ti sakkārena hetubhūtena, atha vā ^b^sakkārenā^eb^ti sakkārahetunā, sakkārahetukena vā. sakkārañhi nissāya ^a^M0.0238^ea^ idhekacce puggalā pāpicchā icchāpakatā icchācāre ṭhatvā ``sakkāraṃ nibbattessāmā''ti anekavihitaṃ anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti, apare yathāsakkāraṃ labhitvā tannimittaṃ mānamadamacchariyādivasena pamādaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``sakkārena abhibhūtā pariyādinnacittā''ti. tattha ^b^abhibhūtā^eb^ti ajjhotthaṭā. ^b^pariyādinnacittā^eb^ti khepitacittā, icchācārena mānamadādinā ca khayaṃ pāpitakusalacittā. atha vā ^b^pariyādinnacittā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0071^ea^ parito ādinnacittā, vuttappakārena akusalakoṭṭhāsena yathā kusalacittassa uppattivāro na hoti, evaṃ samantato gahitacittasantānāti attho. ^b^asakkārenā^eb^ti hīḷetvā paribhavitvā parehi attani pavattitena asakkārena hetunā, asakkārahetukena vā mānādinā. ^b^sakkārena ca asakkārena cā^eb^ti kehici pavattitena sakkārena kehici pavattitena asakkārena ca. ye hi kehici paṭhamaṃ sakkatā hutvā tehiyeva asārabhāvaṃ ñatvā pacchā asakkatā honti, tādise sandhāya vuttaṃ ``sakkārena ca asakkārena cā''ti.
[03] ettha sakkārena abhibhūtā devadattādayo nidassetabbā. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷaṃ.
[22] sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti, gabbho assatariṃ yathā''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.183; a0 ni0 4.68; cūḷava0 335).
[03] sādhūnaṃ ^a^V0.0221^ea^ upari katena asakkārena abhibhūtā daṇḍakīrājakāliṅgarājamajjharājādayo nidassetabbā. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``kisañhi vacchaṃ avakiriya daṇḍakī,
[27] ucchinnamūlo sajano saraṭṭho.
[26] kukkuḷanāme nirayamhi paccati,
[22] tassa phuliṅgāni patanti kāye..
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0239^ea^ saññate pabbajite avañcayi,
[27] dhammaṃ bhaṇante samaṇe adūsake.
[26] taṃ nāḷikeraṃ sunakhā parattha,
[22] saṅgamma khādanti viphandamānaṃ''.. (jā0 2.17.70-71).
[21] ``upahacca manaṃ majjho, mātaṅgasmiṃ yasassine.
[22] sapārisajjo ucchinno, majjhāraññaṃ tadā ahū''ti.. (jā0 2.19.96).
[03] sakkārena ca asakkārena ca abhibhūtā aññatitthiyā nāṭaputtādayo nidassetabbā.

[03] gāthāsu ^a^P2.0072^ea^ ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti ubhayena sakkārena ca asakkārena ca. ^b^samādhi na vikampatī^eb^ti na calati, ekaggabhāvena tiṭṭhati. kassa pana na calatīti āha ``appamādavihārino''ti. yo pamādakaradhammānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā appamādavihārī arahā, tassa. so hi lokadhammehi na vikampati. ^b^sukhumadiṭṭhivipassaka^eb^nti phalasamāpattiatthaṃ sukhumāya diṭṭhiyā paññāya abhiṇhaṃ pavattavipassanattā sukhumadiṭṭhivipassakaṃ. ^b^upādānakkhayārāma^eb^nti catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ āramitabbaṃ etassāti upādānakkhayārāmaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V0.0222^ea^ ^b^devesū^eb^ti ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaradeve ceva asaññadeve ca tadaññesu upapattidevesu. ^b^devasaddā^eb^ti devānaṃ pītisamudāhārasaddā. ^b^niccharantī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena pavattanti. ^b^samayā samayaṃ upādāyā^eb^ti samayato samayaṃ paṭicca. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yasmiṃ kāle ṭhitā te devā taṃ kālaṃ āgamma naṃ passissanti, tato taṃ samayaṃ sampattaṃ āgammāti. ``samayaṃ samayaṃ upādāyā''ti ca keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ ^a^M0.0240^ea^ taṃ taṃ samayaṃ paṭiccāti attho. ^b^yasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti yadā ``aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.234; pāci0 417), ``sambādho gharāvāso''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.191; saṃ0 ni0 2.154) ca kāmesu gharāvāse ca ādīnavā, tappaṭipakkhato nekkhamme ānisaṃsā ca sudiṭṭhā honti, tasmiṃ samaye. tadā hissa ekantena pabbajjāya cittaṃ namati. ^b^ariyasāvako^eb^ti ariyassa buddhassa bhagavato sāvako, sāvakabhāvaṃ upagantukāmo, ariyasāvako vā avassaṃbhāvī ^a^P2.0073^ea^. antimabhavikaṃ sāvakabodhisattaṃ sandhāya ayamārambho. ^b^kesamassuṃ ohāretvā^eb^ti kese ca massuñca ohāretvā apanetvā. ^b^kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā^eb^ti kasāyena rattatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. ^b^agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya cetetī^eb^ti agārasmā gharā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajeyyanti pabbajjāya ceteti pakappeti, pabbajatīti attho. ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya natthi, tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyanti ñātabbā.

[03] ^b^mārenā^eb^ti kilesamārena. ^b^saṅgāmāya cetetī^eb^ti yujjhanatthāya cittaṃ uppādeti, māraṃ abhivijetuṃ sannayhati. yasmā pana evarūpassa paṭipajjanakapuggalassa devaputtamāropi antarāyāya upakkamati, tasmā tassapi vasena mārenāti ettha devaputtamārenātipi attho veditabbo. tassāpi ayaṃ icchāvighātaṃ karissatevāti. yasmā pana pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya khuraggato vā paṭṭhāya sīlāni samādiyanto parisodhento samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto yathārahaṃ tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanappahānānaṃ vasena kilesamāraṃ paripāteti nāma, na yujjhati nāma sampahārassa abhāvato, tasmā vuttaṃ ``mārena saddhiṃ saṅgāmāya cetetī''ti.

[03] ^b^sattanna^eb^nti koṭṭhāsato sattannaṃ, pabhedato pana te sattatiṃsa honti. kathaṃ? cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā ^a^V0.0223^ea^, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti. evaṃ pabhedato sattatiṃsavidhāpi satipaṭṭhānādikoṭṭhāsato satteva hontīti vuttaṃ ``sattanna''nti. ^b^bodhipakkhiyāna^eb^nti bujjhanaṭṭhena bodhīti laddhanāmassa ariyapuggalassa maggañāṇasseva vā pakkhe bhavānaṃ ^a^P2.0074^ea^ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ ^a^M0.0241^ea^, bodhikoṭṭhāsiyānanti attho. ``bodhipakkhikāna''ntipi pāṭho, bodhipakkhavantānaṃ, bodhipakkhe vā niyuttānanti attho. ^b^bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto^eb^ti vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggabhāvanānuyogamanuyutto. vipassanākkhaṇe hi satipaṭṭhānādayo pariyāyena bodhipakkhiyā nāma, maggakkhaṇeyeva pana te nippariyāyena bodhipakkhiyā nāma honti.

[03] ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^ti kāmāsavādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ āsavānaṃ khayā. āsavesu hi khīṇesu sabbe kilesā khīṇāyeva honti. tena arahattamaggo vutto hoti. ^b^anāsava^eb^nti āsavavirahitaṃ. ^b^cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimutti^eb^nti ettha cetovacanena arahattaphalasamādhi, paññāvacanena taṃsampayuttā ca paññā vuttā. tattha samādhi rāgato vimuttattā cetovimutti, paññā avijjāya vimuttattā paññāvimuttīti veditabbā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``yo hissa, bhikkhave, samādhi, tadassa samādhindriyaṃ. yā hissa, bhikkhave, paññā, tadassa paññindriyaṃ. iti kho, bhikkhave, rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.516).

[03] apicettha samathaphalaṃ cetovimutti, vipassanāphalaṃ paññāvimuttīti veditabbā. ^b^diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā^eb^ti attanāyeva abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā aparappaccayena ñatvā. ^b^upasampajja viharatī^eb^ti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā viharati. ^b^tameva saṅgāmasīsaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasatī^eb^ti māraṃ abhivijinitvā vijitavijayattā tena katasaṅgāmasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa sīsabhūtaṃ arahattaphalasamāpattīssariyaṭṭhānaṃ, abhibhavanto āvasati, samāpajjati icceva attho. ime ca devasaddā diṭṭhasaccesu devesu pavattanti, visesato suddhāvāsadevesūti veditabbaṃ.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^mahanta^eb^nti sīlādiguṇamahattena mahantaṃ. ^b^vītasārada^eb^nti ^a^P2.0075^ea^ sārajjakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena vigatasārajjaṃ apagatamaṅkubhāvaṃ. ^b^purisājaññā^eb^ti assādīsu assājānīyādayo viya purisesu ājānīyabhūtā ^a^M0.0242^ea^ uttamapurisā. ^b^dujjayamajjhabhū^eb^ti pacurajanehi jetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ kilesavāhiniṃ abhibhavi ajjhotthari. ``ajjayī''tipi paṭhanti, ajinīti attho. ^b^jetvāna maccuno^eb^ ^a^V0.0224^ea^ ^b^senaṃ, vimokkhena anāvara^eb^nti lokattayābhibyāpanato diyaḍḍhasahassādivibhāgato ca vipulattā aññehi āvarituṃ paṭisedhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca anāvaraṃ, maccuno mārassa senaṃ vimokkhena ariyamaggena jetvā yo tvaṃ dujjayaṃ ajayi, tassa namo, te purisājaññāti sambandho.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti vuttappakārena. ^b^hi^eb^-iti nipātamattaṃ. etaṃ ^b^pattamānasaṃ^eb^ adhigatārahattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ ^b^devatā^eb^ ^b^namassantī^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti. atha vā ^b^itī^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena. kiṃ pana etaṃ kāraṇaṃ? namucisenāvijayena pattamānasattaṃ. iminā kāraṇena taṃ devatā namassantīti attho. idāni taṃ kāraṇaṃ phalato dassetuṃ ^b^``tañhi tassa na passanti, yena maccuvasaṃ vaje''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tassattho -- yasmā tassa purisājaññassa paṇidhāya gavesantāpi devā aṇumattampi taṃ kāraṇaṃ na passanti, yena so maccuno maraṇassa vasaṃ vaje upagaccheyya. tasmā taṃ visuddhidevā namassantīti.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^yadā^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^devo^eb^ti upapattidevo. tayo hi devā -- sammutidevā, upapattidevā, visuddhidevāti. tesu ^b^sammutidevā^eb^ nāma rājāno khattiyā. ^b^upapattidevā^eb^ nāma cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya taduparidevā. ^b^visuddhidevā^eb^ nāma khīṇāsavā. idha pana kāmāvacaradevo adhippeto. tena vuttaṃ ``devoti upapattidevo''ti. ^b^devakāyā^eb^ti devasamūhato, devaṭṭhānato vā, devalokatoti attho. samūhanivāsavācako hi ayaṃ kāyasaddo. ^b^cavanadhammo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0076^ea^ maraṇadhammo, āyukkhayena vā puññakkhayena vā upaṭṭhitamaraṇoti attho.

[03] ^b^pañcassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0243^ea^ ^b^pubbanimittāni pātubhavantī^eb^ti assa upaṭṭhitamaraṇassa devaputtassa pañca maraṇassa pubbanimittāni uppajjanti, pakāsāni vā honti. ^b^mālā milāyantī^eb^ti tena piḷandhitamālā majjhanhikasamaye ātape khittā viya milātā vihatasobhā honti.

[03] ^b^vatthāni kilissantī^eb^ti saradasamaye vigatavalāhake ākāse abbhussakkamānabālasūriyasadisappabhāni ^a^V0.0225^ea^ nānāvirāgavaṇṇāni tena nivatthapārutavatthāni taṃ khaṇaṃyeva kaddame khipitvā madditāni viya vihatappabhāni malināni honti.

[03] ^b^kacchehi sedā muccantī^eb^ti suparisuddhajātimaṇi viya susikkhitasippācariyaracitasuvaṇṇapaṭimā viya ca pubbe sedamalajallikārahitasarīrassa tasmiṃ khaṇe ubhohi kacchehi sedadhārā sandanti paggharanti. na kevalañca kacchehiyeva, sakalasarīratopi panassa sedajalakaṇṇikā muccatiyeva, yena āmuttamuttājālagavacchito viya tassa kāyo hoti.

[03] ^b^kāye dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkamatī^eb^ti pubbe paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yathānubhāvaṃ ekayojanaṃ dviyojanaṃ yāva dvādasayojanamattampi padesaṃ ābhāya pharitvā vijjotamāno kāyo hoti khaṇḍiccapāliccādivirahito, na sītaṃ na uṇhaṃ upaghātakaṃ, devadhītā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti, devaputto vīsativassuddesiko viya, taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nippabhe nitteje kāye virūpabhāvo anupavisati saṇṭhāti.

[03] ^b^sake devo devāsane nābhiramatī^eb^ti attano accharāgaṇehi saddhiṃ kīḷanaparicaraṇakadibbāsane na ramati, na cittassādaṃ labhati. tassa kira manussagaṇanāya sattahi divasehi maraṇaṃ bhavissatīti imāni pubbanimittāni pātubhavanti. so tesaṃ uppattiyā ``evarūpāya nāma sampattiyā vinā bhavissāmī''ti balavasokābhibhūto hoti. tenassa kāye mahāpariḷāho ^a^P2.0077^ea^ uppajjati, tena sabbato gattehi sedā muccanti. cirataraṃ kālaṃ aparicitadukkho taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto ekacco ``dayhāmi dayhāmī''ti kandanto paridevanto katthaci assādaṃ alabhanto vijappanto vilapanto tahiṃ tahiṃ āhiṇḍati. ekacco satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ^a^M0.0244^ea^ kāyavācāhi vikāraṃ akarontopi piyavippayogadukkhaṃ asahanto vihaññamāno vicarati.

[03] imāni pana pubbanimittāni yathā loke mahāpuññānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃyeva ukkāpātabhūmicālacandaggāhādīni nimittāni paññāyanti, na sabbesaṃ; evameva mahesakkhadevānaṃyeva paññāyati. uppannāni ca tāni ``imāni maraṇassa pubbanimittāni nāmā''ti keci devā jānanti, na sabbe. tattha yo mandena kusalakammena nibbatto, so ``idāni ko jānāti, `kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī'''ti bhāyati. yo pana mahāpuñño, so ``bahuṃ mayā dānaṃ dinnaṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhitaṃ, puññaṃ upacitaṃ, ito cutassa me sugatiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā''ti na ^a^V0.0226^ea^ bhāyati na vikampati. evaṃ upaṭṭhitapubbanimittaṃ pana taṃ gahetvā devatā nandanavanaṃ pavesenti sabbadevalokesu nandanavanaṃ atthiyeva.

[03] ^b^tīhi vācāhi anumodentī^eb^ti idāni vuccamānehi tīhi vacanehi anumodenti, modaṃ pamodaṃ uppādenti, assāsenti, abhivadanavasena vā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ pamodaṃ karonti. keci pana ``anumodentī''ti padassa ``ovadantī''ti vadanti. ^b^ito^eb^ti devalokato. ^b^bho^eb^ti ālapanaṃ. ^b^sugati^eb^nti sundaragatiṃ, manussalokaṃ sandhāya vadanti. ^b^gacchā^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upehi.

[03] ^b^evaṃ vutte^eb^ti evaṃ tadā tehi devehi tassa ``ito bho sugatiṃ gacchā''tiādinā vattabbavacane bhagavatā vutte ^b^aññataro^eb^ nāmagottena apākaṭo tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno anusandhikusalo eko bhikkhu ``ete sugatiādayo bhagavatā avisesato vuttā avibhūtā, handa te vibhūtatare kārāpessāmī''ti etaṃ ``kiṃnu kho, bhante''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. saddhādiguṇavisesapaṭilābhakāraṇato devūpapattihetuto ca manussattaṃ devānaṃ ^a^P2.0078^ea^ abhisammatanti āha ^b^``manussattaṃ kho bhikkhu devānaṃ sugatigamanasaṅkhāta''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^sugatigamanasaṅkhāta^eb^nti ``sugatigamana''nti sammā kathitaṃ, vaṇṇitaṃ thomitanti attho. ^b^yaṃ manussabhūto^eb^ti ettha ^b^ya^eb^nti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tena ^b^paṭilabhatī^eb^ti ettha paṭilabhanakiriyā āmasīyati, yo saddhāpaṭilābhoti attho. ^b^manussabhūto^eb^ti manussesu uppanno, manussabhāvaṃ vā ^a^M0.0245^ea^ patto. yasmā devaloke uppannānaṃ tathāgatassa dhammadesanā yebhuyyena dullabhā savanāya, na tathā manussānaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ``manussabhūto''ti. ^b^tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye^eb^ti tathāgatena bhagavatā desite sikkhattayasaṅgahe sāsane. tañhi dhammato anapetattā dhammo ca, āsayānurūpaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanato vinayo cāti dhammavinayo, upanissayasampattiyā vā dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ apparajakkhajātikaṃ vinetīti dhammavinayo. dhammeneva vā vinayo, na daṇḍasatthehīti dhammavinayo, dhammayutto vā vinayoti dhammavinayo, dhammāya vā saha maggaphalanibbānāya vinayoti dhammavinayo, mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādidhammato vā pavatto vinayoti dhammavinayo. dhammo vā bhagavā dhammabhūto dhammakāyo dhammassāmī, tassa dhammassa vinayo, na takkiyānanti dhammavinayo, dhamme vā maggaphale nipphādetabbavisayabhūte vā pavatto vinayoti dhammavinayoti vuccati. tasmiṃ dhammavinaye.

[03] ^b^saddhaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0227^ea^ ^b^paṭilabhatī^eb^ti ``svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo''tiādinā saddhaṃ uppādeti. saddho hi imasmiṃ dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthe ārādhessati. ^b^suladdhalābhasaṅkhāta^eb^nti ettha yathā hiraññasuvaṇṇakhettavatthādilābho sattānaṃ upabhogasukhaṃ āvahati, khuppipāsādidukkhaṃ paṭibāhati, dhanadāliddiyaṃ vūpasameti, muttādiratanapaṭilābhahetu hoti, lokasantatiñca āvahati; evaṃ lokiyalokuttarā saddhāpi yathāsambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ vipākasukhamāvahati, saddhādhurena paṭipannānaṃ ^a^P2.0079^ea^ jātijarādidukkhaṃ paṭibāhati, guṇadāliddiyaṃ vūpasameti, satisambojjhaṅgādiratanapaṭilābhahetu hoti, lokasantatiñca āvahati. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``saddho sīlena sampanno, yaso bhogasamappito.
[22] yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito''ti.. (dha0 pa0 303).

[03] evaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhassa suladdhalābhatā veditabbā. yasmā panāyaṃ saddhāpaṭilābho anugāmiko anaññasādhāraṇo sabbasampattihetu, lokiyassa ca hiraññasuvaṇṇādidhanalābhassa kāraṇaṃ. saddhoyeva hi dānādīni puññāni katvā uḷāruḷāravittūpakaraṇāni adhigacchati, tehi ca attano ^a^M0.0246^ea^ paresañca atthameva sampādeti. assaddhassa pana tāni anatthāvahāni honti, idha ceva samparāye cāti, evampi saddhāya suladdhalābhatā veditabbā. tathā hi --
[01] ``saddhā bandhati pātheyyaṃ''. (saṃ0 ni0 1.79).
[01] ``saddhā dutiyā purisassa hotī''ti ca. (saṃ0 ni0 1.36, 59).
[01] ``saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha''nti ca. (saṃ0 ni0 1.73; su0 ni0 184).
[01] ``saddhāhattho mahānāgo''ti ca. (a0 ni0 6.43; theragā0 694).
[01] ``saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhī''ti ca. (saṃ0 ni0 1.197; su0 ni0 77).
[01] ``saddhesiko, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako''ti (a0 ni0 7.67) ca.
[03] ``saddhāya tarati ogha''nti ca. (saṃ0 ni0 1.246) --
[25] anekesu ṭhānesu anekehi kāraṇehi saddhā saṃvaṇṇitā.

[03] idāni yāya saddhāya sāsane kusaladhammesu suppatiṭṭhito nāma hoti niyāmokkantiyā, taṃ saddhaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sā kho panassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^assā^eb^ti imassa bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^niviṭṭhā^eb^ti abhiniviṭṭhā cittasantānaṃ anupaviṭṭhā. ^b^mūlajātā^eb^ti jātamūlā. kiṃ pana saddhāya mūlaṃ ^a^V0.0228^ea^ nāma? saddheyyavatthusmiṃ okappanahetubhūto upāyamanasikāro. apica sappurisasevanā saddhammassavanaṃ yonisomanasikāro dhammānudhammappaṭipattīti cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni mūlāni veditabbāni. ^b^patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti ariyamaggādhigamena kenaci akampanīyabhāvena avaṭṭhitā. tenevāha ``daḷhā asaṃhāriyā''ti. ^b^daḷhā^eb^ti thirā. ^b^asaṃhāriyā^eb^ti kenaci saṃharituṃ vā hāpetuṃ vā apanetuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyā. iti te devā tassa sotāpattimaggasamadhigamaṃ āsīsantā evaṃ vadanti. attano devaloke kāmasukhūpabhogārahameva hi ariyapuggalaṃ te icchanti. tenāha ^a^P2.0080^ea^ ``ehi, deva, punappuna''nti.

[03] gāthāsu puññakkhayamaraṇampi jīvitindriyupacchedeneva hotīti āha ^b^``cavati āyusaṅkhayā''^eb^ti. ^b^anumodata^eb^nti anumodantānaṃ. ^b^manussānaṃ sahabyata^eb^nti ^a^M0.0247^ea^ manussehi sahabhāvaṃ. saha byetīti sahabyo, sahapavattanako, tassa bhāvo sahabyatā. ^b^niviṭṭhassā^eb^ti niviṭṭhā bhaveyya. ^b^yāvajīva^eb^nti yāva jīvitappavattiyā, yāva parinibbānāti attho.

[03] ^b^appamāṇa^eb^nti sakkaccaṃ bahuṃ uḷāraṃ bahukkhattuñca karaṇavasena pamāṇarahitaṃ. ^b^nirūpadhi^eb^nti kilesūpadhirahitaṃ, suvisuddhaṃ nimmalanti attho. yasmā pana te devā mahaggatakusalaṃ na icchanti kāmalokasamatikkamanato, kāmāvacarapuññameva icchanti, tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo -- ``ito devalokato cuto manussesu uppajjitvā viññutaṃ patto kāyaduccaritādiṃ sabbaṃ duccaritaṃ pahāya kāyasucaritādiṃ sabbaṃ sucaritaṃ uḷāraṃ vipulaṃ upacinitvā ariyamaggena āgatasaddho bhavāhī''ti. yasmā pana lokuttaresu paṭhamamaggaṃ dutiyamaggampi vā icchanti attano devalokūpapattiyā anativattanato, tasmā tesampi vasena ``appamāṇaṃ nirūpadhi''ntipadānaṃ attho veditabbo -- pamāṇakarānaṃ diṭṭhekaṭṭhaoḷārikakāmarāgādikilesānaṃ upacchedena ^b^appamāṇaṃ,^eb^ sattamabhavato vā uppajjanārahassa khandhūpadhissa taṃnibbattakābhisaṅkhārūpadhissa taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesūpadhissa ca pahānena tesaṃ anibbattanato nirupadhisaṅkhātanibbānasannissitattā ca ^b^nirupadhī^eb^ti.

[03] evaṃ accantameva apāyadvārapidhāyakaṃ kammaṃ dassetvā idāni saggasampattinibbattakakammaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tato opadhika''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^opadhika^eb^nti upadhivepakkaṃ attabhāvasampattiyā ceva bhogasampattiyā ca nibbattakanti attho. ^b^upadhī^eb^ti hi attabhāvo vuccati. yathāha ``santekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni upadhisampattipaṭibāhitāni na vipaccantī''ti ^a^P2.0081^ea^ (vibha0 810). kāmaguṇāpi. yathāha ``upadhīhi narassa socanā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.12; su0 ni0 34). tatrāyaṃ ^a^V0.0229^ea^ vacanattho -- upadhīyati ettha sukhadukkhanti upadhi, attabhāvo kāmaguṇā ca. upadhikaraṇaṃ sīlaṃ etassa, upadhiṃ vā arahatīti opadhikaṃ, puññaṃ, taṃ bahuṃ uḷāraṃ katvā. kathaṃ? ^b^dānena^eb^. dānañhi itarehi sukaranti evaṃ vuttaṃ. dānenāti vā padena abhayadānampi vuttaṃ, na āmisadānamevāti sīlassāpi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. yasmā pana te devā asurakāyahāniṃ ekanteneva devakāyapāripūriñca icchanti, tasmā tassa upāyaṃ ^a^M0.0248^ea^ dassentā ^b^``aññepi macce saddhamme, brahmacariye nivesayā''^eb^ti dhammadāne niyojenti. ^b^yadā vidū^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle devā devaṃ cavantaṃ vidū vijāneyyuṃ, tadā imāya yathāvuttāya anukampāya dukkhāpanayanakamyatāya ``deva, ime devakāye punappunaṃ uppajjanavasena ^b^ehi^eb^ āgacchāhī''ti ca anumodentīti.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^loke^eb^ti ettha tayo lokā -- sattaloko, saṅkhāraloko, okāsalokoti. tesu indriyabaddhānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānañca santānavasena vattamānānaṃ samūho sattaloko, pathavīpabbatādibhedo okāsaloko, ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko. tesu sattaloko idha adhippeto. tasmā ^b^loke^eb^ti sattaloke. tatthāpi na devaloke, na brahmaloke, manussaloke. manussalokepi na aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe, imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe. tatrāpi na sabbaṭṭhānesu, ``puratthimāya disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo, tassa aparena mahāsālā, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe; puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya sallavatī nāma nadī, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe; dakkhiṇāya disāya setakaṇṇikaṃ nāma nigamo, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā ^a^P2.0082^ea^, orato majjhe; pacchimāya disāya thūṇaṃ nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe; uttarāya disāya usiraddhajo nāma pabbato, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe''ti (mahāva0 259) evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimadese uppajjati tathāgato. na kevalañca tathāgatova paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asītimahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā cakkavattirājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti. idha pana tathāgatavāreyeva sabbatthakavasena ayaṃ nayo labbhati, itaresu ekadesavasena.

[03] ^b^uppajjamānā^eb^ ^a^M0.0249^ea^ ^a^V0.0230^ea^ ^b^uppajjantī^eb^ti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva, uppajjantā bahujanahitatthāya uppajjanti, na aññena kāraṇenāti evamettha attho veditabbo. evarūpañhettha saddalakkhaṇaṃ na sakkā aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ.

[03] apica uppajjamāno nāma uppajjati nāma uppanno nāmāti ayaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. tathāgato hi mahābhinīhāraṃ karonto, buddhakare dhamme pariyesanto, pāramiyo pūrento, pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajanto, ñātatthacariyaṃ caranto, lokatthacariyaṃ, buddhatthacariyaṃ koṭiṃ pāpento, pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane tiṭṭhanto, tato otaritvā carimabhave paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanto, agāramajjhe vasanto, abhinikkhamanto, mahāpadhānaṃ padahanto, paripakkañāṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamento paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto, majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhento, pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anekākāraṃ sabbasaṅkhāre sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhanto yāva anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikarontopi ^b^uppajjamāno^eb^ eva nāma, arahattamaggakkhaṇe ^b^uppajjati^eb^ nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe pana ^b^uppanno^eb^ nāma. buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīnaṃ uppādanakiccaṃ atthi, saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi buddhaguṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti. tasmā ^a^P2.0083^ea^ te nibbattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppannā nāma honti. idha arahattaphalakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya ``uppajjatī''ti vutto. uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.

[03] sāvakopi khīṇāsavo sāvakabodhiyā hetubhūte puññasambhāre sambharanto pubbayogaṃ pubbacariyaṃ gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento carimabhave nibbattanto anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajjāya cetayamāno pabbajjaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā sīlādīni paripūrento dhutadhamme samādāya vattamāno jāgariyaṃ anuyuñjanto ñāṇāni nibbattento vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā heṭṭhimamagge adhigacchantopi ^b^uppajjamāno^eb^ eva nāma, arahattamaggakkhaṇe ^b^uppajjati^eb^ nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe pana ^b^uppanno^eb^ nāma. sekkho pana pubbūpanissayato paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhuñāṇā ^b^uppajjamāno^eb^ nāma, paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe ^b^uppajjati^eb^ nāma, paṭhamaphalakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya ^b^uppanno^eb^ nāma. ettāvatā ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjantī''ti padānaṃ attho vutto hoti.

[03] idāni ^a^M0.0250^ea^ ^b^bahujanahitāyā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^bahujanahitāyā^eb^ti mahājanassa hitatthāya. ^b^bahujanasukhāyā^eb^ti mahājanassa sukhatthāya. ^b^lokānukampāyā^eb^ti sattalokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca. katarasattalokassāti ^a^V0.0231^ea^? yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā dhammaṃ paṭivijjhati, amatapānaṃ pivati, tassa. bhagavato hi dhammacakkappavattanasuttantadesanāya aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo dhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu. evaṃ yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā dhammaṃ paṭividdhasattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi, mahāsamayasuttantadesanāyaṃ maṅgalasuttaṃ, cūḷarāhulovādaṃ, samacittadesanāyanti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayaṃ pattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi. evametassa aparimāṇassa sattalokassa anukampāya. sāvakassa pana arahato sekkhassa ca lokānukampāya uppatti dhammasenāpatiādīhi dhammabhaṇḍāgārikādīhi ca desitadesanāya paṭivedhappattasattānaṃ ^a^P2.0084^ea^ vasena, aparabhāge ca mahāmahindattherādīhi desitadesanāya paṭividdhasaccānaṃ vasena, yāvajjatanā ito paraṃ anāgate ca sāsanaṃ nissāya saggamokkhamaggesu patiṭṭhahantānaṃ vasenapi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.

[03] apica ^b^bahujanahitāyā^eb^ti bahujanassa hitatthāya, nesaṃ paññāsampattiyā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikahitūpadesakoti. ^b^bahujanasukhāyā^eb^ti bahujanassa sukhatthāya, cāgasampattiyā upakaraṇasukhasampadāyakoti. ^b^lokānukampāyā^eb^ti lokassa anukampanatthāya, mettākaruṇāsampattiyā mātāpitaro viya lokassa rakkhitā gopitāti. ^b^atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna^eb^nti idha devamanussaggahaṇena bhabbapuggale veneyyasatte eva gahetvā tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya tathāgatassa uppatti dassitā paṭhamavāre, dutiyatatiyavāresu pana arahato sekkhassa ca vasena yojetabbaṃ. tattha ^b^atthāyā^eb^ti iminā paramatthāya, nibbānāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^hitāyā^eb^ti taṃsampāpakamaggatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttariṃ hitaṃ nāma natthi. ^b^sukhāyā^eb^ti phalasamāpattisukhatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti, tato uttari sukhābhāvato. vuttañhetaṃ ``ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko''ti (dī0 ni0 3.355; a0 ni0 5.27; vibha0 804).

[03] ^b^tathāgato^eb^tiādīnaṃ ^a^M0.0251^ea^ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto. ^b^vijjācaraṇasampanno^eb^tiādīsu tissopi vijjā bhayabherave (ma0 ni0 1.34 ādayo) āgatanayena, chapi vijjā chaḷabhiññāvasena, aṭṭhapi vijjā ambaṭṭhasutte āgatāti vijjāhi, sīlasaṃvarādīhi, pannarasahi caraṇadhammehi ca, anaññasādhāraṇehi sampanno samannāgatoti ^b^vijjācaraṇasampanno^eb^. sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā gadattā ca ^b^sugato^eb^. sabbathā viditalokattā ^b^lokavidū^eb^. natthi etassa uttaroti ^b^anuttaro^eb^. purisadamme ^a^P2.0085^ea^ purisaveneyye sāreti vinetīti ^b^purisadammasārathi^eb^. diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti ^b^satthā^eb^. sabbassāpi neyyassa sabbappakārena ^a^V0.0232^ea^ sayambhuñāṇena buddhattā ^b^buddho^eb^ti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimaggato (visuddhi0 1.132-133) gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^so dhammaṃ deseti ādi...pe0... pariyosānakalyāṇa^eb^nti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññaṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti. tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti. kathaṃ? ekagāthāpi hi samantabhaddakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā, dutiyatatiyehi majjhekalyāṇā, pacchimena pariyosānakalyāṇā. ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ, nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesena majjhekalyāṇaṃ. nānānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ paṭhamena anusandhinā ādikalyāṇaṃ, pacchimena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesehi majjhekalyāṇaṃ. sakalopi vā sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo, samathavipassanāmaggaphalehi majjhekalyāṇo, nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo. sīlasamādhīhi vā ādikalyāṇo, vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo, phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo. buddhasubuddhatāya vā ādikalyāṇo, dhammasudhammatāya majjhekalyāṇo, saṅghasuppaṭipattiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo, paccekabodhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, sāvakabodhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo, paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi ^a^M0.0252^ea^ sukhameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo, tathāpaṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇo. nāthappabhavattā ca pabhavasuddhiyā ādikalyāṇo, atthasuddhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, kiccasuddhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. tena ^a^P2.0086^ea^ vuttaṃ ``so dhammaṃ deseti ādi...pe0... pariyosānakalyāṇa''nti.

[03] yaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, nānānayehi dīpeti, taṃ yathānurūpaṃ atthasampattiyā ^b^sātthaṃ,^eb^ byañjanasampattiyā ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^. saṅkāsana, pakāsana, vivaraṇa, vibhajana, uttānīkaraṇa paññattiatthapadasamāyogato sātthaṃ, akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesasampattiyā sabyañjanaṃ, atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi vā sātthaṃ, dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjanaṃ. atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāvisayato vā sātthaṃ, dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjanaṃ. paṇḍitavedanīyato parikkhakajanappasādakanti sātthaṃ, saddheyyato lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjanaṃ. gambhīrādhippāyato sātthaṃ, uttānapadato sabyañjanaṃ. upanetabbassa abhāvato sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvena ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ,^eb^ apanetabbassa abhāvato ^a^V0.0233^ea^ niddosabhāvena ^b^parisuddhaṃ,^eb^ apica paṭipattiyā adhigamabyattito ^b^sātthaṃ,^eb^ pariyattiyā āgamabyattito ^b^sabyañjanaṃ,^eb^ sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhapāripūriyā ^b^paripuṇṇaṃ^eb^, nirupakkilesato nittharaṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca ^b^parisuddhaṃ,^eb^ sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesaṃ cariyabhāvato ca^b^ brahmacariyaṃ^eb^. tasmā ``sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ...pe0... pakāsetī''ti vuccati. ^b^paṭhamo^eb^ti gaṇanānupubbato sabbalokuttamabhāvato ca paṭhamo puggalo.

[03] ^b^tasseva satthu sāvako^eb^ti tasseva yathāvuttaguṇassa satthu sammāsambuddhassa dhammadesanāya savanante jāto dhammasenāpatisadiso sāvako, na pūraṇādi viya paṭiññāmattena satthu sāvako. ^b^pāṭipado^eb^ti paṭipadāsaṅkhātena ariyamaggena ariyāya jātiyā jāto bhavoti pāṭipado, aniṭṭhitapaṭipattikicco paṭipajjamānoti attho. suttageyyādi pariyattidhammo bahuṃ suto etenāti ^b^bahussuto^eb^. pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlena ^a^M0.0253^ea^ ceva āraññikaṅgādidhutaṅgavatehi ^a^P2.0087^ea^ ca upapanno sampanno samannāgatoti ^b^sīlavatūpapanno^eb^. iti bhagavā ``lokānukampā nāma hitajjhāsayena dhammadesanā, sā ca imesu eva tīsu puggalesu paṭibaddhā''ti dasseti. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^tassanvayo^eb^ti tasseva satthu paṭipattiyā dhammadesanāya ca anugamanena tassanvayo anujāto. avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā saparasantānesu dhammālokasaṅkhātāya pabhāya karaṇato ^b^pabhaṅkarā. dhammamudīrayantā^eb^ti catusaccadhammaṃ kathentā. ^b^apāpurantī^eb^ti ugghāṭenti. ^b^amatassa^eb^ nibbānassa. ^b^dvāraṃ^eb^ ariyamaggaṃ. ^b^yogā^eb^ti kāmayogādito. ^b^satthavāhenā^eb^ti veneyyasatthavāhanato bhavakantāranittharaṇato satthavāho, bhagavā, tena satthavāhena. ^b^sudesitaṃ maggamanukkamantī^eb^ti tena sammā desitaṃ ariyamaggaṃ tassa desanānusārena anugacchanti paṭipajjanti. ^b^idhevā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^asubhānupassī^eb^ti asubhaṃ anupassantā dvattiṃsākāravasena ceva uddhumātakādīsu gahitanimittassa upasaṃharaṇavasena ca kāyasmiṃ asubhaṃ asubhākāraṃ anupassakā hutvā viharatha. ^b^ānāpānassatī^eb^ti ānāpāne sati, taṃ ārabbha pavattā sati, assāsapassāsapariggāhikā ^a^V0.0234^ea^ satīti attho. vuttañhetaṃ ``ānanti assāso, no passāso. pānanti passāso, no assāso''tiādi (paṭi0 ma0 1.160).

[03] ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhākaṃ. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti idha gocarajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^parimukha^eb^nti abhimukhaṃ. ^b^sūpaṭṭhitā^eb^ti suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ānāpānassati ca tumhākaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā ^a^P2.0088^ea^ hotūti. atha vā ^b^parimukha^eb^nti pariggahitaniyyānaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ -- ``parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho ^a^M0.0254^ea^, satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho, tena vuccati parimukhaṃ sati''nti (paṭi0 ma0 1.164). iminā catusatipaṭṭhānasoḷasappabhedā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānabhāvanā dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.

[03] evaṃ saṅkhepeneva rāgacaritavitakkacaritānaṃ sappāyaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārakāyānupassanāvasena samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānañca upadisitvā idāni suddhavipassanākammaṭṭhānameva dassento ^b^``sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassino viharathā''^eb^ti āha. tattha aniccaṃ, aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, aniccānupassanā, aniccānupassīti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. hutvā, abhāvato, udayabbayayogato, tāvakālikato, niccapaṭikkhepato ca khandhapañcakaṃ ^b^aniccaṃ^eb^ nāma. tassa yo hutvā abhāvākāro, taṃ ^b^aniccalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ ārabbha pavattā vipassanā ^b^aniccānupassanā^eb^. taṃ aniccanti vipassako ^b^aniccānupassī^eb^. ettha ca ekādasavidhā asubhakathā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pāpetvā, soḷasavatthukā ca ānāpānakathā catutthajjhānaṃ pāpetvā, vipassanākathā ca vitthārato vattabbā, sā pana sabbākārato visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 2.737-740) kathitāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] idāni asubhānupassanādīhi nipphādetabbaṃ phalavisesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``asubhānupassīna''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^subhāya dhātuyā^eb^ti subhabhāve, subhanimitteti attho. ^b^rāgānusayo^eb^ti subhārammaṇe uppajjanāraho kāmarāgānusayo. so kesādīsu uddhumātakādīsu vā asubhānupassīnaṃ asubhanimittaṃ gahetvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā adhigatena anāgāmimaggena ^b^pahīyati,^eb^ sabbaso samucchindīyatīti attho. vuttañhetaṃ ``asubhā bhāvetabbā kāmarāgassa pahānāyā''ti (a0 ni0 9.3; udā0 31). ^b^bāhirā^eb^ti bahiddhāvatthukattā anatthāvahattā ca bāhirā bahibhūtā. ^b^vitakkāsayā^eb^ti kāmasaṅkappādimicchāvitakkā. te ^a^P2.0089^ea^ hi appahīnā āsayānugatā sati paccayasamavāye uppajjanato vitakkāsayāti vuttā. kāmavitakko cettha kāmarāgaggahaṇena gahito evāti tadavasesā ^a^V0.0235^ea^ vitakkā eva vuttāti veditabbā. ^b^vighātapakkhikā^eb^ti dukkhabhāgiyā, icchāvighātanibbattanakā vā. ^b^te na hontī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0255^ea^ te pahīyanti. byāpādavitakko, vihiṃsāvitakko, ñātivitakko, janapadavitakko, amarāvitakko, anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakkoti aṭṭha, kāmavitakkena saddhiṃ navavidhā mahāvitakkā ānāpānassatisamādhinā tannissitāya ca vipassanāya pubbabhāge vikkhambhitā. taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatena ariyamaggena yathārahaṃ anavasesato pahīyanti. vuttampi cetaṃ ``ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāyā''ti (a0 ni0 9.3; udā0 31).

[03] ^b^yā avijjā, sā pahīyatī^eb^ti yā saccasabhāvapaṭicchādinī sabbānatthakārī sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhūtā avijjā, sā aniccānupassīnaṃ viharataṃ samucchijjati. idaṃ kira bhagavatā aniccākārato vuṭṭhitassa sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavassa vasena vuttaṃ. tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- tebhūmakesu sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccādito sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassantānaṃ yadā aniccanti pavattamānā vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā maggena ghaṭīyati, anukkamena arahattamaggo uppajjati, tesaṃ aniccānupassīnaṃ viharataṃ avijjā anavasesato pahīyati, arahattamaggavijjā uppajjatīti. ^b^aniccānupassīnaṃ viharata^eb^nti idaṃ aniccalakkhaṇassa tesaṃ pākaṭabhāvato itarassa lakkhaṇadvayassa gahaṇe upāyabhāvato vā vuttaṃ, na pana ekasseva lakkhaṇassa anupassitabbato. vuttañhetaṃ ``yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.15). aparampi vuttaṃ ``aniccasaññino hi, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhāti, anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī''ti.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^ānāpāne paṭissato^eb^ti ānāpānanimittasmiṃ paṭi paṭi sato, upaṭṭhitassatīti attho. ^b^passa^eb^nti ^a^P2.0090^ea^ āsavakkhayañāṇacakkhunā saṅkhārūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ passanto. ^b^ātāpī sabbadā^eb^ti antarāvosānaṃ anāpajjitvā asubhānupassanādīsu satataṃ ātāpī yuttappayutto, tato eva ^b^yato^eb^ vāyamamāno, niyato vā sammattaniyāmena ^b^tattha^eb^ sabbasaṅkhārasamathe nibbāne arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimuccati. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M0.0256^ea^ ^a^V0.0236^ea^ ^b^dhammānudhammapaṭipannassā^eb^ti ettha dhammo nāma navavidho lokuttaradhammo, tassa dhammassa anudhammo sīlavisuddhiādi pubbabhāgapaṭipadādhammo, taṃ dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipannassa adhigantuṃ paṭipajjamānassa. ^b^ayamanudhammo hotī^eb^ti ayaṃ anucchavikasabhāvo patirūpasabhāvo hoti. ^b^veyyākaraṇāyā^eb^ti kathanāya. ^b^dhammānudhammapaṭipannoya^eb^nti ^b^ya^eb^nti karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yena anudhammena taṃ dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipannoti byākaramāno sammadeva byākaronto nāma siyā, na tatonidānaṃ viññūhi garahitabbo siyāti. ^b^ya^eb^nti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tenetaṃ dasseti ``yadidaṃ dhammasseva bhāsanaṃ, dhammavitakkasseva ca vitakkanaṃ tadubhayābhāve ñāṇupekkhāya, ayaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipannassa bhikkhuno tathārūpo ayanti kathanāyānurūpahetu anucchavikakāraṇaṃ. ^b^bhāsamāno dhammaṃyeva bhāseyyā^eb^ti kathento ce dasakathāvatthudhammaṃyeva katheyya, na tappaṭipakkhamahicchatādiadhammaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. seyyathidaṃ -- appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṃsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā, paññākathā, vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā ^a^P2.0091^ea^, evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī''ti (a0 ni0 9.3; udā0 31).
[03] abhisallekhikāya kathāya lābhī eva hi taṃ bhāseyya. etena kalyāṇamittasampadā dassitā.

[03] ^b^dhammavitakka^eb^nti nekkhammavitakkādiṃ dhammato anapetaṃ vitakkayato ``sīlādipaṭipadaṃ paripūressāmī''ti uparūpari ussāho abhivaḍḍhissati. so pana vitakko sīlādīnaṃ anupakāradhamme vajjetvā upakāradhamme anubrūhanavasena hānabhāgiyabhāvaṃ apanetvā ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvepi aṭṭhatvā visesabhāgiyataṃ nibbedhabhāgiyatañca pāpanavasena pavattiyā anekappabhedo veditabbo. ^b^no adhammavitakka^eb^nti kāmavitakkaṃ no vitakkeyyāti ^a^M0.0257^ea^ attho. ^b^tadubhayaṃ vā panā^eb^ti yadetaṃ paresaṃ anuggahaṇatthaṃ dhammabhāsanaṃ attano anuggahaṇatthaṃ dhammavitakkanañca vuttaṃ. atha vā pana taṃ ubhayaṃ ^b^abhinivajjetvā^eb^ appaṭipajjitvā akatvā. ^b^upekkhako^eb^ti ^a^V0.0237^ea^ tathāpaṭipattiyaṃ udāsīno samathavipassanābhāvanameva anubrūhanto vihareyya, samathapaṭipattiyaṃ upekkhako hutvā vipassanāyameva kammaṃ karonto vihareyya. vipassanampi ussukkāpetvā tatthapi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇavasena upekkhako yāva vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggena ghaṭīyati, tāva yathā taṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati, tathā vihareyya sato sampajānoti.

[03] gāthāsu samathavipassanādhammo āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti ^b^dhammārāmo^eb^. tasmiṃyeva dhamme ratoti ^b^dhammarato^eb^. tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanato ^b^dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ^eb^ taṃ dhammaṃ āvajjento, manasi karontoti attho. ^b^anussara^eb^nti tameva dhammaṃ uparūparibhāvanāvasena anussaranto. atha vā vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā paresaṃ desanāvasena sīlādidhammo āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti ^b^dhammārāmo^eb^. tatheva tasmiṃ dhamme rato abhiratoti ^b^dhammarato^eb^. tesaṃyeva sīlādidhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanto kāmavitakkādīnaṃ okāsaṃ adatvā nekkhammasaṅkappādidhammaṃyeva anuvicintanato ^b^dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0092^ea^. tadubhayaṃ vā pana oḷārikato dahanto ajjhupekkhitvā samathavipassanādhammameva uparūpari bhāvanāvasena anussaranto anubrūhanavasena pavattento. ^b^saddhammā^eb^ti sattatiṃsappabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā ca ^b^na parihāyati,^eb^ na cirasseva taṃ adhigacchatīti attho.

[03] idāni tassa anussaraṇavidhiṃ dassento ^b^``caraṃ vā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^caraṃ vā^eb^ti bhikkhācāravasena caṅkamanavasena ca caranto vā. ^b^yadi vā tiṭṭha^eb^nti tiṭṭhanto vā ^b^nisinno^eb^ vā, ^b^uda vā saya^eb^nti sayanto vā. evaṃ catūsupi iriyāpathesu. ^b^ajjhattaṃ samayaṃ citta^eb^nti yathāvutte kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocarajjhatte attano cittaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ vūpasamanavasena pajahanavasena samayaṃ samento. ^b^santimevādhigacchatī^eb^ti accantasantiṃ nibbānameva pāpuṇātīti.
[06] sattamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M0.0258^ea^ ^b^akusalavitakkā^eb^ti akosallasambhūtā vitakkā. ^b^andhakaraṇā^eb^tiādīsu yassa sayaṃ uppajjanti, taṃ yathābhūtadassananivāraṇena andhaṃ karontīti ^b^andhakaraṇā^eb^. na paññācakkhuṃ karontīti ^b^acakkhukaraṇā^eb^. aññāṇaṃ karontīti ^b^aññāṇakaraṇā. paññānirodhikā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0238^ea^ kammassakatāpaññā, jhānapaññā, vipassanāpaññāti imā tisso paññā appavattikaraṇena nirodhentīti paññānirodhikā. aniṭṭhaphaladāyakattā dukkhasaṅkhātassa vighātassa pakkhe vattantīti ^b^vighātapakkhikā^eb^. kilesanibbānaṃ na saṃvattayantīti ^b^anibbānasaṃvattanikā^eb^.
