[03] ^b^kāmavitakko^eb^ti kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. so hi kilesakāmasahito hutvā vatthukāmesu pavattati. byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^byāpādavitakko^eb^. vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto ^a^P2.0093^ea^ vitakko ^b^vihiṃsāvitakko^eb^. ime dve ca sattesupi saṅkhāresupi uppajjanti. kāmavitakko hi piyamanāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā vitakkentassa uppajjati, byāpādavitakko appiye amanāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā kujjhitvā olokanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva nāsanā uppajjati, vihiṃsāvitakko saṅkhāresu na uppajjati, saṅkhārā dukkhāpetabbā nāma natthi, ``ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu''nti cintanakāle pana sattesu uppajjati.
[01] imeyeva pana kāmasaṅkappādayo. atthato hi kāmavitakkādīnaṃ kāmasaṅkappādīnañca nānākaraṇaṃ natthi, taṃsampayuttā pana saññādayo kāmasaññādayo. kāmadhātuādīnaṃ pana yasmā pāḷiyaṃ --

[02] ``kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko...pe0... micchāsaṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, sabbepi akusalā dhammā kāmadhātu. byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko...pe0... micchāsaṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati byāpādadhātu. dasasu āghātavatthūsu cittassa āghāto paṭighāto...pe0... anattamanatā cittassa, ayaṃ vuccati byāpādadhātu. vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo ^a^M0.0259^ea^, ayaṃ vuccati vihiṃsādhātu. idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā rajjuyā vā aññataraññatarena satte viheṭheti, ayaṃ vihiṃsādhātū''ti (vibha0 182, 910) --
[25] āgatattā viseso labbhati.

[03] tattha dve kathā sabbasaṅgāhikā ca asambhinnā ca. tattha kāmadhātuyā gahitāya itarā dvepi gahitā nāma honti. tato pana nīharitvā ayaṃ byāpādadhātu, ayaṃ vihiṃsādhātūti dassetīti ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā nāma. kāmadhātuṃ kathento pana bhagavā byāpādadhātuṃ byāpādadhātuṭṭhāne ^a^V0.0239^ea^, vihiṃsādhātuṃ vihiṃsādhātuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāva avasesaṃ kāmadhātu nāmāti kathesīti ayaṃ asambhinnakathā nāma.

[03] sukkapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^nekkhammavitakko^eb^. so asubhapubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, asubhajjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^abyāpādavitakko^eb^. so mettāpubbabhāge ^a^P2.0094^ea^ kāmāvacaro hoti, mettājhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^avihiṃsāvitakko^eb^. so karuṇāpubbabhāge kāmāvacaro, karuṇājjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. yadā pana alobho sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā honti. yadā mettā sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā honti. yadā karuṇā sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā honti.

[03] imeyeva pana nekkhammasaṅkappādayo. atthato hi nekkhammavitakkādīnaṃ nekkhammasaṅkappādīnañca nānākaraṇaṃ natthi, taṃsampayuttā pana saññādayo nekkhammasaññādayo. nekkhammadhātuādīnaṃ pana yasmā pāḷiyaṃ --

[02] ``nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati nekkhammadhātu, sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammadhātu. abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati abyāpādadhātu. yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettācetovimutti ^a^M0.0260^ea^, ayaṃ vuccati abyāpādadhātu. avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo -- ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsādhātu. yā sattesu karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇācetovimutti -- ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsādhātū''ti. (vibha0 182) --
[25] āgatattā viseso labbhati. idhāpi sabbasaṅgāhikā, asambhinnāti dve kathā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^vitakkaye^eb^ti vitakkeyya. ^b^nirākare^eb^ti attano santānato nīhareyya vinodeyya, pajaheyyāti attho. ^b^save vitakkāni vicāritāni, sameti vuṭṭhīva rajaṃ samūhata^eb^nti yathā nāma gimhānaṃ pacchime māse pathaviyaṃ samūhataṃ samantato uṭṭhitaṃ rajaṃ mahato akālameghassa vassato vuṭṭhi ^a^V0.0240^ea^ ṭhānaso vūpasameti, evameva so yogāvacaro vitakkāni micchāvitakke ca vicāritāni taṃsampayuttavicāre ca sameti vūpasameti samucchindati. tathābhūto ca ^b^vitakkūpasamena cetasā^eb^ sabbesaṃ micchāvitakkānaṃ upasamanato vitakkūpasamena ^a^P2.0095^ea^ ariyamaggacittena. ^b^idheva^eb^ diṭṭheva dhamme, ^b^santipadaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ, ^b^samajjhagā^eb^ samadhigato hotīti.
[06] aṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 88^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^antarāmalā^eb^ti ettha ^b^antarā^eb^saddo --
[21] ``nadītīresu saṇṭhāne, sabhāsu rathiyāsu ca.
[22] janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara''nti.. --

[25] ādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.228) kāraṇe āgato. ``addasā maṃ, bhante, aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.149) khaṇe. ``apicāyaṃ tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī''tiādīsu (pārā0 231) vivare.
[21] ``pītavatthe pītadhaje, pītālaṅkārabhūsite.
[22] pītantarāhi vaggūhi, apiḷandhāva sobhasī''ti.. --

[25] ādīsu ^a^M0.0261^ea^ (vi0 va0 658) uttarisāṭake. ``yassantarato na santi kopā''tiādīsu (udā0 20) citte. idhāpi citte eva daṭṭhabbo. tasmā antare citte bhavā ^b^antarā^eb^. yasmiṃ santāne uppannā, tassa malinabhāvakaraṇato ^b^malā^eb^. tattha malaṃ nāma duvidhaṃ -- sarīramalaṃ, cittamalanti. tesu sarīramalaṃ sedajallikādi sarīre nibbattaṃ, tattha laggaṃ āgantukarajañca, taṃ udakenapi nīharaṇīyaṃ, na tathā saṃkilesikaṃ. cittamalaṃ pana rāgādisaṃkilesikaṃ, taṃ ariyamaggeheva nīharaṇīyaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi --
[21] ``rūpena saṃkiliṭṭhena, saṃkilissanti māṇavā.
[22] rūpe suddhe visujjhanti, anakkhātaṃ mahesinā..
[21] ``cittena ^a^V0.0241^ea^ saṃkiliṭṭhena, saṃkilissanti māṇavā.
[22] citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā''ti.. (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.373; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.106).

[03] tenāha bhagavā ``cittasaṃkilesā, bhikkhave, sattā saṃkilissanti, cittavodānā visujjhantī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.100). tasmā bhagavā idhāpi ^a^P2.0096^ea^ cittamalavisodhanāya paṭipajjitabbanti dassento ``tayome, bhikkhave, antarāmalā''ti āha.

[03] yathā cete lobhādayo sattānaṃ citte uppajjitvā malinabhāvakarā nānappakārasaṃkilesavidhāyakāti antarāmalā, evaṃ ekato bhuñjitvā, ekato sayitvā, otāragavesī amittasattu viya citte eva uppajjitvā sattānaṃ nānāvidhānatthāvahā, nānappakāradukkhanibbattakāti dassento ^b^``antarāamittā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha mittapaṭipakkhato ^b^amittā,^eb^ sapattakiccakaraṇato ^b^sapattā,^eb^ hiṃsanato ^b^vadhakā,^eb^ ujuvipaccanīkato ^b^paccatthikā^eb^.

[01] tattha dvīhi ākārehi lobhādīnaṃ amittādibhāvo veditabbo. verīpuggalo hi antaraṃ labhamāno attano verissa satthena vā sīsaṃ pāteti, upāyena vā mahantaṃ anatthaṃ uppādeti. ime ca lobhādayo paññāsirapātanena yonisampaṭipādanena ca tādisaṃ tato balavataraṃ anatthaṃ nibbattenti. kathaṃ? cakkhudvārasmiñhi iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu yathārahaṃ tāni ārabbha lobhādayo uppajjanti, ettāvatāssa paññāsiraṃ ^a^M0.0262^ea^ pātitaṃ nāma hoti. sotadvārādīsupi eseva nayo. evaṃ tāva paññāsirapātanato amittādisadisatā veditabbā. lobhādayo pana kammanidānā hutvā aṇḍajādibhedā catasso yoniyo upanenti. tassa yoniupagamanamūlakāni pañcavīsati mahābhayāni dvattiṃsa kammakaraṇāni ca āgatāneva honti. evaṃ yonisampaṭipādanatopi nesaṃ amittādisadisatā veditabbā. iti lobhādayo amittādisadisatāya cittasambhūtatāya ca ``antarāamittā''tiādinā vuttā. apica amittehi kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ lobhādayo karonti, amittādibhāvo ca lobhādīhi jāyatīti tesaṃ amittādibhāvo veditabbo. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``diso disaṃ yantaṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ.
[22] micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare''ti.. (dha0 pa0 42; udā0 33).
[03] gāthāsu ^a^V0.0242^ea^ attano paresañca anatthaṃ janetīti ^b^anatthajanano^eb^. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``yadapi luddho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā tadapi akusalaṃ; yadapi luddho lobhena abhibhūto ^a^P2.0097^ea^ pariyādinnacitto parassa asatā dukkhaṃ uppādeti vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā pabbājanāya vā balavamhi balattho iti, tadapi akusalaṃ, itissame lobhajā lobhanidānā lobhasamudayā lobhapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavantī''ti (a0 ni0 3.70).
[03] aparampi vuttaṃ --

[02] ``ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī''tiādi (a0 ni0 3.54).

[03] ^b^cittappakopano^eb^ti cittasaṅkhobhano. lobho hi lobhanīye vatthusmiṃ uppajjamāno cittaṃ khobhento pakopento vipariṇāmento vikāraṃ ^a^M0.0263^ea^ āpādento uppajjati, pasādādivasena pavattituṃ na deti. ^b^bhayamantarato jātaṃ, taṃ jano nāvabujjhatī^eb^ti taṃ lobhasaṅkhātaṃ antarato abbhantare attano citteyeva jātaṃ anatthajananacittappakopanādiṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ ayaṃ bālamahājano nāvabujjhati na jānātīti.

[03] ^b^luddho atthaṃ na jānātī^eb^ti attatthaparatthādibhedaṃ atthaṃ hitaṃ luddhapuggalo yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti. ^b^dhammaṃ na passatī^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammampi luddho lobhena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto na passati paccakkhato na jānāti, pageva uttarimanussadhammaṃ. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[02] ``ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attatthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti, paratthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti, ubhayatthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānātī''tiādi (a0 ni0 3.55).

[03] ^b^andhatama^eb^nti andhabhāvakaraṃ tamaṃ. ^b^ya^eb^nti yattha. bhummatthe hi etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. yasmiṃ kāle lobho sahate abhibhavati naraṃ, andhatamaṃ tadā hotīti. ^b^ya^eb^nti vā kāraṇavacanaṃ. yasmā ^a^V0.0243^ea^ lobho uppajjamāno naraṃ sahate abhibhavati, tasmā andhatamaṃ tadā hotīti yojanā, ya-ta-saddānaṃ ekantasambandhabhāvato. atha vā ^b^ya^eb^nti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, ``lobho sahate''ti ettha yadetaṃ lobhassa sahanaṃ abhibhavanaṃ vuttaṃ. etaṃ andhabhāvakarassa tamassa gamanaṃ uppādoti attho. atha ^a^P2.0098^ea^ vā yaṃ naraṃ lobho sahate abhibhavati, tassa andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, tato ca luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^yo ca lobhaṃ pahantvānā^eb^ti yo pubbabhāge tadaṅgavasena vikkhambhanavasena ca yathārahaṃ samathavipassanāhi lobhaṃ pajahitvā tathā pajahanahetu ^b^lobhaneyye^eb^ dibbepi rūpādike upaṭṭhite ^b^na lubbhati,^eb^ balavavipassanānubhāvena ^b^lobho pahīyate tamhā^eb^ti tasmā ariyapuggalā ariyamaggena lobho pahīyati pajahīyati, accantameva pariccajīyati. yathā kiṃ? ^b^udabindūva pokkharā^eb^ti paduminipaṇṇato udakabindu viya. sesagāthānampi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
[03] tathā ^a^M0.0264^ea^ dosassa --

[02] ``yadapi duṭṭho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā tadapi akusalaṃ; yadapi duṭṭho dosena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto parassa asatā dukkhaṃ uppādeti vadhena vā bandhena vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā pabbājanāya vā balavamhi balattho iti, tadapi akusalaṃ. itissame dosajā dosanidānā dosasamudayā dosapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavantī''ti (a0 ni0 3.70).
[03] tathā --

[02] ``duṭṭho kho, brāhmaṇa, dosena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī''ti (a0 ni0 3.55).
[03] tathā --

[02] ``duṭṭho kho, brāhmaṇa, dosena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attatthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti ^a^V0.0244^ea^, paratthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti, ubhayatthampi yathā bhūtaṃ na pajānātī''ti (a0 ni0 3.55) --
[25] ādisuttapadānusārena anatthajananatā atthahānihetutā ca veditabbā.

[03] tathā mohassa ``yadapi mūḷho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā''tiādinā (a0 ni0 3.70), ``mūḷho kho, brāhmaṇa, mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi cetetī''tiādinā(a0 ni0 3.55), ``attatthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānātī''tiādinā (a0 ni0 3.55) ca āgatasuttapadānusārena veditabbā.

[03] ^b^tālapakkaṃva^eb^ ^a^P2.0099^ea^ ^b^bandhanā^eb^ti tālaphalaṃ viya usumuppādena vaṇṭato, tatiyamaggañāṇuppādena tassa cittato doso pahīyati, pariccajīyatīti attho. ^b^mohaṃ vihanti so sabba^eb^nti so ariyapuggalo sabbaṃ ^a^M0.0265^ea^ anavasesaṃ mohaṃ catutthamaggena vihanti vidhamati samucchindati. ^b^ādiccovudayaṃ tama^eb^nti ādicco viya udayaṃ uggacchanto tamaṃ andhakāraṃ.
[06] navamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^tīhi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhūto^eb^ti kā uppatti? devadatte hi avīcimahānirayaṃ paviṭṭhe devadattapakkhiyā aññatitthiyā ca ``samaṇena gotamena abhisapito devadatto pathaviṃ paviṭṭho''ti abbhācikkhiṃsu. taṃ sutvā sāsane anabhippasannā manussā ``siyā nu kho etadevaṃ, yathā ime bhaṇantī''ti āsaṅkaṃ uppādesuṃ. taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. atha bhagavā ``na, bhikkhave, tathāgatā kassaci abhisapaṃ denti, tasmā na devadatto mayā abhisapito, attano kammeneva nirayaṃ paviṭṭho''ti vatvā tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ paṭisedhento imāya aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^asaddhammehī^eb^ti asataṃ dhammehi, asantehi vā dhammehi. ^b^atekiccho^eb^ti buddhehipi anivattanīyattā avīcinibbattiyā tikicchābhāvato atekiccho, atikicchanīyoti attho. asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena pavattā pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo ^b^pāpicchatā^eb^ ^a^V0.0245^ea^, tāya. ``ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, saṅghaṃ pariharissāmī''ti tassa icchā uppannā. kokālikādayo pāpā lāmakā mittā etassāti pāpamitto, tassa bhāvo ^b^pāpamittatā,^eb^ tāya. ^b^uttarikaraṇīye^eb^ti jhānābhiññāhi uttarikaraṇīye adhigantabbe maggaphale anadhigate sati eva, taṃ anadhigantvāti attho. ^b^oramattakenā^eb^ti appamattakena jhānābhiññāmattena. ^b^visesādhigamenā^eb^ti uttarimanussadhammādhigamena. ^b^antarā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0100^ea^ vemajjhe. ^b^vosānaṃ āpādī^eb^ti akatakiccova samāno ``katakiccomhī''ti maññamāno samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajji. iti bhagavā iminā suttena visesato puthujjanabhāve ādīnavaṃ pakāsesi bhāriyo puthujjanabhāvo, yatra hi nāma jhānābhiññāpariyosānā ^a^M0.0266^ea^ sampattiyo nibbattetvāpi anekānatthāvahaṃ nānāvidhaṃ dukkhahetuṃ asantaguṇasambhāvanaṃ asappurisasaṃsaggaṃ ālasiyānuyogañca avijahanto avīcimhi kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ kibbisaṃ pasavissatīti.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^mā^eb^ti paṭisedhe nipāto. ^b^jātū^eb^ti ekaṃsena. ^b^kocī^eb^ti sabbasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ. ^b^lokasmi^eb^nti sattaloke. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ``imasmiṃ sattaloke koci puggalo ekaṃsena pāpiccho mā hotū''ti. ^b^tadamināpi jānātha, pāpicchānaṃ yathā gatī^eb^ti pāpicchānaṃ puggalānaṃ yathā gati yādisī nipphatti, yādiso abhisamparāyo, taṃ imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti devadattaṃ nidassento evamāha. ^b^paṇḍitoti samaññāto^eb^ti pariyattibāhusaccena paṇḍitoti ñāto. ^b^bhāvitattoti sammato^eb^ti jhānābhiññāhi bhāvitacittoti sambhāvito. tathā hi so pubbe ``mahiddhiko godhiputto, mahānubhāvo godhiputto''ti dhammasenāpatināpi pasaṃsito ahosi. ^b^jalaṃva yasasā aṭṭhā, devadattoti vissuto^eb^ti attano kittiyā parivārena jalanto viya obhāsento viya ṭhito devadattoti evaṃ vissuto pākaṭo ahosi. ^b^``me sutta''^eb^ntipi pāṭho, mayā sutaṃ sutamattaṃ, katipāheneva atathābhūtattā tassa taṃ paṇḍiccādi savanamattamevāti attho.

[03] ^b^so samānamanuciṇṇo, āsajja naṃ tathāgata^eb^nti so evaṃbhūto devadatto ``buddhopi sakyaputto, ahampi sakyaputto, buddhopi samaṇo, ahampi samaṇo, buddhopi iddhimā, ahampi iddhimā, buddhopi dibbacakkhuko, ahampi dibbacakkhuko, buddhopi dibbasotako, ahampi dibbasotako, buddhopi ^a^P2.0101^ea^ cetopariyañāṇalābhī, ahampi cetopariyañāṇalābhī, buddhopi atītānāgatapaccuppanne dhamme jānāti, ahampi te jānāmī''ti attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā sammāsambuddhaṃ attanā samasamaṭṭhapanena samānaṃ āpajjanto ``idānāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī''ti abhimārapayojanā tathāgataṃ āsajja āsādetvā viheṭhetvā. ``pamādamanujīno''tipi ^a^V0.0246^ea^ paṭhanti. tassattho ``vuttanayena pamādaṃ ^a^M0.0267^ea^ āpajjanto pamādaṃ nissāya bhagavatā saddhiṃ yugaggāhacittuppādena saheva jhānābhiññāhi anujīno parihīno''ti. ^b^avīcinirayaṃ patto, catudvāraṃ bhayānaka^eb^nti jālānaṃ tattha uppannasattānaṃ vā nirantaratāya ``avīcī''ti laddhanāmaṃ catūsu passesu catumahādvārayogena catudvāraṃ atibhayānakaṃ mahānirayaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena patto. tathā hi vuttaṃ --
[21] ``catukkaṇṇo catudvāro, vibhatto bhāgaso mito.
[22] ayopākārapariyanto, ayasā paṭikujjito..
[21] ``tassa ayomayā bhūmi, jalitā tejasā yutā.
[22] samantā yojanasataṃ, pharitvā tiṭṭhati sabbadā''ti.. (ma0 ni0 3.250; a0 ni0 3.36; pe0 va0 693-694; jā0 2.19.86-87).

[03] ^b^aduṭṭhassā^eb^ti aduṭṭhacittassa. ^b^dubbhe^eb^ti dūseyya. ^b^tameva pāpaṃ phusatī^eb^ti tameva aduṭṭhadubbhiṃ pāpapuggalaṃ pāpaṃ nihīnaṃ pāpaphalaṃ phusati pāpuṇāti abhibhavati. ^b^bhesmā^eb^ti vipulabhāvena gambhīrabhāvena ca bhiṃsāpento viya, vipulagambhīroti attho. ^b^vādenā^eb^ti dosena. ^b^vihiṃsatī^eb^ti bādhati āsādeti. ^b^vādo tamhi na rūhatī^eb^ti tasmiṃ tathāgate parena āropiyamāno doso na ruhati, na tiṭṭhati, visakumbho viya samuddassa, na tassa vikāraṃ janetīti attho.

[03] evaṃ chahi gāthāhi pāpicchatādisamannāgatassa nirayūpagabhāvadassanena ^a^P2.0102^ea^ dukkhato aparimuttataṃ dassetvā idāni tappaṭipakkhadhammasamannāgatassa dukkhakkhayaṃ dassento ^b^``tādisaṃ mitta''^eb^nti osānagāthamāha. tassattho --^b^ yassa^eb^ sammā paṭipannassa ^b^maggānugo^eb^ paṭipattimaggaṃ anugato sammā paṭipanno appicchatādiguṇasamannāgamena sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa ^b^khayaṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ pāpuṇeyya. tādisaṃ buddhaṃ vā buddhasāvakaṃ vā ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ sappañño, attano ^b^mittaṃ kubbetha^eb^ tena mettikaṃ kareyya, ^b^tañca seveyya^eb^ tameva payirupāseyyāti.
[03] iti imasmiṃ vagge chaṭṭhasattamasuttesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, itaresu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
[06] dasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] catutthavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ pañcamavaggassa ^a^M0.0268^ea^ ^a^V0.0247^ea^ paṭhame ^b^aggappasādā^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ ^b^agga^eb^saddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu dissati. tathā hesa ``ajjatagge, samma dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīnaṃ (ma0 ni0 2.70). ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata''nti (dī0 ni0 1.250; pārā0 15) ca ādīsu ādimhi dissati. ``teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya (kathā0 441). ucchaggaṃ veḷagga''nti ca ādīsu koṭiyaṃ. ``ambilaggaṃ vā madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā (saṃ0 ni0 5.374). anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu''nti (cūḷava0 318) ca ādīsu koṭṭhāse. ``ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca (a0 ni0 4.95). aggohamasmi lokassā''ti ca ādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.31; ma0 ni0 3.207) seṭṭhe. svāyamidhāpi seṭṭheyeva daṭṭhabbo. tasmā aggesu seṭṭhesu pasādā, aggabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā vā pasādā aggappasādāti attho.

[03] purimasmiñca atthe aggasaddena buddhādiratanattayaṃ vuccati. tesu bhagavā tāva asadisaṭṭhena, guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena, asamasamaṭṭhena ca aggo. so hi mahābhinīhāraṃ dasannaṃ ^a^P2.0103^ea^ pāramīnaṃ pavicayañca ādiṃ katvā tehi bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva buddhaguṇehi ca sesajanehi asadisoti asadisaṭṭhena aggo. ye cassa guṇā mahākaruṇādayo, te sesasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi sabbasattuttamatāya aggo. ye pana purimakā sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi saddhiṃ ayameva rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva dhammakāyaguṇehi ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi aggo. tathā dullabhapātubhāvato acchariyamanussabhāvato bahujanahitasukhāvahato adutiyāsahāyādibhāvato ca bhagavā loke aggoti vuccati. yathāha --
[02] ``ekapuggalassa ^a^V0.0248^ea^, bhikkhave, pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, katamassa ekapuggalassa? tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
[02] ``ekapuggalo ^a^M0.0269^ea^, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso.
[02] ``ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujana...pe0... sammāsambuddho.

[02] ``ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati, adutiyo asahāyo appaṭimo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo asamo asamasamo dvipadānaṃ aggo. katamo ekapuggalo? tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho''ti (a0 ni0 1.170-172, 174).

[03] dhammasaṅghāpi aññadhammasaṅghehi asadisaṭṭhena visiṭṭhaguṇatāya dullabhapātubhāvādinā ca aggā. tathā hi tesaṃ svākkhātatādisuppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesehi aññadhammasaṅghā sadisā appataranihīnā vā natthi, kuto seṭṭhā. sayameva ca pana tehi visiṭṭhaguṇatāya seṭṭhā. tathā dullabhuppādācchariyabhāvabahujanahitasukhāvahā adutiyāsahāyādisabhāvā ca te. yadaggena hi bhagavā dullabhapātubhāvo, tadaggena dhammasaṅghāpīti. acchariyādibhāvepi eseva nayo. evaṃ aggesu seṭṭhesu uttamesu pavaresu guṇavisiṭṭhesu pasādāti ^b^aggappasādā^eb^.

[03] dutiyasmiṃ pana atthe yathāvuttesu aggesu buddhādīsu uppattiyā aggabhūtā pasādā aggappasādā. ye pana ariyamaggena āgatā aveccappasādā, te ekanteneva aggabhūtā pasādāti aggappasādā. yathāha ``idha ^a^P2.0104^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hotī''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 5.1027). aggavipākattāpi cete aggappasādā. vuttañhi ``agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko''ti.

[03] ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yattakā. ^b^sattā^eb^ti pāṇino. ^b^apadā^eb^ti apādakā. ^b^dvipadā^eb^ti dvipādakā. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. vā-saddo samuccayattho, na vikappattho. yathā ``anuppanno vā kāmāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.17) ettha anuppanno ca uppanno cāti attho. yathā ca ``bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyā''ti ^a^M0.0270^ea^ ^a^V0.0249^ea^ (ma0 ni0 1.402; saṃ0 ni0 2.12) ettha bhūtānañca sambhavesīnañcāti attho. yathā ca ``aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedato vā''ti (dī0 ni0 2.152; udā0 76; mahāva0 286) ettha aggito ca udakato ca mithubhedato cāti attho, evaṃ ``apadā vā...pe0... aggamakkhāyatī''ti etthāpi apadā ca dvipadā cāti sampiṇḍanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo. tena vuttaṃ ``vā-saddo samuccayattho, na vikappattho''ti.

[03] ^b^rūpino^eb^ti rūpavanto. na rūpinoti ^b^arūpino. saññino^eb^ti saññāvanto. na saññinoti ^b^asaññino. nevasaññināsaññino^eb^ nāma bhavaggapariyāpannā. ettāvatā ca kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo, ekavokārabhavo, catuvokārabhavo, pañcavokārabhavo, saññībhavo, asaññībhavo, nevasaññīnāsaññībhavoti navavidhepi bhave satte anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā. ettha hi rūpiggahaṇena kāmabhavo rūpabhavo pañcavokārabhavo ekavokārabhavo ca dassito, arūpiggahaṇena arūpabhavo catuvokārabhavo ca dassito. saññībhavādayo pana sarūpeneva dassitā. apadādiggahaṇena kāmabhavapañcavokārabhavasaññībhavānaṃ ekadeso dassitoti.

[03] kasmā ^a^P2.0105^ea^ panettha yathā adutiyasutte ``dvipadānaṃ aggo''ti dvipadānaṃ gahaṇameva akatvā apadādiggahaṇaṃ katanti? vuccate -- adutiyasutte tāva seṭṭhataravasena dvipadaggahaṇameva kataṃ. imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesu na uppajjati, dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. kataresu dvipadesu? manussesu ceva devesu ca. manussesu uppajjamāno sakalalokaṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho buddho hutvā uppajjati. aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ``tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho''ti (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.174) vuttaṃ. devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattanako mahābrahmā hutvā uppajjati, so tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati. iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa ``dvipadānaṃ aggo''ti tattha vutto, idha pana anavasesapariyādānavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. yāvattakā hi sattā attabhāvapariyāpannā apadā vā...pe0... nevasaññīnāsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ ^a^M0.0271^ea^ aggamakkhāyatīti. niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, makāro padasandhikaro. aggo akkhāyatīti padavibhāgo.

[03] ^b^aggo vipāko hotī^eb^ti agge sammāsambuddhe pasannānaṃ yo pasādo, so aggo seṭṭho uttamo ^a^V0.0250^ea^ koṭibhūto vā, tasmā tassa vipākopi aggo seṭṭho uttamo koṭibhūto uḷāratamo paṇītatamo hoti. so pana pasādo duvidho lokiyalokuttarabhedato. tesu lokiyassa tāva --
[21] ``ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ.
[22] pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ, devakāyaṃ paripūressanti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[21] ``buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti.
[22] varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa..
[21] ``sataṃ hatthī sataṃ assā, sataṃ assatarī rathā.
[27] sataṃ kaññāsahassāni, āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā.
[22] ekassa padavītihārassa, kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ''.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.242; cūḷava0 305).

[02] ``sādhu ^a^P2.0106^ea^ kho, devānaminda, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti. te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti -- dibbena āyunā, dibbena vaṇṇena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena ādhipateyyena, dibbehi rūpehi, dibbehi saddehi, dibbehi gandhehi, dibbehi rasehi, dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.341) --

[25] evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena pasādassa phalavisesayogo veditabbo. tasmā so apāyadukkhavinivattanena saddhiṃ sampattibhavesu sukhavipākadāyakoti daṭṭhabbo. lokuttaro pana sāmaññaphalavipākadāyako vaṭṭadukkhavinivattako ca. sabbopi cāyaṃ pasādo paramparāya vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vinivattetiyeva. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``yasmiṃ ^a^M0.0272^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako attano saddhaṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti. ujugatacittassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa ^a^V0.0251^ea^ pīti jāyati...pe0... nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī''ti (a0 ni0 6.10; 26).

[03] ^b^dhammā^eb^ti sabhāvadhammā. ^b^saṅkhatā^eb^ti samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katāti saṅkhatā, sappaccayadhammā. hetūhi paccayehi ca na kehici katāti ^b^asaṅkhatā^eb^, appaccayanibbānaṃ. saṅkhatānaṃ paṭiyogibhāvena ``asaṅkhatā''ti puthuvacanaṃ. ^b^virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ yo virāgasaṅkhāto asaṅkhatadhammo, so sabhāveneva saṇhasukhumabhāvato santatarapaṇītatarabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvato madanimmadanādibhāvato ca aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti vuccati. ^b^yadida^eb^nti nipāto, yo ayanti attho. ^b^madanimmadano^eb^tiādīni sabbāni nibbānavevacanāniyeva. tathā hi taṃ āgamma mānamadapurisamadādiko sabbo mado nimmadīyati pamaddīyati, kāmapipāsādikā sabbā pipāsā vinīyati, kāmālayādikā sabbepi ālayā samugghātīyanti, sabbepi kammavaṭṭakilesavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭā upacchijjanti, aṭṭhasatabhedā ^a^P2.0107^ea^ sabbāpi taṇhā khīyati, sabbepi kilesā virajjanti, sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā madanimmadano...pe0... nirodhoti vuccati. yā panesā taṇhā bhavena bhavaṃ, phalena kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati. taṃ vānaṃ ettha natthi, etasmiṃ vā adhigate ariyapuggalassa na hotīti ^b^nibbānaṃ^eb^.
[03] ^b^aggo vipāko hotī^eb^ti etthāpi --
[22] ``ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse...pe0..... (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[22] ``dhammoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti...pe0.....
[02] ``sādhu kho, devānaminda, dhammaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti. dhammaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce...pe0... dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.341) --

[25] evamādīnaṃ ^a^M0.0273^ea^ suttapadānaṃ vasena dhamme pasādassa phalavisesayogo veditabbo. evamettha asaṅkhatadhammavaseneva aggabhāvo āgato, sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇadassanatthaṃ ariyamaggavasenapi ayamattho labbhateva. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``yāvatā ^a^V0.0252^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī''ti (a0 ni0 4.34).
[02] ``maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho''ti ca. (dha0 pa0 273).

[03] ^b^saṅghā vā gaṇā vā^eb^ti janasamūhasaṅkhātā yāvatā loke saṅghā vā gaṇā vā. ^b^tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho^eb^ti aṭṭhāriyapuggalasamūhasaṅkhāto diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho. ^b^tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti attano sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādiguṇavisesena tesaṃ saṅghānaṃ aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti vuccati. ^b^yadida^eb^nti yāni imāni. ^b^cattāri purisayugānī^eb^ti yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷaṃ, yāva catutthamaggaṭṭho ^a^P2.0108^ea^ catutthaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni. ^b^aṭṭha purisapuggalā^eb^ti purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho eko paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭha purisapuggalā. ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni, veneyyavasena panevaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho^eb^ti yānimāni yugavasena cattāri purisayugāni, pāṭekkato aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho.

[03] ^b^āhuneyyo^eb^tiādīsu ānetvā hunitabbanti āhunaṃ, dūratopi āgantvā sīlavantesu dātabbanti attho. catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. mahapphalabhāvakaraṇato taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti āhuneyyo. atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbaṃ sāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbaṃ, sakkādīnampi āhavanaṃ arahatīti vā āhavanīyo. yo cāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ āhavanīyo nāma aggi, yattha hutaṃ mahapphalanti tesaṃ laddhi, so ce hutassa mahapphalatāya āhavanīyo, saṅghova āhavanīyo. saṅghe hutañhi mahapphalaṃ hoti. yathāha --
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0274^ea^ ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane.
[27] ekañca bhāvitattānaṃ, muhuttamapi pūjaye.
[22] sā eva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta''nti.. (dha0 pa0 107).
[03] tayidaṃ nikāyantare ``āhavanīyo''ti padaṃ idha ``āhuneyyo''ti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ, byañjanato pana kiñcimattameva nānaṃ, tasmā evamatthavaṇṇanā katā.

[03] ^b^pāhuneyyo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0253^ea^ ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānaṃ atthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ, tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ. tathā hesa ekabuddhantarepi dissati abbokiṇṇañca. ayaṃ panettha padattho -- ``piyamanāpattakarehi dhammehi samannāgato''ti evaṃ pāhunamassa ^a^P2.0109^ea^ dātuṃ yuttaṃ, pāhunañca paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti pāhuneyyo. yesaṃ pana pāhavanīyoti pāḷi, tesaṃ yasmā saṅgho pubbakāraṃ arahati, tasmā saṅgho sabbapaṭhamaṃ ānetvā ettha hunitabbanti pāhavanīyo, sabbappakārena vā āhavanaṃ arahatīti pāhavanīyo. svāyamidha teneva atthena pāhuneyyoti vuccati.

[03] ``dakkhiṇā''ti paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṃ, taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahati dakkhiṇāya vā hito mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena visodhanatoti ^b^dakkhiṇeyyo^eb^. ubho hatthe sirasi patiṭṭhapetvā sabbalokena kariyamānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti ^b^añjalikaraṇīyo^eb^. ^b^anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā^eb^ti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṃ. yathā hi rattasālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ ``rattasālikkhettaṃ yavakkhetta''nti vuccati, evaṃ saṅgho sadevakassa lokassa puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṃ. saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhanibbattakāni puññāni virūhanti, tasmā saṅgho anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa. idhāpi --
[22] ``ye keci saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse...pe0..... (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[22] ``saṅghoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti...pe0...''..
[02] ``sādhu ^a^M0.0275^ea^ kho, devānaminda, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda...pe0... dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.341) --

[25] ādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena saṅghe pasādassa phalavisesayogo, tenassa aggatā aggavipākatā ca veditabbā. tathā anuttariyapaṭilābho sattamabhavādito paṭṭhāya vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedo anuttarasukhādhigamoti evamādiuḷāraphalanipphādanavasena aggavipākatā veditabbā.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^aggato^eb^ti agge ratanattaye, aggabhāvato vā pasannānaṃ. ^b^aggaṃ dhamma^eb^nti aggasabhāvaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ ^a^P2.0110^ea^ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ ratanattayassa anaññasādhāraṇaṃ uttamasabhāvaṃ ^a^V0.0254^ea^, dasabalādisvākkhātatādisuppaṭipannatādiguṇasabhāvaṃ vā ^b^vijānataṃ^eb^ vijānantānaṃ. evaṃ sādhāraṇato aggappasādavatthuṃ dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇato taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^``agge buddhe''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^pasannāna^eb^nti aveccappasādena itarappasādena ca pasannānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ. ^b^virāgūpasame^eb^ti virāge upasame ca, sabbassa rāgassa sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantavirāgahetubhūte accantaupasamahetubhūte cāti attho. ^b^sukhe^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhakkhayabhāvena saṅkhārūpasamasukhabhāvena ca sukhe.

[03] ^b^aggasmiṃ dānaṃ dadata^eb^nti agge ratanattaye dānaṃ dentānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajantānaṃ. tattha dharamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā parinibbutañca bhagavantaṃ uddissa dhātucetiyādike upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā buddhe dānaṃ dadanti nāma. ``dhammaṃ pūjessāmā''ti dhammadhare puggale catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā dhammañca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karontā dhamme dānaṃ dadanti nāma. tathā ariyasaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā taṃ uddissa itarasmimpi tathā paṭipajjantā saṅghe dānaṃ dadanti nāma. ^b^aggaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti evaṃ ratanattaye pasannena cetasā uḷāraṃ pariccāgaṃ uḷārañca pūjāsakkāraṃ pavattentānaṃ divase divase aggaṃ uḷāraṃ kusalaṃ upacīyati. idāni tassa puññassa aggavipākatāya aggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``aggaṃ āyū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^aggaṃ āyū^eb^ti dibbaṃ vā mānusaṃ vā aggaṃ uḷāratamaṃ āyu. ^b^pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti uparūpari brūhati. ^b^vaṇṇo^eb^ti rūpasampadā. ^b^yaso^eb^ti ^a^M0.0276^ea^ ^a^P2.0111^ea^ parivārasampadā. ^b^kittī^eb^ti thutighoso. ^b^sukha^eb^nti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ. ^b^bala^eb^nti kāyabalaṃ ñāṇabalañca.

[03] ^b^aggassa dātā^eb^ti aggassa ratanattayassa dātā, atha vā aggassa deyyadhammassa dānaṃ uḷāraṃ katvā tattha puññaṃ pavattetā. ^b^aggadhammasamāhito^eb^ti aggena pasādadhammena dānādidhammena ca samāhito samannāgato acalappasādayutto, tassa vā vipākabhūtehi bahujanassa piyamanāpatādidhammehi yutto. ^b^aggappatto pamodatī^eb^ti yattha yattha sattanikāye uppanno, tattha tattha aggabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ adhigato, aggabhāvaṃ vā lokuttaramaggaphalaṃ adhigato pamodati abhiramati paritussatīti.
[06] paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ dutiyaṃ ^a^V0.0255^ea^ aṭṭhuppattivasena desitaṃ. ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme viharante bhikkhū āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ senāsanāni paññāpentā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmentā sāmaṇerā ca lābhabhājanīyaṭṭhāne sampattasampattānaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhantā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ. taṃ sutvā bhagavā bhikkhū paṇāmesi. te kira sabbeva navā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ. taṃ ñatvā mahābrahmā āgantvā ``abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgha''nti (ma0 ni0 2.158) tesaṃ paṇāmitabhikkhūnaṃ anuggaṇhanaṃ yāci. bhagavā tassa okāsaṃ akāsi. atha mahābrahmā ``katāvakāso khomhi bhagavatā''ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. atha bhagavā ``bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū''ti ānandattherassa ākāraṃ dassesi. atha te bhikkhū ānandattherena pakkositā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sārajjamānarūpā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. bhagavā tesaṃ sappāyadesanaṃ vīmaṃsanto ``ime āmisahetu paṇāmitā, piṇḍiyālopadhammadesanā nesaṃ sappāyā''ti ^a^P2.0112^ea^ cintetvā ^b^``antamidaṃ, bhikkhave''^eb^ti imaṃ desanaṃ desesi.

[03] tatrāyaṃ ^a^M0.0277^ea^ ^b^anta^eb^saddo ``santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā pubbantakappikā pubbantānudiṭṭhino''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.29) koṭṭhāse āgato. ``antamakāsi dukkhassa, antavā ayaṃ loko parivaṭumo''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.55) paricchede. ``haritantaṃ vā pathantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.304) mariyādāyaṃ. ``antaṃ antaguṇa''ntiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.377; khu0 pā0 3ḍvattiṃsākāra) sarīrāvayave ``caranti loke parivārachannā, anto asuddhā bahi sobhamānā''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.122; mahāni0 191) citte. ``appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni anto nimuggaposīnī''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.69; saṃ0 ni0 1.172; mahāva0 9) abbhantare.
[21] ``migānaṃ koṭṭhuko anto, pakkhīnaṃ pana vāyaso.
[22] eraṇḍo anto rukkhānaṃ, tayo antā samāgatā''ti.. (jā0 1.3.135) --

[25] ādīsu lāmake. idhāpi lāmake eva daṭṭhabbo. tasmā ^b^antamidaṃ bhikkhave jīvikāna^eb^nti bhikkhave ^a^V0.0256^ea^ idaṃ jīvikānaṃ antaṃ pacchimaṃ lāmakaṃ, sabbanihīnaṃ jīvitanti attho. ^b^yadidaṃ piṇḍolya^eb^nti yaṃ idaṃ piṇḍapariyesanena bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentassa jīvitaṃ. ayaṃ panettha padattho -- piṇḍāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, tassa kammaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ, piṇḍapariyesanena jīvikāti attho.

[03] ^b^abhisāpo^eb^ti akkoso. kupitā hi manussā attano paccatthikaṃ ``pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā kapālahattho piṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno careyyāsī''ti akkosanti. atha vā ``kiṃ tuyhaṃ akātabbaṃ atthi, yo tvaṃ evaṃ balavīriyūpapannopi hirottappaṃ pahāya kapaṇo piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī''ti evampi akkosantiyeva. ^b^tañca^eb^ ^a^P2.0113^ea^ ^b^kho eta^eb^nti taṃ etaṃ abhisapampi samānaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ. ^b^kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā^eb^ti mama sāsane jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā ca atthavasikā kāraṇavasikā hutvā kāraṇavasaṃ paṭicca upenti upagacchanti.

[03] ^b^rājābhinītā^eb^tiādīsu ye rañño santakaṃ khāditvā raññā bandhanāgāre bandhāpitā palāyitvā pabbajanti, te raññā bandhanaṃ abhinītattā ^b^rājābhinītā^eb^ nāma. ye pana corehi aṭaviyaṃ gahetvā ekaccesu māriyamānesu ^a^M0.0278^ea^ ekacce ``mayaṃ sāmi tumhehi vissaṭṭhā gehaṃ anajjhāvasitvā pabbajissāma, tattha tattha yaṃ yaṃ buddhapūjādipuññaṃ karissāma, tato tato tumhākaṃ pattiṃ dassāmā''ti tehi vissaṭṭhā pabbajanti, te ^b^corābhinītā^eb^ nāma corehi māretabbataṃ abhinītattā. ye pana iṇaṃ gahetvā paṭidātuṃ asakkontā palāyitvā pabbajanti, te ^b^iṇaṭṭā^eb^ nāma. tañca kho etaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ kulaputtā mama sāsane neva rājābhinītā...pe0... na ājīvikāpakatā upenti, apica kho ``otiṇṇamhā jātiyā...pe0... paññāyethā''ti upentīti padasambandho.

[03] tattha ^b^otiṇṇamhā^eb^ti otiṇṇā amhā. ^b^jātiyā^eb^tiādīsu tamhi tamhi sattanikāye khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti ^b^jāti,^eb^ paripāko ^b^jarā,^eb^ bhedo ^b^maraṇaṃ^eb^. ñātirogabhogasīladiṭṭhibyasanehi phuṭṭhassa santāpo anto nijjhānaṃ ^b^soko,^eb^ tehi phuṭṭhassa vacīvippalāpo ^b^paridevo^eb^. aniṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbapaṭihatakāyassa kāyapīḷanaṃ ^b^dukkhaṃ,^eb^ āghātavatthūsu upahatacittassa cetopīḷanaṃ ^b^domanassaṃ^eb^. ñātibyasanādīhi eva phuṭṭhassa paridevenapi adhivāsetuṃ asamatthassa cittasantāpasamuṭṭhito bhuso āyāso ^b^upāyāso^eb^. etehi jātiādīhi otiṇṇā ^b^dukkhotiṇṇā,^eb^ tehi jātiādidukkhehi anto anupaviṭṭhā. ^b^dukkhaparetā^eb^ti tehi dukkhadukkhavatthūhi ^a^V0.0257^ea^ abhibhūtā. jātiādayo hi dukkhassa vatthubhāvato dukkhā, dukkhabhāvato ca sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā dukkhāti. ^b^appeva nāma...pe0... paññāyethā^eb^ti imassa sakalassa vaṭṭadukkharāsissa ^a^P2.0114^ea^ paricchedakaraṇaṃ osānakiriyā api nāma paññāyeyya.

[03] ^b^so ca hoti abhijjhālū^eb^ti idaṃ yo kulaputto ``dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī''ti pubbe cittaṃ uppādetvā pabbajito aparabhāge taṃ pabbajjaṃ tathārūpaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^abhijjhālū^eb^ti parabhaṇḍānaṃ abhijjhāyitā. ^b^tibbasārāgo^eb^ti balavarāgo. ^b^byāpannacitto^eb^ti byāpādena pūtibhūtattā vipannacitto. ^b^paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo^eb^ti tikhiṇasiṅgo viya caṇḍagoṇo paresaṃ upaghātavasena duṭṭhacitto. ^b^muṭṭhassatī^eb^ti bhattanikkhittakāko viya, maṃsanikkhittasunakho viya ca naṭṭhassati, idha kataṃ ettha na sarati. ^b^asampajāno^eb^ti nippañño khandhādiparicchedarahito. ^b^asamāhito^eb^ti caṇḍasote baddhanāvā viya asaṇṭhito. ^b^vibbhantacitto^eb^ti panthāruḷhamigo viya bhantamano. ^b^pākatindriyo^eb^ti yathā gihī ^a^M0.0279^ea^ saṃvarābhāvena pariggahaparijane olokenti asaṃvutindriyā, evaṃ asaṃvutindriyo hoti.

[03] ^b^chavālāta^eb^nti chavānaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhāne alātaṃ. ^b^ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagata^eb^nti pamāṇena aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ ubhato dvīsu koṭīsu ādittaṃ majjhe gūthamakkhitaṃ. ^b^neva gāme^eb^ti sace hi taṃ yuganaṅgalagopānasipakkhapāsakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ phareyya. sace khettakuṭiyā kaṭṭhattharamañcakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa, araññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ phareyya. yasmā pana ubhayatthāpi na sakkā, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^tathūpamāha^eb^nti tathūpamaṃ chavālātasadisaṃ ahaṃ imaṃ yathāvuttapuggalaṃ vadāmi. ^b^gihibhogā ca parihīno^eb^ti yo agāre vasantehi gihīhi dāyajje bhājiyamāne aññathā ca bhogo laddhabbo assa, tato ca parihīno. ^b^sāmaññatthañcā^eb^ti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā pariyattipaṭivedhavasena pattabbaṃ sāmaññatthañca na paripūreti. imaṃ pana upamaṃ satthā na dussīlassa vasena āhari ^a^P2.0115^ea^, parisuddhasīlassa pana alasassa abhijjhādīhi dosehi dūsitacittassa puggalassa vasena āharīti veditabbaṃ.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^gihibhogā^eb^ti kāmasukhasambhogato. ^b^parihīno^eb^ti jīno. ^b^sāmaññattha^eb^nti paṭivedhabāhusaccañceva pariyattibāhusaccañca. tādiso hi asutaṃ sotuṃ sutaṃ pariyodāpetuṃ na sakkoti alasabhāvato. duṭṭhu bhagoti ^b^dubbhago,^eb^ alakkhiko kāḷakaṇṇipuriso. ^b^paridhaṃsamāno^eb^ti vinassamāno. ^b^pakiretī^eb^ti vikireti viddhaṃseti. sabbametaṃ bhāvino sāmaññatthassa ^a^V0.0258^ea^ anuppādanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^chavālātaṃva nassatī^eb^ti so tādiso puggalo yathāvuttaṃ chavālātaṃ viya kassaci anupayujjamāno eva nassati ubhato paribhaṭṭhabhāvato. evaṃ ``kāyavācāhi akatavītikkamopi cittaṃ avisodhento nassati, pageva katavītikkamo dussīlo''ti tassa apāyadukkhabhāgibhāvadassanena dussīle ādīnavaṃ dassetvā tato satte vivecetukāmo ^b^``kāsāvakaṇṭhā''^eb^tiādinā gāthādvayamāha. tassattho heṭṭhā vutto eva.
[06] dutiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M0.0280^ea^ ^b^saṅghāṭikaṇṇe^eb^ti cīvarakoṭiyaṃ. ^b^gahetvā^eb^ti parāmasitvā. ^b^anubandho assā^eb^ti anugato bhaveyya. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu attano hatthena mayā pārutassa sugatamahācīvarassa kaṇṇe parāmasanto viya maṃ anugaccheyya, evaṃ mayhaṃ āsannataro hutvā vihareyyā''ti. ^b^pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto^eb^ti gacchantassa mama pāde pādaṃ nikkhittaṭṭhāne pāduddhāraṇānantaraṃ attano pādaṃ nikkhipanto. ubhayenāpi ``ṭhānagamanādīsu avijahanto sabbakālaṃ mayhaṃ samīpe eva vihareyya cepī''ti dasseti. ^b^so ārakāva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassā^eb^ti so bhikkhu mayā vuttaṃ paṭipadaṃ apūrento mama dūreyeva, ahañca tassa dūreyeva. etena maṃsacakkhunā tathāgatadassanaṃ rūpakāyasamodhānañca ^a^P2.0116^ea^ akāraṇaṃ, ñāṇacakkhunāva dassanaṃ dhammakāyasamodhānameva ca pamāṇanti dasseti. tenevāha ``dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati, dhammaṃ apassanto na maṃ passatī''ti. tattha dhammo nāma navavidho lokuttaradhammo. so ca abhijjhādīhi dūsitacittena na sakkā passituṃ, tasmā dhammassa adassanato dhammakāyañca na passatīti. tathā hi vuttaṃ --
[02] ``kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati so maṃ passati; yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.87).
[02] ``dhammabhūto brahmabhūto''ti (ma0 ni0 1.203; paṭi0 ma0 3.5) ca.
[02] ``dhammakāyo itipi, brahmakāyo itipī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.118) ca ādi.
[03] ^b^yojanasate^eb^ti ^a^V0.0259^ea^ yojanasate padese, yojanasatamatthaketi attho. sesaṃ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ. ariyamaggādhigamavasena cassa anabhijjhāluādibhāvo daṭṭhabbo.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^mahiccho^eb^ti kāmesu tibbasārāgatāya mahāiccho. ^b^vighātavā^eb^ti paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappatāya sattesu āghātavasena mahicchatāya icchitālābhena ca vighātavā. ^b^ejānugo^eb^ti ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya ^a^M0.0281^ea^ dāso viya hutvā taṃ anugacchanto. rāgādikilesapariḷāhābhibhavena ^b^anibbuto^eb^. rūpādivisayānaṃ abhikaṅkhanena ^b^giddho. passa yāvañca ārakā^eb^ti anejassa nibbutassa vītagedhassa sammāsambuddhassa okāsavasena samīpepi samāno mahiccho vighātavā ejānugo anibbuto giddho bālaputhujjano dhammasabhāvato yattakaṃ dūre, tassa so dūrabhāvo passa, vattumpi na sukaranti attho. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre,
[27] pāraṃ samuddassa tathāhu dūre.
[26] tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti,
[22] satañca dhammo asatañca rājā''ti.. (a0 ni0 4.47; jā0 2.21.414).

[03] ^b^dhammamabhiññāyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0117^ea^ catusaccadhammaṃ abhiññāya aññāya ñātatīraṇapariññāhi yathārahaṃ pubbabhāge jānitvā. ^b^dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti tameva dhammaṃ aparabhāge maggañāṇena pariññādivasena yathāmariyādaṃ jānitvā. ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti paṭivedhabāhusaccena paṇḍito. ^b^rahadova nivāte cā^eb^ti nivātaṭṭhāne rahado viya ^b^anejo^eb^ kilesacalanarahito upasammati, yathā so rahado nivātaṭṭhāne vātena anabbhāhato sannisinnova hoti, evaṃ ayampi sabbathāpi paṭippassaddhakileso kilesacalanarahito arahattaphalasamādhinā vūpasammati, sabbakālaṃ upasantasabhāvova hoti. ^b^anejo^eb^ti so evaṃ anejādisabhāvo arahā anejādisabhāvassa sammāsambuddhassa okāsato dūrepi samāno dhammasabhāvato adūre santike evāti.
[06] tatiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V0.0260^ea^ anudahanaṭṭhena aggi, rāgo eva aggi rāgaggi. rāgo hi uppajjamāno satte anudahati jhāpeti, tasmā ``aggī''ti vuccati. itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. tattha yathā aggi yadeva indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjati, taṃ nidahati, mahāpariḷāho ca hoti, evamimepi ^a^M0.0282^ea^ rāgādayo yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ uppannā, taṃ nidahanti, mahāpariḷāhā ca honti dunnibbāpayā. tesu rāgapariḷāhena santattahadayānaṃ icchitālābhadukkhena maraṇappattānaṃ sattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. ayaṃ tāva rāgassa anudahanatā. dosassa pana anudahanatāya visesato manopadosikā devā, mohassa anudahanatāya khiḍḍāpadosikā devā ca nidassanaṃ. mohavasena hi tesaṃ satisammoso hoti, tasmā khiḍḍāvasena āhāravelaṃ ativattentā kālaṃ karonti. ayaṃ tāva rāgādīnaṃ diṭṭhadhammiko anudahanabhāvo. samparāyiko pana nirayādīsu nibbattāpanavasena ghorataro duradhivāso ca. ayañca attho ādittapariyāyena vibhāvetabbo.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^kāmesu mucchite^eb^ti vatthukāmesu pātabyatāvasena mucchaṃ bālyaṃ pamādaṃ micchācāraṃ āpanne. ^b^byāpanne^eb^ti ^a^P2.0118^ea^ byāpannacitte dahatīti sambandho. ^b^nare pāṇātipātino^eb^ti idaṃ dosaggissa. ^b^ariyadhamme akovide^eb^ti ye khandhāyatanādīsu sabbena sabbaṃ uggahaparipucchāya manasikārarahitā ariyadhammassa akusalā, te sammohena abhibhūtā visesena sammūḷhā nāmāti vuttā. ^b^ete aggī ajānantā^eb^ti ``ete rāgaggiādayo idha ceva samparāye ca anudahantī''ti ajānanttāā pariññābhisamayavasena pahānābhisamayavasena ca appaṭivijjhantā. ^b^sakkāyābhiratā^eb^ti sakkāye upādānakkhandhapañcake taṇhādiṭṭhimānanandanābhiratā. ^b^vaḍḍhayantī^eb^ti punappunaṃ uppajjanena vaḍḍhayanti ācinanti. ^b^niraya^eb^nti aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahānirayaṃ, soḷasavidhaṃ ussadanirayanti sabbampi nirayaṃ. ^b^tiracchānañca yoniyo^eb^ti tiracchānayoniyo ca. ^b^asura^eb^nti asurakāyaṃ pettivisayañca vaḍḍhayantīti sambandho.

[03] ettāvatā rāgaggiādīnaṃ idha ceva samparāye ca anudahanabhāvadassanamukhena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni nesaṃ nibbāpanena vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ye ca rattindivā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yuttā^eb^ti bhāvanānuyogavasena yuttā. kattha? ^b^sammāsambuddhasāsane^eb^. tena aññasāsane rāgaggiādīnaṃ nibbāpanābhāvaṃ dasseti. tathā hi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ tesaṃ nibbāpanavidhiṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhepeneva dassento --
[21] ``te ^a^V0.0261^ea^ nibbāpenti rāgaggiṃ, niccaṃ asubhasaññino.
[27] dosaggiṃ pana mettāya, nibbāpenti naruttamā.
[22] mohaggiṃ pana paññāya, yāyaṃ nibbedhagāminī''ti.. --

[25] āha ^a^M0.0283^ea^. tattha ^b^asubhasaññino^eb^ti dvattiṃsākāravasena ceva uddhumātakādivasena ca asubhabhāvanānuyogena asubhasaññino. ^b^mettāyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0119^ea^ ``so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī''ti (a0 ni0 3.64, 66) vuttāya mettābhāvanāya. ettha ca asubhajjhānañca pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitānāgāmimaggena rāgaggidosaggīnaṃ nibbāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya. tenevāha ``yāyaṃ nibbedhagāminī''ti. sā hi kilesakkhandhaṃ vinivijjhantī gacchati pavattatīti ^b^nibbedhagāminī^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^asesaṃ parinibbantī^eb^ti arahattamaggena asesaṃ rāgaggiādiṃ nibbāpetvā saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā ṭhitā paññāvepullappattiyā ^b^nipakā^eb^ pubbeva sammappadhānena sabbaso kosajjassa suppahīnattā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena akilāsubhāvena ca ^b^rattindivamatanditā^eb^ carimakacittanirodhena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā asesaṃ parinibbanti. tato ca ^b^asesaṃ^eb^ nissesaṃ ^b^vaṭṭadukkhaṃ accaguṃ^eb^ atikkamaṃsu.

[03] evaṃ ye rāgaggiādike nibbāpenti, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānena nibbutiṃ dassetvā idāni paṭividdhaguṇehi thomento osānagāthamāha. tattha ^b^ariyaddasā^eb^ti ariyehi buddhādīhi passitabbaṃ kilesehi vā ārakattā ariyaṃ nibbānaṃ, ariyaṃ catusaccameva vā diṭṭhavantoti ariyaddasā. vedassa maggañāṇassa, tena vā vedena saṃsārassa pariyosānaṃ gatāti ^b^vedaguno. sammadaññāyā^eb^ti sammadeva sabbaṃ ājānitabbaṃ kusalādiṃ khandhādiñca jānitvā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] catutthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^tathā tathā^eb^ti tena tena pakārena. ^b^upaparikkheyyā^eb^ti vīmaṃseyya parituleyya sammaseyya vā. ^b^yathā yathāssa upaparikkhato^eb^ti yathā yathā assa bhikkhuno upaparikkhantassa. ^b^bahiddhā^eb^ ^a^P2.0120^ea^ ^b^cassa viññāṇaṃ avikkhittaṃ avisaṭa^eb^nti bahiddhā rūpādiārammaṇe uppajjanakavikkhepābhāvato ^a^V0.0262^ea^ avikkhittaṃ samāhitaṃ, tato eva avisaṭaṃ siyā ^a^M0.0284^ea^. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- bhikkhave, yena yena pakārena imassa āraddhavipassakassa bhikkhuno upaparikkhato saṅkhāre sammasantassa pubbe samāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena samathanimittaṃ gahetvā sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ sammasanañāṇaṃ pavattentassa attano vipassanācittaṃ kammaṭṭhānato bahiddhā rūpādiārammaṇe uppajjanakaṃ na siyā, accāraddhavīriyatāya uddhaccapakkhiyaṃ na siyā, tena tena pakārena bhikkhu upaparikkheyya parituleyyāti. ^b^ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhita^eb^nti yasmā vīriye mandaṃ vahante samādhissa balavabhāvato kosajjābhibhavena ajjhattaṃ gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe saṅkocavasena ṭhitattā saṇṭhitaṃ nāma hoti, vīriyasamatāya pana yojitāya asaṇṭhitaṃ hoti vīthiṃ paṭipannaṃ. tasmā yathā yathāssa upaparikkhato viññāṇaṃ ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhitaṃ assa, vīthipaṭipannaṃ siyā, tathā tathā upaparikkheyya. ^b^anupādāya na paritasseyyā^eb^ti yathā yathāssa upaparikkhato ``etaṃ mama, eso me attā''ti taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhavasena rūpādīsu kañci saṅkhāraṃ aggahetvā tato eva taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhavasena na paritasseyya, tathā tathā upaparikkheyyāti sambandho. kathaṃ pana upaparikkhato tividhampetaṃ siyāti? uddhaccapakkhiye kosajjapakkhiye ca dhamme vajjento vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā pubbeva vipassanupakkilesehi cittaṃ visodhetvā yathā sammadeva vipassanāñāṇaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipajjati, tathā sammasato.

[03] iti bhagavā catusaccakammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno anukkamena paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā āraddhāya accāraddhavīriyātisithilavīriyavipassanupakkilesehi cittassa visodhanūpāyaṃ dassetvā idāni tathā visodhite vipassanāñāṇe na cirasseva vipassanaṃ maggena ghaṭetvā sakalavaṭṭadukkhasamatikkamāya saṃvattantīti dassento ^b^``bahiddhā, bhikkhave^eb^ ^a^P2.0121^ea^, ^b^viññāṇe''^eb^tiādimāha, taṃ vuttanayameva. yaṃ pana vuttaṃ -- ^b^``āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotī''^eb^ti, tassattho -- evaṃ vipassanaṃ maggena ghaṭetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggena anavasesato kilesesu khīṇesu āyatiṃ anāgate jātijarāmaraṇasakalavaṭṭadukkhasamudayasaṅkhāto sambhavo uppādo ca na hoti, jātisaṅkhāto vā dukkhasamudayo jarāmaraṇasaṅkhāto dukkhasambhavo ca na hoti.

[03] gāthāyaṃ ^a^M0.0285^ea^ ^b^sattasaṅgappahīnassā^eb^ti taṇhāsaṅgo, diṭṭhisaṅgo, mānasaṅgo, kodhasaṅgo, avijjāsaṅgo, kilesasaṅgo, duccaritasaṅgoti imesaṃ sattannaṃ saṅgānaṃ pahīnattā sattasaṅgappahīnassa. keci pana ``sattānusayā eva satta saṅgā''ti vadanti. ^b^netticchinnassā^eb^ti chinnabhavanettikassa ^a^V0.0263^ea^. ^b^vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro^eb^ti punappunaṃ jāyanavasena pavattiyā jātihetukattā ca jātibhūto saṃsāroti jātisaṃsāro, so bhavanettiyā chinnattā vikkhīṇo parikkhīṇo, tato eva ^b^natthi tassa punabbhavo^eb^ti.
[06] pañcamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kāmūpapattiyo^eb^ti kāmapaṭilābhā kāmapaṭisevanā vā. ^b^paccupaṭṭhitakāmā^eb^ti nibaddhakāmā nibaddhārammaṇā yathā taṃ manussā. manussā hi nibaddhavatthusmiṃ vasaṃ vattenti. yattha paṭibaddhacittā honti, satampi sahassampi datvā tameva mātugāmaṃ ānetvā nibaddhabhogaṃ bhuñjanti. ekacce ca devā. cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya hi catudevalokavāsino nibaddhavatthusmiṃyeva vasaṃ vattenti. pañcasikhavatthu cettha nidassanaṃ. tathā ekacce āpāyike nerayike ṭhapetvā sesāpāyasattāpi nibaddhavatthusmiṃyeva vasaṃ vattenti. macchā hi attano macchiyā, kacchapo kacchapiyāti evaṃ sabbepi tiracchānā petā vinipātikā ^a^P2.0122^ea^ ca. tasmā nerayike ṭhapetvā sesāpāyasatte upādāya yāva tusitakāyā ime sattā paccupaṭṭhitakāmā nāma, ^b^nimmānaratino^eb^ti sayaṃ nimmite nimmāne rati etesanti nimmānaratino. te hi nīlapītādivasena yādisaṃ yādisaṃ rūpaṃ icchanti, tādisaṃ tādisaṃ nimminitvā ramanti āyasmato anuruddhassa purato manāpakāyikā devatā viya. ^b^paranimmitavasavattino^eb^ti parehi nimmite kāme vasaṃ vattentīti paranimmitavasavattino. tesañhi manaṃ ñatvā pare yathārucitaṃ kāmabhogaṃ nimminanti, te tattha vasaṃ vattenti. kathaṃ te parassa manaṃ jānantīti? pakatisevanāvasena. yathā hi kusalo sūdo rañño bhuñjantassa yaṃ yaṃ ruccati, taṃ taṃ jānāti, evaṃ pakatiyā abhirucitārammaṇaṃ ñatvā tādiseyeva nimminanti, te tattha vasaṃ ^a^M0.0286^ea^ vattenti, methunasevanādivasena kāme paribhuñjanti. keci pana ``hasitamattena olokitamattena āliṅgitamattena hatthaggahaṇamattena ca tesaṃ kāmakiccaṃ ijjhatī''ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ``etaṃ pana natthī''ti paṭikkhittaṃ. na hi kāyena aphusantassa phoṭṭhabbaṃ kāmakiccaṃ sādheti. channampi kāmāvacaradevānaṃ kāmā pākatikā eva. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``cha ete kāmāvacarā, sabbakāmasamiddhino.
[22] sabbesaṃ ekasaṅkhātaṃ, āyu bhavati kittaka''nti.. (vibha0 1023).

[03] gāthāsu ^a^V0.0264^ea^ ^b^ye caññe^eb^ti ye yathāvuttadevehi aññe ca kāmabhogino manussā ceva ekacce apāyūpagā ca sabbe te. ^b^itthabhāvaññathābhāva^eb^nti imaṃ yathāpaṭiladdhattabhāvañceva, upapattibhavantarasaṅkhātaṃ ito aññathābhāvañcāti dvippabhedaṃ saṃsāraṃ ^b^nātivattare^eb^ na atikkamanti. ^b^sabbe pariccaje kāme^eb^ti dibbādibhede sabbepi kāme vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca pariccajeyya. kilesakāme anāgāmimaggena pajahantoyeva hi vatthukāme pariccajati nāma. ^b^piyarūpasātagadhita^eb^nti ^a^P2.0123^ea^ piyarūpesu rūpādīsu sukhavedanassādena gadhitaṃ giddhaṃ. ^b^chetvā sotaṃ duraccaya^eb^nti aññehi duraccayaṃ duratikkamaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ arahattamaggena samucchinditvā. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
[06] chaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^kāmayogayutto^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo kāmayogo, tena yutto kāmayogayutto, asamucchinnakāmarāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo bhavayogo, tathā jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca rāgo, tena yutto ^b^bhavayogayutto,^eb^ appahīnabhavarāgoti attho. ^b^āgāmī^eb^ti brahmaloke ṭhitopi paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgamanasīlo. tenevāha ^b^``āgantā itthatta''^eb^nti. manussattabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ itthabhāvaṃ āgamanadhammo ^a^M0.0287^ea^, manussesu upapajjanasīloti attho. kāmañcettha kāmayogo itthattaṃ āgamanassa kāraṇaṃ. yo pana kāmayogayutto, so ekantena bhavayogayuttopi hotīti dassanatthaṃ ``kāmayogayutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto''ti ubhayampi ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.

[01] ^b^kāmayogavisaṃyutto^eb^ti ettha asubhajjhānampi kāmayogavisaṃyogo, taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigato anāgāmimaggo ekanteneva kāmayogavisaṃyogo nāma, tasmā tatiyamaggaphale ṭhito ariyapuggalo ``kāmayogavisaṃyutto''ti vutto. yasmā pana rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo anāgāmimaggena na pahīyati, tasmā so appahīnabhavayogattā ``bhavayogayutto''ti vutto. ^b^anāgāmī^eb^ti kāmalokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena anāgamanato anāgāmī. kāmayogavisaṃyogavaseneva hi saddhiṃ anavasesaorambhāgiyasaṃyojanasamugghātena ajjhattasaṃyojanābhāvasiddhito itthattaṃ anāgantvā hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo. yassa pana anavasesaṃ bhavayogo pahīno, tassa avijjāyogādiavasiṭṭhakilesāpi tadekaṭṭhabhāvato pahīnā eva hontīti ^a^P2.0124^ea^, so parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano ^a^V0.0265^ea^ ``arahaṃ khīṇāsavo''ti vuccati. tena vuttaṃ ``kāmayogavisaṃyutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogavisaṃyutto arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo''ti. ettha ca kāmayogavisaṃyogo anāgāmī catutthajjhānassa sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassappahānaṃ viya, tatiyamaggassa diṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaparikkhayo viya ca catutthamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. paṭhamapadena sotāpannasakadāgāmīhi saddhiṃ sabbo puthujjano gahito, dutiyapadena pana sabbo anāgāmī, tatiyapadena arahāti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti ubhayena, kāmayogena, bhavayogena ca saṃyuttāti attho. ^b^sattā gacchanti saṃsāra^eb^nti puthujjanā sotāpannā sakadāgāminoti ime tividhā sattā kāmayogabhavayogānaṃ appahīnattā gacchanti saṃsāranti. tato eva jātimaraṇagāmino honti. ettha ekabījī, kolaṃkolo, sattakkhattuparamoti tīsu sotāpannesu sabbamudu sattakkhattuparamo, so aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ na nibbatteti, attano ^a^M0.0288^ea^ paricchinnajātivasena pana saṃsarati, tathā itarepi. sakadāgāmīsupi yo idha sakadāgāmimaggaṃ patvā devaloke uppajjitvā puna idha nibbattati, so attano paricchinnajātivaseneva saṃsarati. ye pana sakadāgāmino vomissakanayena vinā tattha tattha devesuyeva manussesuyeva vā nibbattanti, te uparimaggādhigamāya yāva indriyaparipākā punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsarantiyeva. puthujjane pana vattabbameva natthi sabbabhavasaṃyojanānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``kāmayogena saṃyuttā, bhavayogena cūbhayaṃ.
[22] sattā gacchanti saṃsāraṃ, jātimaraṇagāmino''ti..

[03] ^b^kāme pahantvānā^eb^ti kāmarāgasaṅkhāte kilesakāme anāgāmimaggena pajahitvā. ^b^chinnasaṃsayā^eb^ti samucchinnakaṅkhā, tañca kho sotāpattimaggeneva. vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ pana catutthamaggassa evaṃ ^a^P2.0125^ea^ vuttaṃ. arahanto hi idha ``chinnasaṃsayā''ti adhippetā. tenevāha ^b^``khīṇamānapunabbhavā''^eb^ti. sabbaso khīṇo navavidhopi māno āyatiṃ punabbhavo ca etesanti khīṇamānapunabbhavā. mānaggahaṇena cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya lakkhaṇavasena vā sabbo catutthamaggavajjho kileso gahitoti. khīṇamānatāya ca saupādisesā nibbānadhātu vuttā hoti, khīṇapunabbhavatāya anupādisesā. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06] sattamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V0.0266^ea^ ^b^kalyāṇasīlo^eb^ti sundarasīlo, pasatthasīlo, paripuṇṇasīlo. tattha sīlapāripūrī dvīhi kāraṇehi hoti sammadeva sīlavipattiyā ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā ca ānisaṃsadassanena. idha pana sabbaparibandhavippamuttassa sabbākāraparipuṇṇassa maggasīlassa phalasīlassa ca vasena kalyāṇatā veditabbā. ^b^kalyāṇadhammo^eb^ti sabbe bodhipakkhiyadhammā adhippetā, tasmā kalyāṇā satipaṭṭhānādibodhipakkhiyadhammā etassāti kalyāṇadhammo. ^b^kalyāṇapañño^eb^ti ca maggaphalapaññāvaseneva ^a^M0.0289^ea^ kalyāṇapañño. lokuttarā eva hi sīlādidhammā ekantakalyāṇā nāma akuppasabhāvattā. keci pana ``catupārisuddhisīlavasena kalyāṇasīlo, vipassanāmaggadhammavasena kalyāṇadhammo, maggaphalapaññāvasena kalyāṇapañño''ti vadanti. asekkhā eva te sīladhammapaññāti eke. apare pana bhaṇanti -- sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ maggaphalasīlaṃ kalyāṇasīlaṃ nāma, tasmā ``kalyāṇasīlo''ti iminā sotāpanno sakadāgāmī ca gahitā honti. te hi sīlesu paripūrakārino nāma. anāgāmimaggaphaladhammā aggamaggadhammā ca kalyāṇadhammā nāma. tattha hi bodhipakkhiyadhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. tasmā ``kalyāṇadhammo''ti iminā tatiyamaggaṭṭhato paṭṭhāya tayo ariyā gahitā honti. paññākiccassa matthakappattiyā aggaphale paññā kalyāṇapaññā nāma, tasmā paññāvepullappatto arahā ``kalyāṇapañño''ti vutto. evameva puggalā gahitā hontīti. kiṃ iminā papañcena? aggamaggaphaladhammā idha kalyāṇasīlādayo ^a^P2.0126^ea^ vuttāti ayamamhākaṃ khanti. dhammavibhāgena hi ayaṃ puggalavibhāgo, na dhammavibhāgoti.

[03] ^b^kevalī^eb^ti ettha kevalaṃ vuccati kenaci avomissakatāya sabbasaṅkhatavivittaṃ nibbānaṃ, tassa adhigatattā arahā kevalī. atha vā pahānabhāvanāpāripūriyā pariyosānānavajjadhammapāripūriyā ca kalyāṇakaṭṭhena abyāsekasukhatāya ca kevalaṃ arahattaṃ, tadadhigamena kevalī khīṇāsavo. maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasitvā pariyosāpetvā ṭhitoti ^b^vusitavā^eb^. uttamehi aggabhūtehi vā asekkhadhammehi samannāgatattā ^b^``uttamapuriso''^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti ettha kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ? sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma? samādhānaṃ, susīlyavasena kāyakammādīnaṃ avippakiṇṇatāti attho. atha vā upadhāraṇaṃ, jhānādikusaladhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti attho. tasmā sīlati, sīletīti vā sīlaṃ. ayaṃ tāva saddalakkhaṇanayena sīlaṭṭho. apare pana ``siraṭṭho sīlaṭṭho, sītalaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho, sivaṭṭho ^a^V0.0267^ea^ sīlaṭṭho''ti niruttinayena atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. tayidaṃ pāripūrito atisayato vā sīlaṃ assa atthīti ^b^sīlavā,^eb^ catupārisuddhisīlavasena sīlasampannoti attho. tattha yaṃ jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ ^a^M0.0290^ea^, taṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^``pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto''^eb^tiādi vuttanti ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ adhippāyo.

[03] aparena pana bhaṇanti -- ubhayatthāpi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto. pātimokkhasaṃvaro eva hi sīlaṃ, itaresu indriyasaṃvaro chadvārarakkhaṇamattameva, ājīvapārisuddhi dhammena paccayuppādanamattameva, paccayasannissitaṃ paṭiladdhapaccaye ``idamattha''nti paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanamattameva. nippariyāyena pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlaṃ. yassa so bhinno, so sīsacchinno puriso viya hatthapāde ``sesāni rakkhissatī''ti na vattabbo. yassa pana so arogo, acchinnasīso viya puriso, tāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti. tasmā ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti iminā pātimokkhasīlameva uddisitvā taṃ vitthāretuṃ ^b^``pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto''^eb^tiādi vuttanti.

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0127^ea^ ^b^pātimokkha^eb^nti sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ. saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. pātimokkhameva saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, tena saṃvuto pihitakāyavācoti ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^. idamassa tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^viharatī^eb^ti tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^ācāragocarasampanno^eb^ti heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṃvarassa, upari visesānuyogassa ca upakārakadhammaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī^eb^ti pātimokkhasīlato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ. ^b^samādāyā^eb^ti sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^sikkhatī^eb^ti sikkhāya samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti sikkhitabbadhammaparidīpanaṃ.

[03] aparo nayo -- kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī, maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī, sattasantāno, cittameva vā. taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkho. cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimutto ^a^M0.0291^ea^. ``cittavodānā visujjhantī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.100) ``anupādāya āsavehi ^a^V0.0268^ea^ cittaṃ vimutta''nti (ma0 ni0 2.206) ca vuttaṃ. atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti. ``avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata''nti (saṃ0 ni0 2.124; 5.520) hi vuttaṃ. tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. ``kaṇṭhekālo''tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā.

[03] atha ^a^P2.0128^ea^ vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. vuttañhi ``cittena nīyati loko, cittena parikassatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.62). tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhādisaṃkileso. vuttañhi ``taṇhā janeti purisaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 1.56-57), taṇhādutiyo puriso''ti (itivu0 15, 105; cūḷani0 pārāyanānugītigāthāniddesa 107) ca ādi. tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho. atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikāni bāhirāni ca āyatanāni. vuttañhi ``chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.70). tato chājjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho. atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. tato mokkhoti pātimokkho. atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati, muccati etenāti mokkho, patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttaṭṭhena mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta''nti (mahāva0 135) vitthāro.

[03] atha vā ^b^pa^eb^iti pakāre, ^b^atī^eb^ti accantatthe nipāto. tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti pātimokkho. idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ. pati pati mokkhoti vā ^a^M0.0292^ea^ patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamitabbadosato pati paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho. patimokkho eva pātimokkho. mokkhoti vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtanti patimokkhaṃ. pātimokkhasīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya hoti yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanatoti patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhaṃ eva pātimokkhaṃ. atha ^a^P2.0129^ea^ vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati mokkhābhimukhanti patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāvettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.

[03] saṃvarati ^a^V0.0269^ea^ pidahati etenāti ^b^saṃvaro,^eb^ pātimokkhameva saṃvaroti ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvaro^eb^. atthato pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo cetanā vā, tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto samannāgato ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^ti vutto. vuttañhetaṃ vibhaṅge --
[02] ``iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato. tena vuccati pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto''ti (vibha0 511).

[03] ^b^viharatī^eb^ti iriyāpathavihārena viharati, iriyati, vattati. ^b^ācāragocarasampanno^eb^ti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena, sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā ``kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko avītikkamo''ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhusāruppāacārasampattiyā vesiyādiagocaraṃ vajjetvā piṇḍapātādiatthaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānasaṅkhātagocarena ca sampannattā ācāragocarasampanno. apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyānuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācārasampanno.

[03] gocaro ^a^M0.0293^ea^ pana -- upanissayagocaro, ārakkhagocaro, upanibandhagocaroti tividho. tattha dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato vuttalakkhaṇo kalyāṇamitto yaṃ nissāya asutaṃ suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodapeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti, yassa ca anusikkhanto saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati, ayaṃ ^b^upanissayagocaro^eb^. yo bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī saṃvuto gacchati, na hatthiṃ ^a^P2.0130^ea^ olokento, na assaṃ, na rathaṃ, na pattiṃ, na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ olokento, na uddhaṃ olokento, na adho olokento, na disāvidisā pekkhamāno gacchati, ayaṃ ^b^ārakkhagocaro. upanibandhagocaro^eb^ pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, yattha bhikkhu attano cittaṃ upanibandhati. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[02] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo? yadidaṃ -- cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.372).
[03] iti ^a^V0.0270^ea^ yathāvuttāya ācārasampattiyā imāya ca gocarasampattiyā samannāgatattā ^b^ācāragocarasampanno^eb^.

[03] ^b^aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī^eb^ti appamattakesu aṇuppamāṇesu asañcicca āpannasekhiyākusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo. yo hi bhikkhu paramāṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatarājasadisaṃ katvā passati, yopi bhikkhu sabbalahukaṃ dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā passati, ayaṃ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī nāma. ^b^samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati vattati, pūretīti attho. ^b^iti kalyāṇasīlo^eb^ti iminā pakārena kalyāṇasīlo samāno. puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena hi niddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ ``evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇasīlo hotī''ti vuttapuggalādhiṭṭhānavaseneva nigametvā ``kalyāṇadhammo''ti ettha vuttadhamme niddisitukāmena ``tesaṃ dhammānaṃ idaṃ sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāna''nti dassetuṃ puna ``iti kalyāṇasīlo''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^sattannaṃ bodhipakkhiyāna^eb^ntiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. puna ^b^kalyāṇasīlo^eb^tiādi nigamanaṃ.

[03] gāthāsu ^a^M0.0294^ea^ ^b^dukkaṭa^eb^nti duṭṭhu kataṃ, duccaritanti attho. ^b^hirimana^eb^nti hirimantaṃ hirisampannaṃ, sabbaso pāpapavattiyā jigucchanasabhāvanti attho. ^b^hirimana^eb^nti vā hirisahitacittaṃ. hiriggahaṇeneva cettha ottappampi gahitanti veditabbaṃ. hirottappaggahaṇena ca sabbaso duccaritābhāvassa hetuṃ dassento kalyāṇasīlataṃ hetuto vibhāveti. ^b^sambodhī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0131^ea^ ariyañāṇaṃ, taṃ gacchanti bhajantīti ^b^sambodhigāmino,^eb^ bodhipakkhikāti attho. ^b^anussada^eb^nti rāgussadādirahitaṃ. ``tathāvidha''ntipi paṭhanti. ``bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto''ti yathā yathā pubbe vuttaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ tādisanti attho. ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa, vaṭṭadukkhahetuno vā. ^b^idheva khayamattano^eb^ti āsavakkhayādhigamena attano vaṭṭadukkhahetuno samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa idheva imasmiṃyeva attabhāve khayaṃ anuppādaṃ pajānāti, vaṭṭadukkhasseva vā idheva carimakacittanirodhena khayaṃ khīṇabhāvaṃ pajānāti. ^b^tehi dhammehi sampanna^eb^nti tehi yathāvuttasīlādidhammehi samannāgataṃ. ^b^asita^eb^nti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayānaṃ pahīnattā asitaṃ, katthaci anissitaṃ. ^b^sabbalokassā^eb^ti sabbasmiṃ sattaloke. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] aṭṭhamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V0.0271^ea^ ^b^dāna^eb^nti dātabbaṃ, savatthukā vā cetanā dānaṃ, sampattipariccāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^āmisadāna^eb^nti cattāro paccayā deyyabhāvavasena āmisadānaṃ nāma. te hi taṇhādīhi āmasitabbato āmisanti vuccanti. tesaṃ vā pariccāgacetanā āmisadānaṃ. ^b^dhammadāna^eb^nti idhekacco ``ime dhammā kusalā, ime dhammā akusalā, ime dhammā sāvajjā, ime dhammā anavajjā, ime viññugarahitā, ime viññuppasatthā; ime samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti, ime hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī''ti kusalākusalakammapathe vibhajanto kammakammavipāke idhalokaparaloke paccakkhato dassento viya pākaṭaṃ karonto akusalehi dhammehi nivattāpento, kusalesu dhammesu patiṭṭhāpento, dhammaṃ deseti, idaṃ dhammadānaṃ. yo pana ``ime dhammā abhiññeyyā ^a^M0.0295^ea^, ime pariññeyyā, ime pahātabbā, ime sacchikātabbā, ime bhāvetabbā''ti saccāni vibhāvento amatādhigamāya paṭipattidhammaṃ ^a^P2.0132^ea^ deseti, idaṃ sikhāppattaṃ dhammadānaṃ nāma. ^b^etadagga^eb^nti etaṃ aggaṃ. ^b^yadida^eb^nti yaṃ idaṃ dhammadānaṃ vuttaṃ, etaṃ imesu dvīsu dānesu aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ. vivaṭṭagāmidhammadānañhi nissāya sabbānatthato parimuccati, sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkamati. lokiyaṃ pana dhammadānaṃ sabbesaṃ dānānaṃ nidānaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ. tenāha --
[21] ``sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jināti, sabbarasaṃ dhammaraso jināti.
[22] sabbaratiṃ dhammaratī jināti, taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jinātī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 354) --
[25] abhayadānamettha dhammadāneneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] sādhāraṇabhogitādhippāyena attanā paribhuñjitabbato catupaccayato sayameva abhuñjitvā paresaṃ saṃvibhajanaṃ ^b^āmisasaṃvibhāgo^eb^. sādhāraṇabhogitādhippāyeneva attanā viditassa adhigatassa dhammassa appossukko ahutvā paresaṃ upadeso ^b^dhammasaṃvibhāgo^eb^. catūhi paccayehi catūhi ca saṅgahavatthūhi paresaṃ anuggaṇhanaṃ anukampanaṃ ^b^āmisānuggaho^eb^. vuttanayeneva dhammena paresaṃ anuggaṇhanaṃ anukampanaṃ ^b^dhammānuggaho^eb^. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[01] gāthāsu ^b^yamāhu dānaṃ parama^eb^nti yaṃ dānaṃ cittakhettadeyyadhammānaṃ uḷārabhāvena paramaṃ uttamaṃ, bhogasampattiādīnaṃ vā pūraṇato phalanato, parassa vā lobhamacchariyādikassa paṭipakkhassa maddanato ^a^V0.0272^ea^ hiṃsanato ``parama''nti buddhā bhagavanto āhu. ^b^anuttara^eb^nti yaṃ dānaṃ cetanādisampattiyā sātisayapavattiyā aggabhāvena aggavipākattā ca uttararahitaṃ anuttarabhāvasādhanaṃ cāti āhu. ^b^yaṃ saṃvibhāga^eb^nti etthāpi ``paramaṃ anuttara''nti padadvayaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^avaṇṇayī^eb^ti kittayi, ``bhojanaṃ, bhikkhave, dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṃ pañca ṭhānāni detī''tiādinā (a0 ni0 5.37), ``evaṃ ^a^P2.0133^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, sattā jāneyyuṃ dānasaṃvibhāgassa vipāka''ntiādinā (itivu0 26) ca pasaṃsayi. yathā pana dānaṃ saṃvibhāgo ca paramaṃ anuttarañca hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``aggamhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^aggamhī^eb^ti sīlādiguṇavisesayogena seṭṭhe anuttare puññakkhette sammāsambuddhe ariyasaṅghe ca. ^b^pasannacitto^eb^ti ^a^M0.0296^ea^ kammaphalasaddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya ca cittaṃ pasādento okappento. cittasampattiyā hi khettasampattiyā ca parittepi deyyadhamme dānaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ hoti mahājutikaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``natthi citte pasannamhi, appakā nāma dakkhiṇā.
[22] tathāgate vā sambuddhe, atha vā tassa sāvake''ti.. (vi0 va0 804; netti0 95).

[01] ^b^viññū^eb^ti sappañño. ^b^pajāna^eb^nti sammadeva dānaphalaṃ dānānisaṃsaṃ pajānanto. ^b^ko na yajetha kāle^eb^ti yuttappattakāle ko nāma dānaṃ na dadeyya? saddhā, deyyadhammo, paṭiggāhakāti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammukhibhūtakāleyeva hi dānaṃ sambhavati, na aññathā, paṭiggāhakānaṃ vā dātuṃ yuttakāle.

[03] evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya āmisadānasaṃvibhāgānuggahe dassetvā idāni dhammadānasaṃvibhāgānuggahe dassetuṃ ^b^``ye ceva bhāsantī''^eb^ti dutiyagāthamāha. tattha ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti ``bhāsanti suṇantī''ti vuttā desakā paṭiggāhakāti ubhayaṃ. ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho -- ye ^b^sugatassa^eb^ bhagavato ^b^sāsane^eb^ saddhamme ^b^pasannacittā^eb^ vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā desenti paṭiggaṇhanti ca, tesaṃ desakapaṭiggāhakānaṃ so dhammadānadhammasaṃvibhāgadhammānuggahasaṅkhāto ^b^attho^eb^. paramatthasādhanato ^b^paramo^eb^. taṇhāsaṃkilesādisabbasaṃkilesamalavisodhanena ^b^visujjhati^eb^. kīdisānaṃ? ^b^ye appamattā sugatassa sāsane^eb^. ye ca --
[21] ``sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ, kusalassa upasampadā.
[22] sacittapariyodapanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana''nti.. (dī0 ni0 2.90; dha0 pa0 183) --

[25] saṅkhepato ^a^V0.0273^ea^ evaṃ pakāsite sammāsambuddhassa sāsane ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ appamattā adhisīlasikkhādayo sakkaccaṃ ^a^P2.0134^ea^ sampādenti. tesaṃ ^b^visujjhati,^eb^ arahattaphalavisuddhiyā ativiya vodāyatīti.
[06] navamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti ñāyena, sammāpaṭipattisaṅkhātena hetunā kāraṇena. yāya hi paṭipadāya tevijjo hoti, sā paṭipadā idha dhammoti ^a^M0.0297^ea^ veditabbā. kā pana sā paṭipadāti? caraṇasampadā ca vijjāsampadā ca. ^b^tevijja^eb^nti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇādīhi tīhi vijjāhi samannāgataṃ. ^b^brāhmaṇa^eb^nti bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇaṃ. ^b^paññāpemī^eb^ti ``brāhmaṇo''ti jānāpemi patiṭṭhapemi. ^b^nāññaṃ lapitalāpanamattenā^eb^ti aññaṃ jātimattabrāhmaṇaṃ aṭṭhakādīhi lapitamattavippalapanamattena brāhmaṇaṃ na paññāpemīti. atha vā ^b^lapitalāpanamattenā^eb^ti mantānaṃ ajjhenājjhāpanamattena. ubhayathāpi yaṃ pana brāhmaṇā sāmavedādivedattayājjhenena tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadanti, taṃ paṭikkhipati. bhagavatā hi ``paramatthato atevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃyeva cete bhovādino avijjānivutā `tevijjo brāhmaṇo'ti vadanti, evaṃ pana tevijjo brāhmaṇo hotī''ti dassanatthaṃ tathā bujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.

[03] tattha yasmā vijjāsampanno caraṇasampannoyeva hoti caraṇasampadāya vinā vijjāsampattiyā abhāvato, tasmā caraṇasampadaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā vijjāsīseneva brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpetukāmo ^b^``dhammenāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpemī''^eb^ti desanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā ^b^``kathañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammena tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpemī''^eb^ti kathetukamyatāya pucchaṃ katvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vijjattayaṃ vibhajanto ^b^``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^anekavihita^eb^nti anekavidhaṃ, anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ, saṃvaṇṇitanti attho. ^b^pubbenivāsa^eb^nti ^a^P2.0135^ea^ samanantarātītabhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ. ^b^nivuttha^eb^nti ajjhāvutthaṃ anubhūtaṃ, attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ, nivutthadhammaṃ vā nivutthaṃ, gocaranivāsena nivutthaṃ, attano viññāṇena viññātaṃ paraviññāṇaviññātampi vā chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsu. ^b^anussaratī^eb^ti ``ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo''ti evaṃ jātipaṭipāṭivasena ^a^V0.0274^ea^ anugantvā sarati, anudeva vā sarati, citte abhininnāmite parikammasamanantaraṃ sarati.

[03] ^b^seyyathida^eb^nti āraddhappakāradassanatthe nipāto. teneva yvāyaṃ pubbenivāso āraddho hoti, tassa pakāraṃ dassento ^b^``ekampi jāti''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^ekampi jāti^eb^nti ekampi paṭisandhimūlakaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ. esa nayo ^b^dvepi jātiyo^eb^tiādīsu. ^b^anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe^eb^tiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo ^a^M0.0298^ea^, vaḍḍhamāno vivaṭṭakappo. tattha saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti tammūlakattā, vivaṭṭena ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. evañhi sati yāni tāni ``cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kappassa asaṅkhyeyyāni. katamāni cattāri? saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, vivaṭṭo, vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī''ti (a0 ni0 4.156) vuttāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni, tāni pariggahitāni honti.

[03] tattha tayo saṃvaṭṭā -- tejosaṃvaṭṭo, āposaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti. tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā -- ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā, vehapphalāti. yadā kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati, ābhassarato heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. yadā udakena saṃvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena vilīyati. yadā vātena saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato heṭṭhā vātena viddhaṃsiyati. vitthārato pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ ekato vinassati. iti evarūpo ayaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto bhikkhu anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe anussarati. kathaṃ? ^b^amutrāsi^eb^ntiādinā nayena.

[03] tattha ^b^amutrāsi^eb^nti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā ahamahosiṃ. ^b^evaṃnāmo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0136^ea^ tisso vā phusso vā. ^b^evaṃgotto^eb^ti gotamo vā kassapo vā. ^b^evaṃvaṇṇo^eb^ti odāto vā sāmo vā. ^b^evamāhāro^eb^ti sālimaṃsodanāhāro vā pavattaphalabhojano vā. ^b^evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti anekappakārānaṃ kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī. ^b^evamāyupariyanto^eb^ti evaṃ vassasataparimāṇāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasatasahassaparimāṇāyupariyanto vā. ^b^so tato cuto amutra udapādi^eb^nti sohaṃ tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato vā cuto puna amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ. ^b^tatrāpāsi^eb^nti atha tatrapi ^a^V0.0275^ea^ bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ. ^b^evaṃnāmo^eb^tiādi vuttanayameva.

[01] atha ^a^M0.0299^ea^ vā yasmā ``amutrāsi''nti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ yathābalaṃ saraṇaṃ, ``so tato cuto''ti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ, tasmā ``idhūpapanno''ti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantaraṃ ``amutra udapādi''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^tatrāpāsi^eb^nti tatrapi bhave...pe0... sattanikāye vā āsiṃ. ^b^evaṃnāmo^eb^ti datto vā mitto vā, ^b^evaṃgotto^eb^ti vāseṭṭho vā kassapo vā. ^b^evaṃvaṇṇo^eb^ti kāḷo vā odāto vā. ^b^evamāhāro^eb^ti sudhāhāro vā sāliodanādiāhāro vā. ^b^evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti dibbasukhappaṭisaṃvedī vā mānusasukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī vā. ^b^evamāyupariyanto^eb^ti evaṃ taṃtaṃparamāyupariyanto. ^b^so tato cuto^eb^ti sohaṃ tato bhavādito cuto. ^b^idhūpapanno^eb^ti idha imasmiṃ carimabhave manusso hutvā upapanno nibbatto.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ. ^b^sākāraṃ sauddesa^eb^nti nāmagottādivasena sauddesaṃ, vaṇṇādivasena sākāraṃ. nāmagottena ^a^P2.0137^ea^ hi sattā ``tisso gotamo''ti uddisīyanti, vaṇṇādīhi ``sāmo odāto''ti nānattato paññāyanti. tasmā nāmagottaṃ uddeso, itare ākārā. ^b^ayamassa paṭhamā vijjā adhigatā^eb^ti ayaṃ iminā bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ adhigamavasena paṭhamā, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā adhigatā sacchikatā hoti. kiṃ panāyaṃ viditaṃ karoti? pubbenivāsaṃ. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tassa paṭicchādakamoho vuccati. ^b^tamo^eb^ti sveva moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamoti vuccati. ^b^āloko^eb^ti sā eva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena āloko. ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho, sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. yojanā panettha -- ayaṃ kho tena bhikkhunā vijjā adhigatā, tassa adhigatavijjassa avijjā vihatā, vinaṭṭhāti attho. kasmā? yasmā vijjā uppannāti. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^yathā ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^yathā^eb^ti opammatthe, ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. satiyā avippavāsena ^b^appamattassa^eb^. vīriyātāpena ^b^ātāpino^eb^. kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya ^b^pahitattassa^eb^ pesitacittassāti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya, vijjā uppajjeyya, tamo vihaññeyya, āloko uppajjeyya; evameva tassa bhikkhuno avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā ^a^M0.0300^ea^, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno, tassa padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ labhitvā viharatīti.

[01] ^b^dibbena^eb^ ^a^V0.0276^ea^ ^b^cakkhunā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^visuddhenā^eb^ti cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetubhāvato visuddhaṃ. yo hi cutimattameva passati na upapātaṃ, so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. yo upapātamattameva passati na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. yo pana tadubhayaṃ passati, so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati, tasmāssa taṃ dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu hoti, tadubhayampāyaṃ buddhaputto passati. tena vuttaṃ ``cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetubhāvato ^a^P2.0138^ea^ visuddha''nti. ekādasaupakkilesavirahato vā ^b^visuddhaṃ^eb^. yathāha ``vicikicchā cittassa upakkilesoti -- iti viditvā vicikicchaṃ cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ, amanasikāro...pe0... thinamiddhaṃ, chambhitattaṃ, uppillaṃ, duṭṭhullaṃ, accāraddhavīriyaṃ, atilīnavīriyaṃ, abhijappā, nānattasaññā, atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso''ti (ma0 ni0 3.242) evaṃ vuttehi ekādasahi upakkilesehi anupakkiliṭṭhattā ^b^visuddhaṃ^eb^. manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanena ^b^atikkantamānusakaṃ,^eb^ maṃsacakkhuṃ vā atikkantattā atikkantamānusakaṃ. tena dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena. ^b^satte passatī^eb^ti manussamaṃsacakkhunā viya satte passati dakkhati āloketi.
