[03] ettha ca yathāvuttehi tehi tehi dhammehi vikkhambhanavasena pahīnānaṃ imesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa tāva arahattamaggena accantappahānaṃ hoti, tathā thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa ca ^a^V0.0314^ea^. byāpādanīvaraṇassa ^a^P2.0183^ea^ pana kukkuccanīvaraṇassa ca anāgāmimaggena, vicikicchānīvaraṇassa sotāpattimaggena accantappahānaṃ hoti. tasmā tesaṃ tathā pahānāya upakāradhamme dassetuṃ ^b^``āraddhaṃ hoti vīriya''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. idameva vā yathāvuttaṃ abhijjhādīnaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṃ, yasmā hīnavīriyatāya kusītena, anupaṭṭhitassatitāya muṭṭhassatinā, apaṭippassaddhadarathatāya sāraddhakāyena, asamāhitatāya vikkhittacittena na kadācipi te sakkā nibbattetuṃ, pageva itaraṃ, tasmā yathā paṭipannassa so abhijjhādīnaṃ vigamo pahānaṃ sambhavati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``āraddhaṃ hoti vīriya''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. tassattho -- tesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānāya sabbesampi vā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ samucchindanatthāya vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ hoti, paggahitaṃ asithilappavattanti vuttaṃ hoti. āraddhattā eva ca antarā saṅkocassa anāpajjanato ^b^asallīnaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā^eb^ti na kevalañca vīriyameva, satipi ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena upaṭṭhitā hoti, tathā upaṭṭhitattā eva ca cirakatacirabhāsitānaṃ saraṇasamatthatāya asammuṭṭhā. ^b^passaddho^eb^ti kāyacittadarathappassambhanena kāyopissa passaddho hoti. tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopissa passaddho eva hoti, tasmā ``nāmakāyo rūpakāyo''ti avisesetvā ``passaddho kāyo''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^asāraddho^eb^ti so ca passaddhattā eva asāraddho, vigatadarathoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagga^eb^nti cittampissa sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti, samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandanaṃ niriñjananti.
[03] ettāvatā ^a^M0.0344^ea^ jhānamaggānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā. tenevāha --
[02] ``carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccatī''ti (itivu0 110).
[03] tassattho heṭṭhā vutto eva.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^yataṃ care^eb^ti yatamāno careyya, caṅkamanādivasena gamanaṃ kappentopi ``anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī''tiādinā ^a^P2.0184^ea^ (saṃ0 ni0 5.651-662; vibha0 390) nayena vuttasammappadhānavīriyavasena yatanto ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā akusalā dhammā pahīyanti, kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, evaṃ gamanaṃ ^a^V0.0315^ea^ kappeyyāti attho. esa nayo sesesupi. keci pana ``yata''nti etassa saṃyatoti atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^tiṭṭhe^eb^ti tiṭṭheyya ṭhānaṃ kappeyya. ^b^acche^eb^ti nisīdeyya. ^b^saye^eb^ti nipajjeyya. ^b^yatamenaṃ pasāraye^eb^ti etaṃ pasāretabbaṃ hatthapādādiṃ yataṃ yatamāno yathāvuttavīriyasamaṅgīyeva hutvā pasāreyya, sabbattha pamādaṃ vijaheyyāti adhippāyo.

[03] idāni yathā paṭipajjanto yataṃ yatamāno nāma hoti, taṃ paṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``uddha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^uddha^eb^nti upari. ^b^tiriya^eb^nti tiriyato, puratthimadisādivasena samantato disābhāgesūti attho. ^b^apācīna^eb^nti heṭṭhā. ^b^yāvatā jagato gatī^eb^ti yattakā sattasaṅkhārabhedassa lokassa pavatti, tattha sabbatthāti attho. ettāvatā anavasesato sammasanañāṇassa visayaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti. ^b^samavekkhitā^eb^ti sammā hetunā ñāyena avekkhitā, aniccādivasena vipassakoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^dhammāna^eb^nti sattasuññānaṃ. ^b^khandhāna^eb^nti rūpādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ. ^b^udayabbaya^eb^nti udayañca vayañca. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- upari tiriyaṃ adhoti tisaṅgahe sabbasmiṃ loke atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātānaṃ sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aniccatādisammasanādhigatena udayabbayañāṇena pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi udayaṃ, pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi vayañca samavekkhitā samanupassitā bhaveyyāti.

[03] ^b^cetosamathasāmīci^eb^nti ^a^M0.0345^ea^ cittasaṃkilesānaṃ accantavūpasamanato ^a^P2.0185^ea^ cetosamathasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa anucchavikapaṭipadaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ. ^b^sikkhamāna^eb^nti paṭipajjamānaṃ bhāventaṃ ñāṇaparamparaṃ nibbattentaṃ. ^b^sadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ, rattiñceva divā ca. ^b^sata^eb^nti catusampajaññena samannāgatāya satiyā satokāriṃ. ^b^satataṃ pahitatto^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ pahitatto nibbānaṃ paṭipesitattoti ^b^tathāvidhaṃ bhikkhuṃ^eb^ buddhādayo ariyā ^b^āhu^eb^ ācikkhanti kathenti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06] dvādasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ terasame ^b^loko^eb^ti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko, atthato purimaṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ idha pana dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ veditabbaṃ. svāyaṃ sattaloko, saṅkhāraloko, okāsalokoti vibhāgato ^a^V0.0316^ea^ sarūpato ca heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. apica khandhalokādivasena ca anekavidho loko. yathāha --

[03] ``lokoti khandhaloko, dhātuloko, āyatanaloko, vipattibhavaloko, vipattisambhavaloko, sampattibhavaloko, sampattisambhavaloko, eko loko sabbe sattā ahāraṭṭhitikā, dve lokā nāmañca rūpañca, tayo lokā tisso vedanā, cattāro lokā cattāro āhārā, pañca lokā pañcupādānakkhandhā, cha lokā cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, satta lokā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, aṭṭha lokā aṭṭha lokadhammā, nava lokā nava sattāvāsā, dasa lokā dasāyatanāni, dvādasa lokā dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo''ti (mahāni0 3; cūḷani0 ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 2).

[03] evamanekadhā vibhattopi loko pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu eva saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati, upādānakkhandhā ca dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ jātipi dukkhā ^a^M0.0346^ea^ ...pe0... saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhāpi dukkhāti. tena vuttaṃ ``atthato purimaṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ, idha pana dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ veditabba''nti. nanu ca lujjanapalujjanaṭṭho avisesena pañcasu khandhesu sambhavatīti? saccaṃ sambhavati. yaṃ pana na lujjatīti gahitaṃ, taṃ tathā na hoti, ekaṃseneva lujjati palujjatīti ^a^P2.0186^ea^ so lokoti upādānakkhandhesveva lokasaddo nirūḷhoti veditabbo. tasmā lokoti dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ eva.

[03] yadipi tathāgata-saddassa heṭṭhā tathāgatasutte nānānayehi vitthārato attho vibhatto, tathāpi pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāmukhena ayamatthavibhāvanā -- ^b^abhisambuddho^eb^ti ``abhiññeyyato pariññeyyato''ti pubbe vuttavibhāgena vā avisesato tāva āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādibhedato kusalākusalādivibhāgato vaṭṭappamāṇasaṇṭhānādibhedato, visesato vā pana ``ayaṃ sassatāsayo, ayaṃ ucchedāsayo''tiādinā ``kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu, paggharaṇalakkhaṇā āpodhātū''tiādinā ca abhivisiṭṭhena sayambhuñāṇena sammā aviparītaṃ yo yo attho yathā yathā bujjhitabbo, tathā tathā buddho ñāto attapaccakkho katoti abhisambuddho.

[03] ^b^lokasmā^eb^ti yathāvuttalokato. ^b^visaṃyutto^eb^ti visaṃsaṭṭho, tappaṭibaddhānaṃ sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ sammadeva samucchinnattā tato vippamuttoti attho. ^b^lokasamudayo^eb^ti suttantanayena taṇhā, abhidhammanayena ^a^V0.0317^ea^ pana abhisaṅkhārehi saddhiṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ. ^b^pahīno^eb^ti bodhimaṇḍe arahattamaggañāṇena samucchedappahānavasena savāsanaṃ pahīno. ^b^lokanirodho^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. ^b^sacchikato^eb^ti attapaccakkho kato. ^b^lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā^eb^ti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. so hi lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati, tadatthaṃ ariyehi paṭipajjīyati cāti lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
[03] ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddho yāthāvato gatoti tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti. cattāri hi ariyasaccāni tathāni nāma. yathāha --
[02] ``cattārimāni ^a^M0.0347^ea^, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. katamāni cattāri? idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ, anaññathameta''nti (saṃ0 ni0 5.1090) vitthāro.

[01] apica tathāya gatoti tathāgato, tathaṃ gatoti tathāgato ^a^P2.0187^ea^, gatoti ca avagato atīto patto paṭipannoti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yasmā bhagavā sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya aviparītāya gato avagato, tasmā loko tathāgatena abhisambuddhoti tathāgato. lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato. lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato. lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgatoti. evaṃ imissā pāḷiyā bhagavato tathāgatabhāvadīpanavasena attho veditabbo.

[03] iti bhagavā catusaccābhisambodhanavasena attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tattha diṭṭhādiabhisambodhivasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ, bhikkhave''^eb^tiādimāha. aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.4.23) pana ``catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā''tiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ tathāgatasadda-buddhasaddānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. tathā ceva hi pāḷi pavattāti. tattha ^b^diṭṭha^eb^nti rūpāyatanaṃ. ^b^suta^eb^nti saddāyatanaṃ. ^b^muta^eb^nti patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca. ^b^viññāta^eb^nti sukhadukkhādidhammārammaṇaṃ. ^b^patta^eb^nti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. ^b^pariyesita^eb^nti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. ^b^anuvicaritaṃ manasā^eb^ti cittena anusañcaritaṃ. kassa pana anuvicaritaṃ manasāti? ^b^sadevakassa...pe0... sadevamanussāyā^eb^ti sambandhanīyaṃ. tattha saha devehīti sadevako, tassa ^b^sadevakassa^eb^. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[01] sadevakavacanena ^a^V0.0318^ea^ cettha pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, samārakavacanena chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ, sabrahmakavacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ, sassamaṇabrāhmaṇivacanena sāsanassa paccatthikasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇañceva samitapāpabāhitapāpasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇañca, pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0348^ea^, sadevamanussavacanena sammutidevāvasesamanussaggahaṇaṃ. evamettha tīhi padehi devamārabrahmehi saddhiṃ sattaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo.

[03] aparo ^a^P2.0188^ea^ nayo -- sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaradevaloko gahito, samārakavacanena chakāmāvacaradevaloko, sabrahmakavacanena rūpībrahmaloko, sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādivacanena sammutidevehi saha avasesasattaloko gahito. apicettha sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbalokavisayassa bhagavato abhisambuddhabhāve pakāsite yesamevaṃ siyā ``māro nāma mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī, brahmā pana tatopi mahānubhāvataro dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati, uttamajjhānasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. puthū ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno mahānubhāvā saṃvijjanti. ayañca sattakāyo ananto aparimāṇo, kimetesaṃ sabbesaṃyeva visayo anavasesato bhagavatā abhisambuddho''ti? tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamento bhagavā ^b^``sadevakassa lokassā''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] porāṇā panāhu -- ``sadevakassā''ti devatāhi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ pariyādiyati, ``samārakassā''ti mārena saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ, ``sabrahmakassā''ti brahmehi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīsu padesu pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto ``sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāyā''ti āha. evaṃ pañcahipi padehi khandhattayaparicchinne sabbasatte pariyādiyati.

[03] ^b^yasmā taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddha^eb^nti iminā idaṃ dasseti -- yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa ``nīlaṃ pītaka''ntiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, taṃ sabbaṃ ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa ``bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddo''tiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, ``mūlagandho tacagandho''tiādi gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre āpāthamāgacchati, ``mūlaraso khandharaso''tiādi rasārammaṇaṃ jivhādvāre āpāthamāgacchati ^a^M0.0349^ea^, ``kakkhaḷaṃ muduka''ntiādi pathavīdhātutejodhātuvāyodhātubhedaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ kāyadvāre āpāthamāgacchati ^a^V0.0319^ea^, ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbaṃ ^a^P2.0189^ea^ phusitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.

[03] tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati, ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ jānitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. evaṃ yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ, taṃ tathāgatena adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi. imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā appattampi atthi, apariyesitvā appattampi atthi, pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā pattampi atthi. sabbampi tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ. tato eva yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi, taṃ bhagavā sabbaṃ sabbākārena jānāti passati. evaṃ jānatā passatā cānena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānapadavasena vā ``katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ? yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka''ntiādinā (dha0 sa0 617) nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tatheva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu.

[03] ^b^tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī^eb^ti yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ, tassa tatheva gatattā tathāgatoti vuccati. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``abhisambuddha''nti vuttaṃ, taṃ tathāgatasaddena samānatthaṃ. iminā tathādassibhāvato tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti. vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā --
[21] ``na tassa addiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñci,
[27] atho aviññātamajānitabbaṃ.
[26] sabbaṃ abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyaṃ,
[22] tathāgato tena samantacakkhū''ti.. (mahāni0 156; cūḷani0 mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85; paṭi0 ma0 1.121).
[03] suttantepi ^a^M0.0350^ea^ vuttaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``yaṃ ^a^V0.0320^ea^, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa...pe0... sadevamanussāya pajāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ ^a^P2.0190^ea^ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi, tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī''ti (a0 ni0 4.24).

[03] ^b^yañca, bhikkhave, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatī^eb^ti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃ tathā āgatādiatthena tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati. ^b^yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatī^eb^ti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati. ^b^yaṃ etasmiṃ antare^eb^ti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesānupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ vemajjhe pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyampi, majjhimabodhiyampi, pacchimabodhiyampi yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ ^b^bhāsati^eb^ niddisanavasena, ^b^lapati^eb^ uddhisanavasena, ^b^niddisati^eb^ paṭiniddisanavasena. ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotī^eb^ti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ...pe0... mohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi avakkhalitaṃ, ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ, ekanteneva tassa sādhanato, ^b^no aññathā^eb^. tasmā tathaṃ, avitathaṃ, anaññathaṃ. etena tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti dasseti. gadāttho ayaṃ gatasaddo dakārassa takāraṃ katvā, tasmā tathaṃ gadatīti tathāgatoti attho. atha vā āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. tatho aviparīto āgado yassāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.

[01] ^b^yathāvādī tathākārī^eb^ti ye dhamme bhagavā ``ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā samattā samādinnā ^a^P2.0191^ea^ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī''ti ^a^M0.0351^ea^ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desento vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ pahāsi. ye pana dhamme bhagavā ``ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā viññuppasatthā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī''ti vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ upasampajja vihāsi. tasmā yathāvādī bhagavā, tathākārīti veditabbo. ^b^yathākārī tathāvādī^eb^ti sammadeva sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammā paṭipanno sayaṃ yathākārī bhagavā, tatheva dhammadesanāya paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena ^a^V0.0321^ea^ tathāvādī. bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā. tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. evaṃbhūtassa cassa yathā vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavatto. yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti attho.

[03] ^b^abhibhū anabhibhūto^eb^ti upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi, asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. tato eva sayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūtoti anabhibhūto. ^b^aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. yañhi kiñci neyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya passatīti ^b^daso^eb^. aviparītaṃ āsayādiavabodhena hitūpasaṃhārādinā ca satte, bhāvaññathattūpanayavasena saṅkhāre sabbākārena suciṇṇavasitāya samāpattiyo cittañca vase vattetīti ^b^vasavattī^eb^. ettāvatā abhibhavanaṭṭhena bhagavā attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03] tatrevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā -- agado viya agado. ko panesa? desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca. teneva hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe, sabbe parappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati. iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā ^a^M0.0352^ea^ tathāgatoti veditabbo. tena vuttaṃ ``sadevake, bhikkhave, loke...pe0... vasavattī, tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī''ti.

[03] gāthāsu ^a^P2.0192^ea^ ^b^sabbalokaṃ abhiññāyā^eb^ti tedhātukalokasannivāsaṃ jānitvā. ^b^sabbaloke yathātatha^eb^nti tasmiṃ tedhātukalokasannivāse yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ yathātathaṃ aviparītaṃ jānitvā. ^b^sabbalokavisaṃyutto^eb^ti catunnaṃ yogānaṃ anavasesappahānena sabbenapi lokena visaṃyutto vippamutto. ^b^anūpayo^eb^ti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi anūpayo tehi upayehi virahito.

[03] ^b^sabbābhibhū^eb^ti rūpādīni sabbārammaṇāni, sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ, sabbepi māre abhibhavitvā ṭhito. ^b^dhīro^eb^ti dhitisampanno. ^b^sabbaganthappamocano^eb^ti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike mocetvā ṭhito ^a^V0.0322^ea^ veneyyasantānepi attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanato sabbaganthappamocano. ^b^phuṭṭhāssā^eb^ti phuṭṭhā assa. karaṇatthe idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, phuṭṭhā anenāti attho. ^b^paramā santī^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. tañhi tena ñāṇaphusanena phuṭṭhaṃ. tenevāha ``nibbānaṃ akutobhaya''nti. atha vā ^b^paramā santī^eb^ti uttamā santi. katarā sāti? nibbānaṃ. yasmā pana nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthi, tasmā taṃ ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^anīgho^eb^ti niddukkho. ^b^sabbakammakkhayaṃ patto^eb^ti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ accantābhāvaṃ patto. ^b^vimutto upadhisaṅkhaye^eb^ti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā vimutto. ^b^esa so^eb^ti eso so. ^b^sīho anuttaro^eb^ti parissayānaṃ sahanaṭṭhena, kilesānaṃ hananaṭṭhena ca, tathāgato anuttaro sīho nāma. ^b^brahma^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ. ^b^cakka^eb^nti dhammacakkaṃ. ^b^pavattayī^eb^ti tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ pavattesi.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0353^ea^ evaṃ tathāgatassa guṇe jānitvā. ^b^saṅgammā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0193^ea^ samāgantvā. ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^b^namassantī^eb^ti taṃ tathāgataṃ te saraṇaṃ gatā devamanussā namassanti. mahantehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā ^b^mahantaṃ,^eb^ catuvesārajjayogena ^b^vītasāradaṃ^eb^. idāni yaṃ vadantā te namassanti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^danto^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] iti imasmiṃ catukkanipāte chaṭṭhe sattame ca sutte vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, paṭhamadutiyatatiyadvādasamaterasamesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
[06] terasamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti paramatthadīpaniyā
[06] khuddakanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] itivuttakassa catukkanipātavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
